story:
Meet TZOA

A wearable that helps you breathe cleaner, healthier air

TZOA takes data from your immediate environment in real-time and turns it into actionable recommendations to keep you healthy.

If you suffer from asthma or allergies, you can use TZOA to help manage your condition and enjoy the air once again. 

TZOA uses internal sensors to track your environment throughout the day, providing you with real-time information, city-wide mapping, and a daily review. Recommendations will help to change behaviors and improve your quality of life.

What People Are Saying

Your Air Matters!

Why did we build TZOA? The World Health Organization has found that 7 million people die prematurely every year from air pollution. 


The air can be worse inside your home than outside (2-5X worse on average). You spend the majority of your life in your home, we all have the right to know if its a safe environment.

If you suffer from asthma or allergies you're already greatly affected by the air you breathe; with the information we provide, you can help manage your condition and enjoy the air once again. 

What's Inside?


TZOA contains a high-tech optical laser that measures the amount of physical particles in the air around you, both those you can see with the naked eye, and the ones that are so small you don't even know they exist. 

The ultra-fine particles that we detect contribute to serious respiratory and cardiac issues when breathed in, as well as aggravate asthma and allergies.

We have carefully selected 5 sensors that give a holistic picture of your environment. Context is very important for air quality detection.

TZOA App: 3 Simple Interactions

We use Bluetooth to send and share data to your smartphone. Once TZOA is connected to your smartphone, our iOS or Android app will visualize your environment and give you full access to the data you collect. 
The TZOA app provides a real-time air quality report, a daily digest of your environmental exposures, and crowdsourced air quality maps.
1. Real-Time Air Quality Report

TZOA takes data from your immediate environment in real-time and turns it into actionable recommendations to keep you healthy. 

For example: opening your windows for ventilation, choosing less polluted routes, and making sure you are getting enough sunshine during the winter (and not too much in during the summer).

2. Your Daily Digest

Open up the TZOA app at the end of the day to see your daily exposure levels. Your daily digest knows where you were located, the average air quality in each area, and how much time you spent there. It then provides recommendations.

This information allows you to investigate what happened throughout the day, good or bad, and helps form behavioral change for tomorrow.

3. Crowdsourced Maps

TZOA empowers you to become a citizen scientist. You will play an important role in building air quality maps of entire cities and countries, all the way down to your local neighborhood. With family, friends and fellow TZOA-users, we can all come together and build something that makes a difference.

You can use these maps to plan your route to work, avoid areas with reported allergens, decide where to have a picnic with your family, as well as using the data to promote social change. 

The Technology

Our optical air quality sensor detects PM (Particulate Matter) 2.5 and 10. These are tiny particles floating in the air that cause permanent damage to our lungs. Our sensor incorporates a 630nm (red) laser along with a photodiode to capture the light intensity and determine the amount of particles as well as their size. 

This is our custom-built test chamber which allows us to compare our sensor to reference devices that are worth $2,000-$20,000+. We use an industrial HEPA filter which prevents unwanted particulate matter from entering the chamber in order for us to conduct proper testing and refine our algorithms. 


This graph compares the TZOA sensor to a $3000 TSI DRX sensor. We've done 3rd party testing that shows a great .9253 R-squared (correlation) value.

Below is a close up of one of the peak events across multiple sensors.

Here is a scatter plot showing our R-squared value against the TSI DustTrak.

                              

Our circuit boards are black. Why? With a laser inside and a photo-diode to collect the light, we had to reduce reflectivity within the device itself. As an added bonus, we think it looks pretty cool!

What you see above is our current device for researchers. Our next stages are shrinking the technology into the smaller consumer TZOA design and further improving the algorithms and software.

Research Device

We've partnered with researchers from Universities and organizations across North America to build a device just for them. Current devices for researchers are bulky, dumb, and expensive.

Our goal was to create a smart device that is affordable and has a miniature form factor, and we're confident that we succeeded. You be the judge!

The research device features:
-Bluetooth communication and data extraction
-Double capacity battery
-Data logging with removeable SD card slot
-Micro-USB port for constant power and data extraction
-Higher quality components for better accuracy/sensitivity 
-More ruggedized design
-Configuration panel that enables access to device settings such as logging frequency, calibration values, sleep mode, and fan power.

In June, ten of our research devices are participating in a study in conjunction with the University of British Columbia. They will be taken to India where local volunteers will use them to track their personal exposure to particulate pollution. This is a brand new way of doing air quality research and our technology will allow for new studies to be done with larger deployments and personal exposure tracking.
In addition, the researchers we are working with are helping us improve our technology to prepare for our consumer TZOA device for you. You will be using the same technology that researchers around the world use for scientific studies!

Our Team


We've built a strong team comprised of people who have been in the trenches before and know what they're doing. We have built large-scale products, grown companies from the ground up, and we're all very passionate about what we do.

Being based out of Vancouver and San Francisco, we were inspired to make a difference in the world and TZOA is the way to do it. Join our team and let's do something unprecedented in order to make the world a better place.

For both our prototyping and manufacturing, we have partnered with MistyWest, an engineering design consultancy with a broad range of experience. 

MistyWest develops products that combine the best of function and aesthetics with a focus on new technologies. The multi-disciplinary team at MistyWest includes mechanical, electrical and software engineers along with industrial designers that are working closely with the Tzoa team to help make bring this innovative product to market.

Our Mission

Our mission is to create a social movement for environmental change. We believe awareness leads to advocacy, which leads to action - helping perpetuate innovation and green technology.

With TZOA, we want to bring air quality data to every person on Earth - whether you're concerned about the air in your home, on your commute, or in your community.


How do I contact the team?

Please feel free to reach out to us at info[at]mytzoa.com  and someone from the team would be happy to get back to you.


Timeline of Engineering:

We are planning on doing all of the R&D and the majority of manufacturing in North America. We think it's important to stick by our own environmentally friendly principles and do this the right way. We will also implement a recycling program for our devices before they are shipped.

story:
Click Here for Italian!

    

                             Let's introduce Bixe 

The Bixegear’s innovativeness lies in the main concept : think alternative to ride your bike. We changed the way of conceive the concept of cycling as we know it with the alternating pedaling. The Bixegear permits to go forwards even pedaling backwards.

                                               what people are saying

"We wanted the rear facing person to be able to pedal whichever way they want. With your Bixe Gear, we were able to accomplish just that. The rear facing rider now has the ability to pedal which ever way they please so they don't have to worry about accidentally pedal backwards. The Bixe Gear was an essential contributor to our success in this past years race. Additionally, we fully anticipate using the Bixe Gear during the next race in 2016. We are very satisfied with your product and recommend its use in other two way facing rovers at the competition". 

     Tom Frost, Project Leader of the 2015-2016 CCSU NASA Rover Challenge Team

"I made an official visit to the pavilion dedicated to the Sport set up in Bastia Umbra on the occasion of Expo Regalo and I discovered the BIXE Gear ! I was curious to try it and I have been impressed by the performance of the mechanism".

        Giovanni Malago, President of the Italian National Olympic Committee (CONI)

"It's amazing the sense of well-being that I felt on trying the alternating pedaling backwards and forwards, while maintaining a constant stroke frequency . I recommend it to all professional and amateur cyclists".

                 Massimiliano Gentili, Professional Cyclist“The alternating pedaling increases the strenght of the ciclyst with a lower wear of the joints and a greater comfort for the joints districts involved, especially for the knees and the ankles”.

           Giovanni Boni, Surgeon Specialist in Medicine of the Medical Sport of the                    Italian off-road cycling team at the LONDON OLYMPICS 2012.


                       Features &Technical specs

                                     

                                 
                                      Bixe at work 

     
We patented and manufactured the only bracket that lets you use your bike riding both forward and backwards. The front chainrings, that turn ever onward allow to you to use the gearshift and the derailleur, also pedaling backwards. The Bixe does not alter the structure or function of the bicycle itself. Conversely, it adds one more chance in its use because it allows to exploit different muscles , due to the effort reversal.

Imagine to have the possibility to go forward even pedaling backwards.

                                                   for sports & for fitness 

                                    

                                             for fun &  to everyday life

                               

                                        to discover the explorer within you

                              

                                     

                                       Bixe Perks 

                                          

                            Bixe Campaign Timeline   

                                      Bixe story 

                                                  Why  Bixe was created

We have loved bikes, since we were children, and we noticed that this simple and ingenious means, has maintained its basic structure  throughout its story. In fact the only changes have been made on the materials of the individual components. So, as we are constantly looking for ideas that have the potential to respond to the current people’s needs, we changed the concept of bicycle as we know it, and we moved beyond . How? Facing life from an 'alternate' perspective with the BIXE , the gear that has revolutionized the concept of cycling forever. It lets get gaining more energy and strenght out of this fantastic means !

                                                    How Bixe was born 

 First prototype :  the first objective of this prototype was to test “on  the road", the effect of pedaling both forward and backwars to understand if the idea could be really good and interesting

                

The evolution :  the mechanism is inserted in the bottom bracket. This prototype did  many kilometers and collected many consents . So we improved the system and reduced its size.           

                 

Final prototype : the mechanism has been reduced and provided with a mechanical release on the handlebar that allows to engage and disengage  the backwards pedaling,at will. Birth of the first gene X. 

                   

The patent :  the fully-developed pedaling system APS ( Advanced System pedaling ) has been patented.      

                  

                           

                              About Team Bixe 

Giovanni Pignatta (Chairman) graduated on Machine Maintenance Mechanic.He has a lot of experience in the construction of facilities for special vehicles. He founded the Bixe Company looking for new opportunities in technology and mechanics branches. Francesca Coglitore (Ceo) specialized in accounting, administration and custumer satisfaction, became a member of the Bixe Company and she decided to get involved and to follow the development of the innovative Bixegear. Alessio Mezzetti (Engineer) graduated in Mechanical Engineering, he has collaborated, as mechanical engineer,  with some famous companies. His great skills led him to join the team Bixe as project engineer . Luca Comodi (Communication Manager) graduated in Business Communication, he is taking care of the BIXE Communication. He’s an expert in communication and marketing  for the online and offline media communication campaigns. Barbara Passeri (Marketing Manager) graduated in Foreign  Languages ,  has worked in different fields dealing with foreigner customers and suppliers . She's collaborating with  team Bixe to strength the international marketing 

                    Why bixe needs your support 

We realized that despite the positive feedbacks about our product, to produce it in high enough volume and make it affordable to everyone, requires capital. Moreover if we exceed the amount established as the goal, we might be able to finance the following pieces of our project:

Here we are our stretch goals:

                                     put in production the Bixe47 version 

The mechanism is  provided with a mechanical release on the handlebar which allows to switch off / switch on the backwards pedaling , meanwhile the traditional pedaling forwards remains always active.


    


                                     developing bixe prototype for wheelchairs

The idea was born listening to and living in contact with friends, who told us, that it's difficult to them overcoming even small levels in height and bumps by their wheelchairs . In fact ,if you go backwards with a standard wheelchair to overcome a little bump you risk to lose balance , unless there is someone to help you. So we thought to design a bixe for them to make them free to go safely and independently wherever they want.


                        Frequently asked Questions 

Does it come with a warranty? Yes,it comes with a legal warranty

Can I replace the parts of the bixe? Yes, you can order them contacting us by email at: info@bixeitalia.it

Will there be a network of  Bixe dealers? We hope to have it, but we do not currently have a list of local distributors.

Comments and Questions? Feel free to contact us posting your comment here or email us at: info@bixeitalia.it


Italiano


Bixegear: Resta in forma e divertiti! Il modo innovativo per allenarsi dimezzando la fatica 


                                     

                                      Cos'è il Bixe

L’innovazione del Bixegear sta nel concetto principale: pensare ad un modo alternativo per andare in bici. Abbiamo cambiato il modo di concepire il concetto di andare in bicicletta come lo conosciamo con la pedalata alternata. Il Bixegear permette di andare avanti anche pedalando all'indietro.

                                                       Cosa dicono di noi

“il Bixe Gear è stato un contributo essenziale per il nostro successo nella gara della passata edizione. Dopo aver riprogettato il nostro rover per la gara del 2015 volevamo,che la persona rivolta all’indietro fosse in grado di pedalare in qualunque modo volesse. Con il vostro Bixe Gear siamo stati in grado di realizzare proprio questo. Il pilota rivolto all’indietro ha avuto la possibilità di pedalare nel modo in cui voleva .Il Bixe Gear è stato un contributo essenziale per il nostro successo nella gara 2015 e perciò prevediamo di utilizzarlo sicuramente,anche durante la prossima CCSU NASA Rover Challenge nel 2016. Nel complesso, siamo molto soddisfatti del prodotto e ne consiglieremo l'uso nei rover da competizione che hanno i sedili rivolti uno di fronte all’altro”.

Tom Frost attuale Project Leader del team 2015-2016 CCSU NASA Rover Challenge

“Mi sono recato in visita ufficiale al padiglione dedicato allo Sport allestito a Bastia Umbra nell’ambito di Expo Regalo, ed ho scoperto Bixe Gear! L’ho provato con molta curiosità e sono rimasto favorevolmente colpito dalle prestazioni del meccanismo”

Giovanni Malagò, Presidente del Coni

“È incredibile la sensazione di benessere che si prova alternando la pedalata in avanti e indietro pur mantenendo costante la frequenza di corsa. Lo consiglio a tutti i ciclisti professionisti e dilettanti”.

Massimiliano Gentili, Ciclista Professionista

“Alternando la pedalata aumenta la resistenza del ciclista con una minore usura delle articolazioni e maggior benessere per i distretti articolari coinvolti, ginocchia e caviglie principalmente”.

Giovanni Boni, Medico Chirurgo Specialista in medicina dello sport Medico della nazionale italiana ciclismo fuoristrada OLIMPIADI LONDRA 2012.

                                             

                         Componenti e specifiche tecniche

                                


                                                               Bixe all’opera

      


Abbiamo brevettato e realizzato l’unico movimento centrale che permette di usare la bicicletta pedalando sia in avanti che indietro. Le corone anteriori ruotando sempre in avanti permettono di usare cambio e deragliatore anche pedalando indietro.

Il Bixe non altera né la struttura né le funzioni della bicicletta, ma aggiunge una possibilità in più nell’uso sfruttando muscoli diversi grazie all’inversione di sforzo.

Immagina di avere la possibilità di spingere all’indietro ed andare sempre avanti

                                                    Per lo sport & il fitness

                                      

                                        Per divertirsi nella vita di tutti i giorni

                                 

                                                  Per esplorare nuovi mondi

                                  

                                                                          

                                           Bixe Perks

            

                          Timeline Campagna Bixe

                                     Storia del Bixe

                                                  perché bixe è stato creato

La passione per la bicicletta, mezzo semplice e geniale, ci accompagna fin da bambini, e ci ha fatto notare che gli unici cambiamenti apportati, nel corso della sua storia, sono stati quelli sui materiali dei singoli componenti, mentre la struttura di base è rimasta la stessa. Dato che siamo costantemente alla ricerca di idee che abbiamo il potenziale per andare incontro ai desideri e alle esigenze delle persone , abbiamo pensato di guardare alla bicicletta in un’ottica diversa, cambiandone il concetto e andare oltre. Come ? Affrontando la vita da un’ottica alternata, con il Bixe: l’ingranaggio che ha rivoluzionato , per sempre il concetto di andare in bicicletta, ottenendo più energia e forza questo fantastico mezzo!

                                                       come è nato Bixe

Primo Prototipo: il primo obiettivo di questo prototipo è stato quello di testare su “strada” l’effetto di pedalare sia avanti che indietro per capire se l’idea poteva essere veramente valida e interessante.

           

L’evoluzione: Il meccanismo viene inserito nel movimento centrale. Questo prototipo ha percorso molti km e raccolto tanti consensi, che ci hanno stimolato a migliorare il sistema e ridurne le dimensioni.

                   

Prototipo finale: Il meccanismo viene ridotto e dotato di un sistema meccanico di sblocco al manubrio che permette di inserire e disinserire a piacimento la pedalata indietro. Nasce il primo gene X.

                        

Il brevetto: Il sistema di pedalata evoluto APS (Advanced Pedaling System) viene brevettato. 

                                 

                                                            

                                Il Team di Bixe

Giovanni Pignatta (Direttore) diplomato in Congegneria Meccanica ha acquisito una grande esperienza nella costruzione di componenti per veicoli speciali. Ha fondato l’azienda Bixe per cercare nuove opportunità nel settore tecnologico e in quello meccanico. Francesca Coglitore (CEO), specializzata nel ramo della contabilità, amministrazione e nel custumer satisfaction diventa socia della società Bixe, decidendosi di mettersi in gioco seguendo la nascita e lo sviluppo dell’innovativo meccanismo di pedalata Bixegear. Alessio Mezzetti (Ingnere) Laureatosi in Ingegneria meccanica , ha lavorato come ingegnere meccanico, collaborando con diverse aziende di successo .Le sue grandi competenze lo fanno entrare nel team Bixe come ingegnere del progetto.) Luca Comodi (Communication Manager) Laureato nella specialistica in Comunicazione d’Impresa segue la comunicazione Bixe. Esperto di comunicazione e marketing, sviluppa strategie e contenuti per campagne di comunicazione da indirizzare negli innovativi mezzi on-line e nei tradizionali mezzi off-line. Barbara Passeri (Marketing Manager ) Laureata in Lingue e Letterature straniere ha lavorato in diversi ambiti curando i rapporti con le istituzioni, clienti e fornitori esteri.Collabora con il team Bixe per rafforzare il marketing internazionale.


       Perché Bixe ha bisogno del Vostro sostegno

Nonostante i riscontri positivi che abbiamo avuto sul prodotto, ci siamo accorti che per avere una produzione tale per abbattere i costi e renderlo accessibile a tutti, occorre capitale. Inoltre se riuscissimo ad andare oltre la somma posta come obiettivo potremmo realizzare altre due componenti del nostro progetto:

                               mettere in produzione la versione Bixe47

Il meccanismo in oggetto e’ dotato di un sistema meccanico di sblocco al manubrio che permette di disinserire/inserire la pedalata indietro, la pedalata in avanti tradizionale rimane sempre attiva.


           Continuare nella prototipazione della versione Bixe per sedie a rotelle

L’idea ci è venuta ascoltando e stando in contatto con amici che ci hanno spiegato le difficoltà che incontrano con le attuali sedie a rotelle nel superare piccolo dossi o scalini. Infatti nel mandare le ruote all’indietro per superare anche il minimo ostacolo, rischiano di perdere l’equilibrio , a meno che non ci sia qualcuno che li accompagni. E’ per questo che abbiamo pensato di progettare un Bixe apposito, per renderli autonomi e liberi di andare in sicurezza dove vogliono.


                           Domande Frequenti

Ha una garanzia? Sì, garanzia di legge

Esistono ricambi del Bixe? Sì, è possibile averli contattandoci a questo indirizzo: info@bixeitalia.it

Avete una rete di rivenditori autorizzati? No, speriamo in futuro di poterne avere una

Commenti e domande? Contattateci liberamente postando i commenti qui o per email a : info@bixeitalia.it
story_txt:
Click Here for Italian! 
    


                             Let's introduce Bixe 






The
Bixegear’s innovativeness lies in the main concept : think alternative to ride
your bike. We changed the way of conceive the concept of cycling as we know it
with the alternating pedaling. The Bixegear permits to go forwards even
pedaling backwards.


                                               what people are saying


"We wanted
the rear facing person to be able to pedal whichever way they want. With your
Bixe Gear, we were able to accomplish just that. The rear facing rider now has
the ability to pedal which ever way they please so they don't have to worry
about accidentally pedal backwards. The Bixe Gear was an essential contributor to our success in
this past years race. Additionally, we fully anticipate using the Bixe Gear
during the next race in 2016. We are very satisfied with your product
and recommend its use in other two way facing rovers at the competition". 
     Tom
Frost, Project Leader of the 2015-2016 CCSU NASA Rover Challenge Team







"I
made an official visit to the pavilion dedicated to the Sport set up in Bastia
Umbra on the occasion of Expo Regalo and I discovered the BIXE Gear ! I was curious to try it and I have been impressed by the performance of the
mechanism".
        Giovanni
Malago, President of the Italian National Olympic Committee (CONI)

"It's
amazing the sense of well-being that I felt on trying the alternating pedaling
backwards and forwards, while maintaining a constant stroke frequency . I
recommend it to all professional and amateur cyclists".
                 Massimiliano Gentili, Professional Cyclist“The alternating
pedaling increases the strenght of the ciclyst with a lower wear of the
joints and a greater comfort for the joints districts involved, especially for
the knees and the ankles”.
           Giovanni Boni, Surgeon
Specialist in Medicine of the Medical Sport of the                    Italian off-road cycling team
at the LONDON OLYMPICS 2012.
                       Features &Technical specs


                                      







                                 


                                      Bixe at work 



     


We patented and manufactured the only bracket that lets you use your bike riding both forward and backwards. The front chainrings, that turn ever onward allow to you to use the gearshift and the derailleur, also pedaling backwards. The Bixe does not alter the structure or function of the bicycle itself. Conversely, it adds one more chance in its use because it allows to exploit different muscles , due to the effort reversal.


Imagine to have the possibility to go forward even pedaling backwards.
                                                   for sports & for fitness 
                                    
                                             for fun &  to everyday life

                               
                                        to discover the explorer within you

                              
                                     
                                       Bixe Perks 



                                          
                            Bixe Campaign Timeline   

                                      Bixe story 
                                                  Why  Bixe was created
We have loved bikes, since we were children, and we noticed that this simple and ingenious means, has maintained its basic structure  throughout its story. In fact the only changes have been made on the materials of the individual components. So, as we are constantly looking for ideas that have the potential to respond to the current people’s needs, we changed the concept of bicycle as we know it, and we moved beyond . How? Facing life from an 'alternate' perspective with the BIXE , the gear that has revolutionized the concept of cycling forever. It lets get gaining more energy and strenght out of this fantastic means !
                                                    How Bixe was born 
 First prototype :  the first objective of this prototype was to test “on  the road", the effect of pedaling both forward and backwars to understand if the idea could be really good and interesting
                
The evolution :  the mechanism is inserted in the bottom bracket. This prototype did  many kilometers and collected many consents . So we improved the system and reduced its size.           


                 

Final prototype : the mechanism has been reduced and provided with a mechanical release on the handlebar that allows to engage and disengage  the backwards pedaling,at will. Birth of the first gene X. 
                   


The patent :  the fully-developed pedaling system APS ( Advanced System pedaling ) has been patented.      

                  
                           
                              About Team Bixe 

Giovanni Pignatta (Chairman) graduated on Machine Maintenance Mechanic.He has a lot of experience in the construction of facilities for
special vehicles. He founded the Bixe Company looking for new opportunities in technology and mechanics branches. Francesca Coglitore (Ceo) specialized in accounting,
administration and custumer satisfaction, became a member of the
Bixe Company and she decided to get involved and to follow
the development of the innovative Bixegear. Alessio Mezzetti (Engineer) graduated in Mechanical Engineering, he has collaborated, as mechanical engineer,  with some famous companies. His great skills led him to join
the team Bixe as project engineer . Luca Comodi (Communication Manager) graduated
in Business Communication, he is taking care of the BIXE Communication. He’s an expert in communication and
marketing  for the online and offline media
communication campaigns. Barbara Passeri (Marketing Manager) graduated in Foreign  Languages ,  has worked in different fields dealing with foreigner
customers and suppliers . She's collaborating with  team
Bixe to strength the international marketing 

                    Why bixe needs your support 


We realized that despite the positive feedbacks about our product, to produce it in high enough volume and make it affordable to everyone, requires
capital. Moreover if we exceed the amount established as the goal, we might be able to finance the following pieces of our project:

Here we are our stretch goals:
                                     put in production the Bixe47 version 


The
mechanism is  provided with a mechanical release on the handlebar
which allows to switch off / switch on the backwards pedaling , meanwhile the traditional
pedaling forwards remains always active.




    
                                     developing bixe prototype for wheelchairs
The
idea was born listening to and living in contact with friends, who told us, that it's difficult to them overcoming even small levels in height and bumps by their
wheelchairs . In fact ,if you go backwards with a standard wheelchair to
overcome a little bump you risk to lose balance , unless there is someone to
help you. So we thought to design a bixe for them to make them free to go
safely and independently wherever they want.




                        Frequently asked Questions 
Does it come with a warranty? Yes,it comes with a legal warranty
Can I replace the parts of the bixe? Yes, you can order them contacting us by email at: info@bixeitalia.it
Will there be a network of  Bixe dealers? We hope to
have it, but we do not currently have a list of local distributors.
Comments and Questions? Feel free to contact us posting your comment here
or email us at: info@bixeitalia.it

Italiano

Bixegear: Resta in forma e divertiti! Il modo innovativo per allenarsi dimezzando la fatica 

                                     
                                      Cos'è il Bixe


L’innovazione del Bixegear sta nel concetto principale: pensare ad un modo alternativo per andare in bici. Abbiamo cambiato il modo di concepire il concetto di andare in bicicletta come lo conosciamo con la pedalata alternata. Il Bixegear permette di andare avanti anche pedalando all'indietro.
                                                       Cosa dicono di noi
“il Bixe Gear è stato un contributo essenziale per il nostro successo nella gara della passata edizione. Dopo aver riprogettato il nostro rover per la gara del 2015 volevamo,che la persona rivolta all’indietro fosse in grado di pedalare in qualunque modo volesse. Con il vostro Bixe Gear siamo stati in grado di realizzare proprio questo. Il pilota rivolto all’indietro ha avuto la possibilità di pedalare nel modo in cui voleva .Il Bixe Gear è stato un contributo essenziale per il nostro successo nella gara 2015 e perciò prevediamo di utilizzarlo sicuramente,anche durante la prossima CCSU NASA Rover Challenge nel 2016. Nel complesso, siamo molto soddisfatti del prodotto e ne consiglieremo l'uso nei rover da competizione che hanno i sedili rivolti uno di fronte all’altro”.
Tom Frost attuale Project Leader del team 2015-2016 CCSU NASA Rover Challenge


“Mi sono recato in visita ufficiale al padiglione dedicato allo Sport allestito a Bastia Umbra nell’ambito di Expo Regalo, ed ho scoperto Bixe Gear! L’ho provato con molta curiosità e sono rimasto favorevolmente colpito dalle prestazioni del meccanismo”
Giovanni Malagò, Presidente del Coni


“È incredibile la sensazione di benessere che si prova alternando la pedalata in avanti e indietro pur mantenendo costante la frequenza di corsa. Lo consiglio a tutti i ciclisti professionisti e dilettanti”.
Massimiliano Gentili, Ciclista Professionista
“Alternando la pedalata aumenta la resistenza del ciclista con una minore usura delle articolazioni e maggior benessere per i distretti articolari coinvolti, ginocchia e caviglie principalmente”.


Giovanni Boni, Medico Chirurgo Specialista in medicina dello sport Medico della nazionale italiana ciclismo fuoristrada OLIMPIADI LONDRA 2012.

                                             
                         Componenti e specifiche tecniche

                                




                                                               Bixe all’opera
      
Abbiamo brevettato e realizzato l’unico movimento centrale che permette di usare la bicicletta pedalando sia in avanti che indietro. Le corone anteriori ruotando sempre in avanti permettono di usare cambio e deragliatore anche pedalando indietro.
Il Bixe non altera né la struttura né le funzioni della bicicletta, ma aggiunge una possibilità in più nell’uso sfruttando muscoli diversi grazie all’inversione di sforzo.
Immagina di avere la possibilità di spingere all’indietro ed andare sempre avanti
                                                    Per lo sport & il fitness

                                      
                                        Per divertirsi nella vita di tutti i giorni
                                 
                                                  Per esplorare nuovi mondi


                                  
                                                                          
                                           Bixe Perks




            
                          Timeline Campagna Bixe



                                     Storia del Bixe
                                                  perché bixe è stato creato
La passione per la bicicletta, mezzo semplice e geniale, ci accompagna fin da bambini, e ci ha fatto notare che gli unici cambiamenti apportati, nel corso della sua storia, sono stati quelli sui materiali dei singoli componenti, mentre la struttura di base è rimasta la stessa. Dato che siamo costantemente alla ricerca di idee che abbiamo il potenziale per andare incontro ai desideri e alle esigenze delle persone , abbiamo pensato di guardare alla bicicletta in un’ottica diversa, cambiandone il concetto e andare oltre. Come ? Affrontando la vita da un’ottica alternata, con il Bixe: l’ingranaggio che ha rivoluzionato , per sempre il concetto di andare in bicicletta, ottenendo più energia e forza questo fantastico mezzo!
                                                       come è nato Bixe
Primo Prototipo: il primo obiettivo di questo prototipo è stato quello di testare su “strada” l’effetto di pedalare sia avanti che indietro per capire se l’idea poteva essere veramente valida e interessante.
           
L’evoluzione: Il meccanismo viene inserito nel movimento centrale. Questo prototipo ha percorso molti km e raccolto tanti consensi, che ci hanno stimolato a migliorare il sistema e ridurne le dimensioni.

                   
Prototipo finale: Il meccanismo viene ridotto e dotato di un sistema meccanico di sblocco al manubrio che permette di inserire e disinserire a piacimento la pedalata indietro. Nasce il primo gene X.

                        
Il brevetto: Il sistema di pedalata evoluto APS (Advanced Pedaling System) viene brevettato. 

                                 

                                                            

                                Il Team di Bixe

Giovanni Pignatta (Direttore) diplomato in Congegneria Meccanica ha acquisito una grande esperienza nella costruzione di componenti per veicoli speciali. Ha fondato l’azienda Bixe per cercare nuove opportunità nel settore tecnologico e in quello meccanico. Francesca Coglitore (CEO), specializzata nel ramo della contabilità, amministrazione e nel custumer satisfaction diventa socia della società Bixe, decidendosi di mettersi in gioco seguendo la nascita e lo sviluppo dell’innovativo meccanismo di pedalata Bixegear. Alessio Mezzetti (Ingnere) Laureatosi in Ingegneria meccanica , ha lavorato come ingegnere meccanico, collaborando con diverse aziende di successo .Le sue grandi competenze lo fanno entrare nel team Bixe come ingegnere del progetto.) Luca Comodi (Communication Manager) Laureato nella specialistica in Comunicazione d’Impresa segue la comunicazione Bixe. Esperto di comunicazione e marketing, sviluppa strategie e contenuti per campagne di comunicazione da indirizzare negli innovativi mezzi on-line e nei tradizionali mezzi off-line. Barbara Passeri (Marketing Manager ) Laureata in Lingue e Letterature straniere ha lavorato in diversi ambiti curando i rapporti con le istituzioni, clienti e fornitori esteri.Collabora con il team Bixe per rafforzare il marketing internazionale.

       Perché Bixe ha bisogno del Vostro sostegno
Nonostante i riscontri positivi che abbiamo avuto sul prodotto, ci siamo accorti che per avere una produzione tale per abbattere i costi e renderlo accessibile a tutti, occorre capitale. Inoltre se riuscissimo ad andare oltre la somma posta come obiettivo potremmo realizzare altre due componenti del nostro progetto:
                               mettere in produzione la versione Bixe47
Il meccanismo in oggetto e’ dotato di un sistema meccanico di sblocco al manubrio che permette di disinserire/inserire la pedalata indietro, la pedalata in avanti tradizionale rimane sempre attiva.

           Continuare nella prototipazione della versione Bixe per sedie a rotelle
L’idea ci è venuta ascoltando e stando in contatto con amici che ci hanno spiegato le difficoltà che incontrano con le attuali sedie a rotelle nel superare piccolo dossi o scalini. Infatti nel mandare le ruote all’indietro per superare anche il minimo ostacolo, rischiano di perdere l’equilibrio , a meno che non ci sia qualcuno che li accompagni. E’ per questo che abbiamo pensato di progettare un Bixe apposito, per renderli autonomi e liberi di andare in sicurezza dove vogliono.



                           Domande Frequenti
Ha una garanzia? Sì, garanzia di legge
Esistono ricambi del Bixe? Sì, è possibile averli contattandoci a questo indirizzo: info@bixeitalia.it
Avete una rete di rivenditori autorizzati? No, speriamo in futuro di poterne avere una
Commenti e domande? Contattateci liberamente postando i commenti qui o per email a : info@bixeitalia.it

story:
Short Summary

Do you feel powerless or helpless when it comes to modern healthcare?  Are you tired of conflicting information in the media about what is good for you and what isn’t?  Here at the Integrative Health Consulting Group (IHCG), we truly care about the wellbeing of the client and not only do we want to help our clients with whatever ails them, we want to take the time to empower them through education as well.  Unfortunately the population today is forced into a healthcare system that uses a “cookie cutter” treatment for the symptoms someone presents which is rarely the root of what the issue really is.  We not only want to treat the individual and help them with their pain but to spend time with them and truly understand the patient and their needs.  Modern medicine has become an institution of mass producing “treatments” for diseases.  At IHCG we take the time to look at the person as a whole; mind, body and soul.  There is no “one size fits all” when it comes to treating a person regardless of what modern allopathic medicine tells us.  Taking the time to build a relationship with the patient and treat the root of the problem is paramount and what we think is the future of medicine should be.

Our group here at IHCG consists of different individuals from a myriad of backgrounds (nursing, acupuncture, nutritional health coaching, etc) and we all came together to change the face of healthcare forever.  Help us “Revolutionize Your Health!” 

UPDATE 10/20/2014:

Donate a dollar!  That’s right a dollar, one single compilation of one hundred cents, four quarters, twenty nickels or even just ten dimes.  You see we think we’ve been going about this fundraiser all wrong.  We’ve been asking people to donate lots of money but let’s be realistic; in this day and age NO ONE has a lot of money.  SO… Who wouldn’t donate a dollar to see more health education getting to the people that need it?  Who wouldn’t donate just a dollar to see people being taken care of without the use of pharmaceutical drugs?  Who wouldn’t donate just a dollar instead of drinking that soda, eating that bag of chips or grabbing that candy bar?  That’s right, we’re asking that instead of purchasing something that is potentially harmful to your body that you instead just donate ONE DOLLAR to the IHCG fundraising campaign.  Help us help you :) Join the IHCG Dollar revolution today!

What We Need & What You Get

Revolutions need funding and that is what we need from you. Our minimum goal is $20,000 which will allow us to start several educational programs and treatment venues in the area. We are also planning to donate part of our funds to the Juvenile Diabetes Research Foundation here in Arizona.  This is a grassroots effort to change the face of healthcare for years to come.

For our top donators we are holding a Referral Contest! 

The way this works is simple: when you donate to our cause, the Indiegogo website tracks your donation, as well as any referrals that you send to our cause that donates too. In order for that to work, you need to be signed into your Indiegogo account and utilize its share tools on any social media network you utilize. The top donators (combined personal donations and donations from referrals) at the end of our campaign will win special perk prizes. In essence, the person who may win the grand prize may not donate the most personally, but may be the person who collects the largest grand total of funds from just the people they refer to our cause! So in the end, our cause wins and so do you!

For the top donation (whoever donates the most overall funds $5000 or more) in this fundraiser we are going to award the beautifully framed, “An Act of Compassion,” from critically acclaimed artist Don Stivers.  This is a rare Artist Proof that shows the deep meaning behind the human condition and capability of our compassion to one another even during times of extreme conflict.

For the top 10 runners up, we are offering the option of receiving 10 packages with 5 certificates to each of the services we currently have (Tuina, HeartMath, Integrative nutrition health coaching, cranial sacral therapy, and reiki). These packages are completely voluntary and if you want to donate just to part of the revolution without these perks, please let us know! Keep in mind that you need to be in the Tucson area to use these certificates (as they are services), and they also make great gifts!

Each and everyone that collects combined contributions of $20 and up, as a thank you from us, will be listed on our website. Each donation we receive is important to us and by donating you are making the statement that you are part of this healthcare revolution!

The Impact

Revolutions are not easy, as change can be a challenge. Healthcare as it stands can be as sick as the patients that are seeking treatment. We can do better, and we want to help educate everyone in being better with their health in very real ways. It starts with prevention and education and ends with better health outcomes for those who are willing to change.  By affecting the surrounding community we hope to create a grass roots movement of cohesive alternative medicine that changes the landscape of medicine as we know it.  If more and more people take responsibility for their health the landscape of western medicine will have no choice but to recognize and work with, instead of against, non-traditional modalities of medicine that have been proven to work for thousands of years.

Risks & Challenges

Change is hard and the changes we are aiming for may be slow. The real risk is that what we are attempting may not go far enough, and this is why we need all the extra funds and word of mouth we can obtain to overcome this challenge. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot contribute funds, you can still help our cause by getting the word out.  Simply posting the fundraising information on Twitter, liking and sharing IHCG on Facebook, or sharing us on any of the social networks you utilize. Word of mouth helps too!  Remember that you can still have a chance to win perk prizes by using your share tools on your Indiegogo account and social media sites by raising funds through referrals too! Send the Indiegogo link to all your friends, family or coworkers.  If you want to be part of the Revolution, now is the time, this is the place and we want you to join us!

Check out our blog to read our IHCG member stories at the IHCG Blog!!!
You can also find us and learn more about us on the IHCG Website, Facebook, Twitter, YouTube, Google+, and Linkin!

These packages are completely voluntary and if you want to donate just to part of the revolution without these perks, please let us know! Keep in mind that you need to be in the Tucson area to use these certificates (as they are services), and they also make great gifts!Each and everyone that collects combined contributions of $20 and up, as a thank you from us, will be listed on our website. Each donation we receive is important to us and by donating you are making the statement that you are part of this healthcare revolution!
The Impact
Revolutions are not
easy, as change can be a challenge. Healthcare as it stands can be as sick as
the patients that are seeking treatment. We can do better, and we want to help educate
everyone in being better with their health in very real ways. It starts with
prevention and education and ends with better health outcomes for those who are
willing to change.  By affecting the
surrounding community we hope to create a grass roots movement of cohesive
alternative medicine that changes the landscape of medicine as we know it.  If more and more people take responsibility
for their health the landscape of western medicine will have no choice but to
recognize and work with, instead of against, non-traditional modalities of
medicine that have been proven to work for thousands of years.

Risks & Challenges
Change is hard and
the changes we are aiming for may be slow. The real risk is that what we are
attempting may not go far enough, and this is why we need all the extra funds
and word of mouth we can obtain to overcome this challenge. 
Other Ways You Can Help
If
you cannot contribute funds, you can still help our cause by getting the word
out.  Simply posting the fundraising information
on Twitter, liking and sharing IHCG on Facebook, or sharing us on any of the social networks you utilize. Word of mouth helps too!  Remember that you can still have a chance to win perk prizes by using your share tools on your Indiegogo account and social media sites by raising funds through referrals too! Send the Indiegogo link to all your friends,
family or coworkers.  If you want to be
part of the Revolution, now is the time, this is the place and we want you
to join us!
Check out our blog to read our IHCG member stories at the IHCG Blog!!!You can also find us and learn more about us on the IHCG Website, Facebook, Twitter, YouTube, Google+, and Linkin!

story:
The Ebola Pandemic is spreading. Impacting countries such as Liberia and Sierra Leone, the virus is affecting thousands of children. 

What's our goal?

Our goal, as Rutgers University students, is to supply the children  of Liberia and Sierra Leone with safe, drinkable water.

How can YOU help?
Your generous donation will help distribute portable water purifiers in the form of straws. These straws, produced by Water is Life, can be used in any water source to create drinkable water. They can make a huge difference in a child's life and can be the distinction between life and death. 



Your contribution will provide: 

$10 = 1 straw

1 straw = 1,000 liters

1,000 liters of water = 4,000 cups of clean water

Who are we?

We are a group of students from Rutgers University who wish to instill a hope for those affected by the Ebola crisis. Our main goal is to not only gather proper funds for a passionate purpose, but also to direct the full amount of raised funds to a cause.


Please Don't Hesitate to Contact Us at:

byrneseminar18@gmail.com

story:
OK, guys as some of may know I'm Melanie, i'm started my transition at 18 and I'm now 22, I've been the British army's trans rep for almost 3 years and helped various people start and go through this life process, yet I can't shake my Insomnia, or being depressed over the fact i'm not moving forward......

This fundraiser is for my chest surgery which costs around £4000, this is the option I feel safest with, all excess money will go to a friend of mine's chest surgery also, as i'm hoping to get most of this saved up this is a boost if you like to help me reach that goal a bit quicker.

I don't want to come across as begging in this instance however I am desperate to move on and leave my transition in the past. I do not wish to be stuck in limbo forever, I'm going to try save along side this fundraiser, i'm quite happy to return everyone's money afterwards aswell I just really want finish this up quickly.

I'm currently looking into to doing a few sponsored runs which of course donations from that will be going to charity. But every little helps bring the end goal slightly closer in sight :)

I'll offering my services in whatever capacity i can be of help with to those whose donate anything upwards of £50, you want a hand with electrical stuff, you want some help with your housework or anything i don't know.

if i can do it i will. name it :)

Here's looking at the little victories and having some absolutely awesome friends.

Over the years, I've met so many amazing people who have inspired me and shaped me to be who i am today and most of you are sat right in friends list, I'm honoured and privileged to call you people friends, for that i am thankful

Please donate what you can and if you would like it back afterwards let me know ,it may take some but I'll do my darnedest to see no one unhappy with any decisions they make on this page

Thanks guys share it around if you don't mind please :)

story:
Summary

Hurricane Sandy devastated New Jersey's coach and Hoboken was no exception.  Thousands of Hoboken residents were stranded in their homes without electricity, heat, and food.  The Hoboken Volunteer Ambulance Corps had the unfortunate loss of 2 of their 3 ambulances, their Communications Truck and their Disaster Relief Truck.  Needless to say this loss had a huge effect on coming to the rescue of residents stuck in Hoboken.  

Hoboken to the Rescue is looking to help the Volunteers raise money to fund the rebuilding of their vehicles.  Help bring Hoboken's rescue squad back on the streets and saving lives.

Visit the Ambulance Corps website: http://www.hobokenems.com/

Funding

Who: Hoboken Volunteer Ambulance Corp

What: We are looking to raise $1,000 towards funding for new ambulances and rescue vehicles.  

Where: Hoboken Volunteer Ambulance Corps, PO Box 1368, Hoboken, NJ 07030

These donations are key in helping the Volunteer Ambulance Corps rebuild their rescue vehicle squad.  Although they have insurance, it does not cover anywhere near the amount needed to recover the lost ambulances.  A stretcher alone costs $10,000.  With your help, we are a step closer to achieving their goal and helping rebuild Hoboken.

What's in it for you?

By pledging just $10 you will receive a Hoboken Ambulance t-shirt to show your support.  You will also get the privilege to know you helped bring this small town just one step closer to becoming fully recovered.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, that doesn’t mean they can’t help!  You can still spread the word about our campaign and share the Indiegogo link with then. Encourage your friends and family to make a donation or just get out and help!

Hoboken is continuously looking for volunteers to help at local food banks or soliciting for canned goods.  Visit http://www.njfoodbank.org/blog/news/5367/hurricane-sandy-relief to see what you can do to help!

story:
Our Founder's Story

"I started Fitly after experiencing what harm obesity inflicted on my family. I witnessed my father suffer through a triple bypass surgery--a life saving procedure often prompted by clogged arteries associated with high cholesterol. During this time, my brother had become overweight as well and two of my nephews were becoming at risk from exposure to unhealthy foods.

I remember going over to my brother's house for movie night with my nephews one Friday evening, and before and during the film, my nephews asked my brother for snacks. His pantry was filled with cookies, waffles, syrup, chips, salsa, and an entire assortment of processed foods entirely too long to list. I remember feeling genuinely angered by this and concerned about my nephews' health. Seeing what poor eating habits did to my father, I wanted to help my nephews avoid the long term effects of their routine by getting in front of childhood obesity.

Being an entrepreneur who loves to solve problems, I started thinking of ways to solve this one--and that's when a light bulb went off! I needed to find a way to promote healthy eating by starting at the root of learned habits--the home. As founder + CEO of Fitly® , I made it my goal to help families eat healthier and with my Fitly Family we are devoted to making eating healthy simple for families, convenient for parents, and never ending fun for kids!"

-Anthony Ortiz, @fitlyfamily

 

FACT: Over the past three decades, childhood obesity rates in America have tripled

FACT: Today, nearly one in three children in America are overweight or obese.

FACT: In the US, families spend over 200 billion dollars on grocery related food items.

FACT: Over 50% of that is spent on unhealthy & processed foods that are driving the prevalence of obesity-related diseases and healthcare costs through the roof.

FACT: If we don't solve this problem, one third of all children born in 2000 or later will suffer from diabetes at some point in their lives. Many others will face chronic obesity-related health problems like heart disease, high blood pressure, cancer, and asthma.

As parents, we know that planning healthy meals is time-consuming, shopping at multiple grocery stores is inconvenient, and getting your family to eat healthy isn’t as easy as it sounds! We aim to change that.

How? Get healthy meals delivered weekly!

Fitly and our team of registered dietitians will come up with the recipes, make a list of the required ingredients, and prepare easy-to-follow instructions that all will be delivered to a convenient pick-up location near you.

An example of one of our family-friendly lunch recipes:

Check out our website at www.fitly.org and the infographic below for more information!

The Future: Our Vision

With your contribution today, you'll allow us to let Fitly help your family tackle healthy eating in even more engaging ways. 

Fitly Challenge: Who can make (and stick!) to the healthiest food choices? Compete against other families our set your own family goals to win points that turn into prizes! Our meals will display the amount of points your kids receive for helping with cooking and eating their meal. Prizes might include anything from gift cards, iPads, game consoles to family vacations!

Nutritional Wellness Platform™: An analytics system that will provide you with detailed and easy-to-understand information about your family's eating habits, which will allow us to provide more personalized meal plans and nutrional education.

Fitly's Funding Goals

Reaching $25,000 will allow us to 1. finish our test program and allow us to perfect our system, and 2. complete the development of the meal planning program described above and launch it nationally, giving you access to healthy kid-friendly meals, detailed shopping lists, and prepping instructions.

Raising $50,000 will allow us to do all of the above as well as 1. increase the number of places to which we deliver meals, 2. launch a mobile phone application so that you can have healthy meals with you anywhere at any time, and 3. build out our Nutritional Wellness Platform™.

Reaching $100,000 will allow us to do all of the above as well as develop Fitly Challenges, creating even greater incentives for your family to eat right!

 

Help us help you!

FAQs

What is Fitly?

Fitly is an online meal planning service through which parents can choose from a variety of USDA’s My Plate and Harvard’s Healthy Eating Plate approved meals. Fitly provides families with a free and convenient delivery service of healthy ingredients and meal prepping instructions to convenient pick-up locations like workplaces, schools, and recreation centers in your neighborhood.

 

Why Fitly?

With Fitly, making a healthy dinner for your family will no longer be a struggle. We provide you with recipes, ingredients and directions that make cooking a nutritious meal simple and stress-free. By taking out the guesswork and aggravation that parents associate with meal planning, Fitly strives to keep kids engaged and motivated to eat well.

 

How do I use Fitly?

Using Fitly is very simple. Once you register at fitly.org, you can choose from our current dinner options, and have them delivered to a convenient pick-up location once Fitly Delivery is available in your zip code. If Fitly Delivery is not in your area yet, you can digitally receive our full meal plan: an itemized grocery list, recipes and meal preparation instructions. When Fitly is operating in your area, you will be the first to know!

 

How is Fitly fun?

In addition to the pleasure that will come along with making dinner, Fitly will be offering weekly competitions and prizes that reward kids for making healthy choices.

 

What are the health benefits?

All of Fitly’s meals are USDA’s My Plate and Harvard’s Healthy Eating Plate approved. We include nutrition facts for each meal.

 

Where can I pick up my groceries?

You can pick up your healthy ingredients and meal-prepping instructions at convenient pick-up locations like workplaces, schools, and recreation centers in your neighborhood. At check-out, you will be asked to choose your delivery site.

 

What's the cost? 

For a family of 4 using Fitly delivery for 5 dinners per week, the cost will be as little as $100 per week or $6 per person per meal (even dad)! Without the food delivery, our meal planner will cost $5 per month and includes, weekly recipes, fun prepping instructions, a detailed shopping list, and nutritional information. 

 

Risks and challenges

If we do not fulfill our goal of $25,000, we will not be able to complete our 5 month pilot program. We need your help to make this successful!

story:
中文說明：http://www.bomdic.com

“With Iron Man’s blue light, Heartwave leads marathon runners and cyclists to success.”  -Lance, bnext.com.tw

“A new perspective to tele-healthcare application.”  -Kate, POiNT Magazine

“Users can adjust their body states at any time, and avoid risks of excessive exercising.”  -Atticus, cool3c.com

Why?

"When I learned I had Arrhythmia and that exercising was its best cure, I became devoted to combining heart wave technology with exercise training. This is how HeartWave came into being."     -Scott Cheng, Co-founder

When cycling or running, mounting slopes and surpassing others require sudden energy bursts. By being able to calculate lactic-acid accumulations through heart wave documentations, our HeartWave sensor accurately and interestingly captures and predicts moments of surging adrenaline, racing hearts, and burning muscles. Mastering lactic-acid accumulations also prolongs exercise trainings by avoiding energy exhaustion.

 

What is HeartWave?

HeartWave is your personal & portable body energy monitor!

When your heart beats, it sends out small electric signals. HeartWave captures these signals to document cardiovascular activities during exercise.

In the past, only heavy machines in labs or hospitals could do this. Now with HeartWave, which weighs only 20 grams and models after Iron Man, you can easily access your complete heart wave signals! These signals, collected on the NeedForWave App displays your WaveNitro alongside your racing information.

 

WaveNitro is your Body Nitro!

Our inspiration for WaveNitro derives from the famous video game Need For Speed.
In the game, players utilizes their nitro to blow by opponents or to surge past the finish line and win.
As the trademark of our NeedForWave App, WaveNitro similarly calculates body energies through lactic-acid accumulations to suggest recommended acceleration and deceleration timings. When your body’s lactic-acid accumulates, WaveNitro drops. When you slow down your pace, lactic-acid levels drop as your WaveNitro indicator recharges.

WaveNitro system serves as your personal interval training coach. By conducting interval training, you will be able to go faster, go longer, and burn fat more quickly.

Using WaveNitro makes exercise more effective and entertaining!

 

Features

 

We Need You!

After a year of testing and modifying, we have finalized the design of our sensor and App. What follows includes engineering pilot run, production pilot run, mass production, as well as App reliability tests.

Here's where you come in.

Help us fund through our Indiegogo exclusive offers below, in return you can score your very own HeartWave for a heavily discounted price. Your support will not only help raise sufficient funding to launch our product but also boost our confidence to continue pursuing our project goals.

Also for a one-time-only special, you can become the unique voice of our WaveNitro system! At moments when WaveNitro initiates and terminates, your voice will replace the default sound indicator and speak to all our App users around the globe!



 

Where we are & What’s next?

 

 

 

Charging WaveNitro T-shirt

When people in front of you turn back, they see that you are charging; when you blow by opponents they see your Nitro burning.

 

Our favorite iPhone Cover + Bike Mount

During our NeedForWave App developing stage, we experimented with various bike mounts but could not find one which satisfied the following needs:

1. Easy to take calls, where the iPhone could be removed from the bike mount within 3 seconds.
2. Easy to carry around, without having to switch iPhone covers or adding to the thickness and/or weight.
3. Easy to recharge the iPhone during cycling with a safe and secure charging connector.

As a result, our friend, Digirit, customized the iPhone Grip+ for us!

iPhone Grip+ includes an iPhone (4s or 5) cover and bike mount base.

With our sleek and slim iPhone cover, you can conveniently carry around your iPhone in your pocket like any other cover or case. When cycling, the product firmly attaches to the bike mount base and enables cyclists to pick up the phone within 3 seconds. The design of the bike mount base also includes a slot to hold iPhone’s charging cable to prevent cable tangling accidents.
iPhone Grip+ is the most recommended iPhone Bike Mount!

 

**HeartWave Hacker

If you’re a fan of body signals, we can provide you with a SDK (software development kit) to develop your own Heartwave applications. This SDK includes C#’s and MATLAB’s APIs. With our SDK, you will be able to read and analyze your original heart waves. You may also translate your heart wave signals into midi recordings!

 

 

 

 

Note:

- All HeartWave sensors come with one chest-belt and one battery charger.

- All perks come with FREE SHIPPING worldwide.

- Coupons can be used for any purchases made on bomdic.com. Limit one coupon per checkout.

- Please visit the gallery photos for more detailed viewings of perks.

- Please note that actual designs and specifications of the end products may be subject to change slightly if deemed necessary.

 

 

 

 


 

Meet the team

bOMDIC Inc. is founded by a team of specialists with years of medical equipment expertise devoted to developing medically sporty products. Located at the heart of Hsinchu Science and Industrial Park, our company unites talented professionals from fields of semiconductor, wireless communication, computer science, and medical backgrounds. We also collaborate with neighboring universities to sharpen theoretical essentials and advance developmental capacities.
Elevating your exercising experience is our launching mission!

 

Limitations

HeartWave sensor is designed for cardio exercise evaluations. The device is not recommended for medical use nor suitable for children under 3 due to small parts.

 

Acknowledgements

By collaborating with Echowell, who has over twenty years of experience in cyclist product developments, we have had the chance to realize our HeartWave sensor. We also thank Podinx for their efforts in developing our NeedForWave App.

Last by not least, we thank you for helping us!

 

FAQ

1. Android is not yet supported.

For this project, we have focused our resources on developing iPhone platforms. We hope your funding will aid us to develop our product for various Android cell phones in the near future.


2. What Happens If I Fall Short of My Goal?

We thank you for your support. With sufficient funding, we will be able to ease financial burdens and speed up production processes. We believe Heartwave promises a defining milestone advancing exercise experiences with physiological sensors. We will do our best to overcome production delays resulting from funding shortage, and provide you with your Heartwave sensor as anticipated.

When your body’s lactic-acid accumulates, WaveNitro drops. When you slow down your pace, lactic-acid levels drop as your WaveNitro indicator recharges.


WaveNitro system serves as your personal interval training coach. By conducting interval training, you will be able to go faster, go longer, and burn fat more quickly.

Using WaveNitro makes exercise more effective and entertaining!
 


Features


 


We Need You!
After a year of testing and modifying, we have finalized the design of our sensor and App. What follows includes engineering pilot run, production pilot run, mass production, as well as App reliability tests.  Here's where you come in. Help us fund through our Indiegogo exclusive offers below, in return you can score your very own HeartWave for a heavily discounted price. Your support will not only help raise sufficient funding to launch our product but also boost our confidence to continue pursuing our project goals. Also for a one-time-only special, you can become the unique voice of our WaveNitro system! At moments when WaveNitro initiates and terminates, your voice will replace the default sound indicator and speak to all our App users around the globe!
 
Where we are & What’s next?

 


 
 
Charging WaveNitro  T-shirt
When people in front of you turn back, they see that you are charging; when you blow by opponents they see your Nitro burning.

 
Our favorite iPhone Cover + Bike Mount
During our NeedForWave App developing stage, we experimented with various bike mounts but could not find one which satisfied the following needs:
1. Easy to take calls, where the iPhone could be removed from the bike mount within 3 seconds.2. Easy to carry around, without having to switch iPhone covers or adding to the thickness and/or weight.3. Easy to recharge the iPhone during cycling with a safe and secure charging connector.
As a result, our friend, Digirit, customized the iPhone Grip+ for us!
iPhone Grip+ includes an iPhone (4s or 5) cover and bike mount base. 
With our sleek and slim iPhone cover, you can conveniently carry around your iPhone in your pocket like any other cover or case. When cycling, the product firmly attaches to the bike mount base and enables cyclists to pick up the phone within 3 seconds. The design of the bike mount base also includes a slot to hold iPhone’s charging cable to prevent cable tangling accidents. iPhone Grip+ is the most recommended iPhone Bike Mount!
 
**HeartWave Hacker
If you’re a fan of body signals, we can provide you with a SDK (software development kit) to develop your own Heartwave applications. This SDK includes C#’s and MATLAB’s APIs. With our SDK, you will be able to read and analyze your original heart waves. You may also translate your heart wave signals into midi recordings!

 
 
 
 
Note:
- All HeartWave sensors come with one chest-belt and one battery charger.
- All perks come with FREE SHIPPING worldwide.
- Coupons can be used for any purchases made on bomdic.com. Limit one coupon per checkout.
- Please visit the gallery photos for more detailed viewings of perks.
- Please note that actual designs and specifications of the end products may be subject to change slightly if deemed necessary.
 
 
 
 
 
Meet the team

bOMDIC Inc. is founded by a team of specialists with years of medical equipment expertise devoted to developing medically sporty products. Located at the heart of Hsinchu Science and Industrial Park, our company unites talented professionals from fields of semiconductor, wireless communication, computer science, and medical backgrounds. We also collaborate with neighboring universities to sharpen theoretical essentials and advance developmental capacities. Elevating your exercising experience is our launching mission!
 
Limitations
HeartWave sensor is designed for cardio exercise evaluations. The device is not recommended for medical use nor suitable for children under 3 due to small parts.
 
Acknowledgements
By collaborating with Echowell, who has over twenty years of experience in cyclist product developments, we have had the chance to realize our HeartWave sensor. We also thank Podinx for their efforts in developing our NeedForWave App. Last by not least, we thank you for helping us!
 
FAQ
1. Android is not yet supported.
For this project, we have focused our resources on developing iPhone platforms. We hope your funding will aid us to develop our product for various Android cell phones in the near future.
2. What Happens If I Fall Short of My Goal?
We thank you for your support. With sufficient funding, we will be able to ease financial burdens and speed up production processes. We believe Heartwave promises a defining milestone advancing exercise experiences with physiological sensors. We will do our best to overcome production delays resulting from funding shortage, and provide you with your Heartwave sensor as anticipated.

story:
At The Salad Spot, our customers can build their own custom salads themselves by walking around and choosing from over 75 foods from our 24-foot Salad Bar. We'll have a fantastic Hot Bar with wholesome, nourishing foods based on family recipes.

Jayne: I had a former career in government trying to make every day life simpler and better for us all!  Then I retired early and met Joe online -- we hit it off and fell in love on the phone!  I moved from Philadelphia to Florida and we lived in Delray Beach with our two little dogs!  

Joe:  I am a mechanical engineer by trade and built my first house at 17! I enjoy working with my hands and have built and renovated many houses. I am building our new restaurant myself with some help from required sub-contractors.

We have been active all our lives and just couldn't retire in Florida! Jayne enjoys cooking and Joe is a construction expert. We both love fresh, healthy food and we love being around people. So we decided to move to the East Bay where Joe lived for 30 years.  And our dream of building The Salad Spot was born!

The Salad Spot won't be your typical salad place where you order a salad from a menu with limited options. We will have a 25 foot salad bar where you can make endless salads the way YOU want!  We'll also have a great Hot Bar with rotisserie chicken and turkey breast (my own secret seasonings!), meatballs (my mom's recipe!), Turkey Chili, and lots of fresh, healthy hot foods. And my home-made soups will take the chill out of our San Francisco weather!

The Salad Spot will be located in the outdoor courtyard at Rincon Center in the heart of the Financial District.

Financials:  Here's what your donation will go to:

Floor installation, Electrical work, Plumbing, Lighting

Giving Back:  We feel it is extremely important to give back to the community.  We will partner with the local San Francisco community in the following ways:

1.  We'll source our fresh vegetables regionally to support northern California growers. Some of these include: 

Greenleaf Produce:  http://www.greenleafsf.com/

Earl's Organic:  http://www.earlsorganic.com/

Washington Vegetable:  http://www.washingtonvegetable.com/default.html

2. As our restaurant will have only fresh food, we'll be donating daily to a local charity, Glide Memorial Church:  http://www.glide.org/

3. We'll be creating 12-14 well-paying jobs for typically underpaid minority workers. We'll also be hiring graduates from Delancy Street Foundation:  http://www.delanceystreetfoundation.org/enterre...

We'll help our employees' families by paying a living wage. 

We are among the last of the Mom & Pop, community-oriented restaurants!  You have our heart-felt gratitude in advance for your donation!

Here is our website:  http://saladspot.net

story:
This is not just a new innovation, but an Australian Designed brilliant new and unique invention, that turns uncomfortable transit seating into a Gold Class experience and makes you comfortable wherever you are. When your finished using it, just fold it up and put it in your pocket.

The product is the first and only one of its kind, covered by a world wide patent, light weight and compact (fits in your pocket).

*  Provides support for head, neck, back, chin, and feet
*  Relieves stress on the neck - neck pain is the number 3 cause of chronic pain
* Relieves stress on the lower back
* Allows you to relax wherever you are

MISSION

To offer an affordable and luxurious feeling product that brings instant portable comfort to anyone who sits for long periods of time. The Airport Armchair provides first class rest to those in need, whether in airports, planes, trains, cars, hospitals, waiting rooms, sitting at your desk/computer etc. When you've finished using it, fold it up and put it in your pocket

BRAND STORY

The Airport Armchair was an invention that came about when an Australian businessman, David Alexander went abroad on several long haul flights for a vacation. It was then that airport lounges and the discomfort of Economy class seats, together with unexpected delays took their toll.

The divide between 1st Class and Economy when traveling at your own expense seemed vast.

David spent the mile hours pondering how to bridge the gap between 1st and cattle class for the ordinary traveler.

Upon returning from his round the world adventure, David who is a hobby guitarist, rocked up to his weekly band practice... tired and sore.

Band colleague Rod Perry, a renowned inventor and industrial designer related to David's stories of uncomfortable travel, backache and that cattle class feeling. Together they invented the comfortable, innovative, portable, and affordably luxurious....

'Airport Armchair. The REST is easy'

This project has 2 years sweat equity behind it and your pledge and support will help make this Aussie dream a successful company, allowing us to provide traveling comfort to the world.

THE FUNDING


Though we have big ambitions, we are a small company and only have the capacity to finance modest production runs and limited marketing.   

This is where you come in.  You can help us to increase the amount of product we can order from the factory as well as accelerate the speed with which we can get it to our customers. Your support will make this possible and will be a vital spark in growing a company obsessed with creating innovative and USEFUL products.
