story:
STUMP ARMOUR 

To keep taking donations and orders for now we're starting part 2.  Our first campaign was a success and raised $5546, enough to give away 7 pairs of Stump Armour.  Please share and keep this going.

BACK US WITH ANY AMOUNT HERE

PURCHASE STUMP ARMOUR HERE:  WWW.STUMPARMOUR.COM

For regular Stump Armour purchases email info@StumpArmour.com

----------------------------

As a double above knee amputee, Travis witnessed a gap in currently mobility solutions. As a Marine & inventor, he's committed to ensuring that every bilateral amputee has access to Stump Armour: an affordable, durable device that can open up more mobility possibilities for amputees and hence improve the their quality of life.  

Featured by re3D covering the manufacturing process:  

https://re3d.org/made-in-america-3d-printing-pr...

Stump Armour is a working foot 100% made in America.  Designed specifically for bilateral above knee amputees to maximize their mobility close to the ground, it was originally designed for performing mechanic work.  There has been some interest by single amputees, some for climbing.  The device minimizes effort to stand up from any position, to move short distances, reach items on the ground, lift heavy objects, or simply work out.  In some cases it significantly reduces strain on the lower back. 

SITE VISITORS: WE JUST NEED EVERYONE THAT VISITS THE SITE TO GIVE A BUCK.  Had over 4800 visits on the first campaign.  We'll be able to give away lots more feet if everyone just puts in a buck.  

Why we need your help: to keep costs low we need $10,000 to pay off a loan for the first production run and have enough left to do a 2nd run, minimum of 25 pairs. Less than 25 in a run costs more.  

All contributions will go towards purchasing Stump Armour for amputees that need it.  

With your help we can empower amputees and improve their quality of life.

A minimum of 10% of profits will be donated to non-profit organizations that have helped this project to include the Gary Sinise Foundation and 100 Entrepreneurs Project after we meet 10K between both campaigns. 

Development

This was created by a combat wounded Marine with bilateral trans-femoral (above knee, AK) amputations.  The development of this foot began while trying to find a better way to do mechanical work on the ground after injury. Every prosthetic foot/leg that he had impeded mobility under a vehicle and they had to be removed when working. It was decided that a round foot was necessary that would allow walking as close as possible to the ground, on the nubs, make getting up and down as effortless as possible while reducing the chance of getting hung up.  This maximizes mobility while reducing stress on the back.  Often children born without legs or children that received amputations when young are able to walk on their nubs, it is unusual for adults that become amputees to be able to do the same.  

How it works

The round design allows for constant ground contact from any position.  Pressure can then be directly applied to the ground without changing position and the amputee can roll up on the round sides.  Since the round shape can grab from nearly any position, it works great on uneven/irregular surfaces and the amputee doesn’t need to focus as much on placement.  If placement is a little off a different part of the foot grabs.  

This device is not intended to replace full leg or knee prosthetics. It’s meant to increase functionality with specific tasks and provide another option for those who have difficulty using other prosthetics.  

TASKS DONE IN THE VIDEOS MAY NOT SEEM LIKE MUCH BUT THEY ARE DIFFICULT TO DO IN FULL LEG PROSTHETHESIS. OTHER OPTIONS INCLUDE SCOOTING ON YOUR REAR.

Check out more videos on youtube:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCsObkfi6W6x2B6dpZ89_CGg

From the creator:

Vision:

I found a solution to a problem I had and I wanted to make it available for others.  As far as cost it is comparatively lower than other options and is durable with no moving parts.  It doesn’t need replacing or repair except for tread, as necessary, so life time cost is extremely low versus any prosthetic device with moving parts.  

Stump Armour has now been utilized  in a myriad of tasks to include climbing ladders, climbing/descending steep and rocky trails, changing tires, traversing loose soil on construction sites, forward/backward rolls, flipping logs, climbing piles of lumber, scaling framing in a construction site, and we are always exploring more uses of this multipurpose foot design.

Purpose: 

This is intended to empower other amputees like myself to be more independent with certain tasks and open up more work options.  An amputee in my position in a developing country often do not have many options for work to earn a living.  With Stump Armour, and future projects along the same concept, some amputees may have more fulfilling lives.  

What we need and what you get:

As said before we are looking for $10,000 in sales.

We are selling the first production run of 25 stainless steel pairs funded on a loan from Liftfund.  All prices are introductory. These are already in production scheduled to be ready for shipping in July 2016.   The more money we make the more people we can help. We’re hoping companies will purchase Stump Armour so they can be given away to amputees.  We will display their logo as a sponsor and how many pairs they contributed.   All cash contributions will also go towards purchasing pairs of Stump Armour for those on the waiting list. (for an amputee to be added to list for free Stump Armour email info@stumparmour.com ) 

Costs have gone up more than expected but we are striving to keep costs low so individuals with little or no insurance coverage will be able to afford to purchase Stump Armour themselves. There will be special pricing for amputees purchasing Stump Armour on their own when no free pairs are available.  

We are making a small profit on each pair sold.  Left over profit will go towards purchasing equipment and tools for future developments and production runs. 

When enough are sold more people will be hired, creating jobs, to get the devices manufactured and out more quickly.  We primarily hire Veterans.  Employees will raise costs but also free up time for new developments. 

Promotional Perks:

Printed dog tags with Stump Armour logo (image coming soon) and a cardboard coaster or 2. BUY NOW

Example:

Stone Coaster with Stump Armour logo, dog tag included.  Image coming soon.

BUY NOW

Example:

Dog tags and coasters will be made here: http://corpsvaluables.com/ a SDVOB.

Aluminium and bronze mini Stump Armour.  Used as a bottle opener, coaster, paper weight, pencil holder, or anything you can think of. BUY ALUM  BUY BRONZE

You can also purchase Stump Armour so they can be given away.  We will list your company's logo and how many pairs were purchased on our web page and the Indiegogo page.  BUY NOW

The Impact

Worldwide over 1 million amputations are performed yearly.  There are not a lot of prosthetic options for some of them.  A small percentage of the US amputee population will be able to use this affordable foot but we also are exploring international and potential humanitarian applications. This direction may include several variations and accessories that still need to be developed.  

In short:

– Unique product

– Maximizes mobility

– Can minimize back strain

– Individuals having difficulty with traditional prosthetics may be

 able to use Stump Armour

– Effective

– Relatively initial low cost and low lifetime cost

– Durable

– Simplistic; there are no moving parts limiting points of failure

–100% designed and constructed in the USA

–SDVOB certification pending

Manufacturing

The main component is casted metal and the cap on the bottom is polyurethane elastomer.  3D printed prototypes were made by re3D.  The Stainless steel version  is investment casted by Surecast in Bernett TX, aluminum is sand casted by AA Foundries in San Antonio TX, molds for wax castings and bronze is investment casted by Stevens Art Foundry in Bulverde TX.  The polyurethane elastomer caps are casted in house. All components are sprayed in Rhino Liner by Blue Collar Truck Outfitters in New Braunfels TX.  

Metallic properties:

Stainless steel
ASTM A 351
PSI yield: 32,100
PSI tensile 75,500
Hardness Rb 81

Aluminum
ALMAG 35
35,000 psi tensile strength
Brinell hardness 70

Silicon Bronze
95% copper
4% silicon
1% manganese

Future Developments

The next development for this product are detachable spikes and hooks for climbing.  
There are preliminary designs for a snow foot and ice climbing foot.
A swimming version with fins is planned.

We also have a patent pending for a carpal tunnel concept.

Other ways you can help

Please share the word.  Get this information out to any amputees you know and anyone who may be interested in helping.  

About the creator

The creator of Stump Armour is a medically retired Marine Gunnery Sergeant who participated in the 100 Entrepreneurs Project.  100 Entrepreneurs help was paramount in getting this project going.  On top of extensive military experience he has also graduated Entrepreneurial Bootcamp for Veterans (EBV) at Texas A&M’s Mays Business School.  Stump Armour is one of 2 medical patents he has pending.  He has made a career out of solving problems and continues to do so post active duty service.  

WWW.STUMPARMOUR.COM

Email questions to info@stumparmour.com

All components are sprayed in Rhino Liner by Blue Collar Truck Outfitters in New Braunfels TX.  Metallic properties:Stainless steelASTM A 351PSI yield: 32,100PSI tensile 75,500Hardness Rb 81AluminumALMAG 3535,000 psi tensile strengthBrinell hardness 70Silicon Bronze95% copper4% silicon1% manganeseFuture DevelopmentsThe next development for this product are detachable spikes and hooks for climbing.  There are preliminary designs for a snow foot and ice climbing foot.A swimming version with fins is planned.We also have a patent pending for a carpal tunnel concept.Other ways you can helpPlease share the word.  Get this information out to any amputees you know and anyone who may be interested in helping.  About the creatorThe creator of Stump Armour is a medically retired Marine Gunnery Sergeant who participated in the 100 Entrepreneurs Project.  100 Entrepreneurs help was paramount in getting this project going.  On top of extensive military experience he has also graduated Entrepreneurial Bootcamp for Veterans (EBV) at Texas A&M’s Mays Business School.  Stump Armour is one of 2 medical patents he has pending.  He has made a career out of solving problems and continues to do so post active duty service.  WWW.STUMPARMOUR.COMEmail questions to info@stumparmour.com

story:
MOBI is a mobility and recovery tool that helps increase performance and decrease recovery time. Whether you are a professional, weekend warrior, or someone who just likes to stay active, MOBI will help you relieve muscles, improve circulation, and reduce fatigue - maximizing your efforts and getting you back to full-strength, faster.

MOBI was created by Dr. Jason Ross, Chiropractor and Strength Coach with over 15 years experience training and treating elite athletes:

  • Doctor of Chiropractic 
  • FR Release Provider 
  • Certified Strength and Conditioning Specialist (C.S.C.S.) 
  • Two-time member of US Bobsled Team 
  • Former official chiropractor of US Bobsled Team 
  • US Olympic Bobsled Team Chiropractor at 2010 Winter Olympics

Dr. Ross has dedicated his life to training and treating athletes of all types, covering the spectrum from olympians to beginner-level, and recognized that they all share a common need - keeping their bodies healthy so they can quickly return to their activity and not miss out due to pain or injury. Many people are confused about what they should (or shouldn't) be doing to properly maintain their bodies, and might even believe they don't need to be doing anything at all. That is why MOBI was created, to make it easy and accessible to properly care for you body, no matter where you are or what level of athlete you may be.

Why MOBI?

What sets MOBI apart is its versatile, multi-feature design, allowing users to target all areas of the body using many of the same soft tissue techniques that professional athletes, trainers, and clinicians use - Trigger Point Therapy, Myofascial Release, and Compression Massage. It's the one tool every active person should have to keep their bodies healthy. 

MOBI's patent-pending design provides the following benefits:

  • Multiple surfaces and edges to target different areas of the body
  • Ergonomic shape to allow you to access those hard-to-reach spots
  • Compact to fit in your bag and take it wherever you go
  • Flat bottom to use on the ground or against a wall
  • Waterproof so you can use it in the shower, hot tub, or steam room
  • High-strength material is FDA approved to safely use on your skin 

Testimonials

"This tool eliminates the need for a collection of mobility and rolling items because it's able to do everything I need by itself. The bulb gets deep into the hips and shoulder blades, the opposite end allows great angles of pressure into the upper and middle back, and the different sides of the shaft let me hit large areas of muscle in the legs. When the whole body needs work, MOBI has it all covered” -Tom (CrossFit L1 & L2, FRC Mobility Coach)

"As a life-long runner, the tool is an essential part of my daily routine. As a compliment to my foam roller, MOBI enables you to break up scar tissue in your shins and the bulb has been a savior for dealing with chronic tendonitis in my hips" -Michelle (Runner, 13 marathons / 1 ultramarathon)

"I love the tool, and the 1/2 bulb is somewhat of a game changer as it provides an important surface to hit the intrinsic foot and gluteals. I use MOBI pre/post workout, and also intra-workout. I am also able to store the tool in my large gym bag which was a bonus traveling to and from the gym/yoga" -Matt (Speed & Strength Coach)

Dr. Ross, Co-founder, using MOBI following 100 mi gravel race:

 

Eric, Co-founder, on a sample production run:

Thank You!!

This campaign is critical to help get MOBI into more hands of athletes and anyone looking to live a healthy and active lifestyle. We are extremely excited to share this product with you, and look forward to continuing the journey. 

Thank you very much for your support!!!

Check us out out at:

Our website at topperformancegoods.com

Follow us on Instagram @top_perform and Twitter @TOP_Perform

Like us on Facebook

Visit our YouTube Channel for how-to videos

story:
Enhance Your Coffee – Energy. Focus. Flow.

If you love coffee as much as we do, you’ll be excited to know that you can now get more from your favorite bean – morning and night.

THINKNOO is a functional science company that has partnered with Queensland University of Technology* in developing two naturally-inspired supplements, known as nootropics, that offer the first holistic approach to enhancing the mental energy and focus offered by coffee:

NOOstart is taken with your morning coffee to offer a more balanced mental energy throughout the day, rather than the typical morning peak ("jitters") and afternoon slump ("crash"). 

NOOreset is taken in the evening to prepare your body for sleep by helping process caffeine faster while replenishing the nutrients absorbed from a productive day.

This scientifically formulated morning and night approach allows you to enjoy the coffee you love, without having to rely on having cup-after-cup to keep at the top of your game.

And, best of all, you don’t have to ruin the flavor of your favorite blend; our capsules can be taken with any coffee, anywhere.

----

 

Why now?

According to Gallup (2015), one-quarter of the population is addicted to coffee, with 143m people drinking more than one cup per day. To most, this isn’t a problem, but only because they don’t know that caffeine takes 20-24 hours to completely flush from their system – meaning 143m of us are ‘caffeinated sleepers’. 

The Sleep Health Foundation cautions that heavy caffeine consumption impacts our sleep, which is a well-known contributor to a myriad of health issues, including stress and anxiety.

These health issues aren’t just costing us personally, they are costing the economy…big time. Forbes recently reported in 2016 that bad sleep costs the US $411bn and 1.2 million workdays each year because of reduced productivity and efficiency.   

It doesn’t have to be this way…

 

----

 

NOOstart

There are two pet hates of coffee lovers: the morning jitters and the afternoon crash.

Imagine if you could stay at peak mental focus throughout the day without having to reach for cup after cup of coffee.

NOOstart‘s blend of nootropics sourced from plant extracts and natural compounds have been scientifically formulated to work synergistically with your morning coffee, offering you lasting mental energy and focus throughout the day. (check out our website for more details on how it works).

Enjoy a new level of productivity for just over $1 / day!

 

Smart Ingredients – NOOstart:

L-THEANINE – Responsible for the calming effect in green tea. L-Theanine reduces overstimulation – the jitters – to enhance your mental clarity. (1) (2) 

CURCUMIN – Naturally occurring in one of the world's ancient spices, turmeric. Curcumin has been shown to have positive effects on inflammation, mood, and learning. (3) (4) 

VITAMIN B6 – An essential nutrient to the body. Vitamin B6 is widely associated with cognitive performance, mental energy, and mood. (5) (6)

CDP CHOLINE – Found in every cell in the body and naturally sourced from eggs. CDP Choline fuels the brain to improve focus and mental energy. (7) (8)

HORDENINE – A natural extract found in barley sprouts. Hordenine acts to support the adrenal system in the body and extend the life of coffee. (9)

THEACRINE – Found in traditional Kucha tea. Theacrine works synergistically with caffeine to offer a sustained mental boost. (10) (11)

 

 

----

 

NOOreset

With a third of American’s suffering from insufficient sleep, we decided to do something about it.

Imagine waking up feeling refreshed each morning, rather than feeling sluggish and needing to continually top up your brains caffeine levels.

NOOreset helps your body process caffeine faster and replenishes the nutrients absorbed from a productive day, getting your body and mind reset for a productive day ahead. (check out our website for more details on how it works).

Enjoy stress-free productivity for just over $1 / day!

 

Smart Ingredients – NOOreset:

RUTACARPINE – A herbal extract of the plant, Evodia Rutaecarpa. Rutaecarpine has been shown to assist the body’s breakdown of caffeine. (12) (13)

MAGNESIUM GLYCINATE – An essential mineral that must be obtained from the diet: highly concentrated in leafy greens. Magnesium helps regulate the body’s adrenaline and cortisol hormones. (14) (15)

BORON – An important nutrient found in Raisins and Avocados. Boron acts to aid the metabolism of other nutrients, such as calcium and magnesium. (16)

PHOSPHATIDYLSERINE – Naturally produced in the body and found in meat and soy. Phosphatidylserine has been shown to help the body regulate cortisol, our stress hormone. (17)

ZINC CITRATE – Found as a rich source in oysters, meat and nuts. Zinc plays an important role in the functioning of the brain and is critical in the metabolism of Melatonin, an important sleep hormone that regulates natural sleep cycles. (18)

MELATONIN – A natural hormone produced by the body. Melatonin regulates our circadian rhythm, the body’s ‘internal clock’, and when it is released it triggers the onset of sleep. (19) (20)

 

 

----

Don't just take our word for it...


Eileen is a New York based fashion and lifestyle influencer: @lighttravelsfaster. She also practices corporate lawyer on Wall Street and is a professional dancer who understands the importance always being at the top of her game.

“As both full-time lawyer on Wall Street and a digital media entrepreneur and travel blogger, I need all the energy I can get. THINKNOO helps enhance the effects of my daily coffee naturally, to keep me going from the boardroom to the airport and back again!"

 

Austin is a Los Angeles based stuntman and parkour athlete: @austingpk. Originally from the San Francisco Bay Area, Austin moved to LA to attend school at UCLA where he graduated in 2013 with a degree in Neuroscience. 

“When it comes to being a stuntman, precision is everything. I truly benefited from the increased focus NOOstart offers and appreciated the calming relief of NOOreset in the evenings; not to mention the great sleep!”

 

Justin is an entrepreneur, writer, podcast co-host, and former hockey player: @realjustinweber. He is also heavily involved with a charity whose mission is to raise awareness and prevent child abuse and neglect called Childhelp USA. 

"THINKNOO gives me such clean and sustainable energy when I drink coffee as well as such restorative sleep at night – I have never woken up so clear."

 

Steven Sharpe Jr runs a digital design firm, Enframed, based in NYC: @stevensharpejr. Starting out his career as a personal stylist & then branching into digital marketing and design, Steven has been able to utilize his craft in styling to create beautiful spaces through digital design. 

“As a creative and entrepreneur, my time is so precious and my productivity & focus while taking THINKNOO has drastically increased! The Reset brings everything down and I can sleep through the night with no problems.”

----

 

NOOreuse

It’s time to cut back your coffee footprint.

Did you know that half a trillion disposable cups are manufactured annually around the world; that’s over 70 disposable cups for every person on the planet – it doesn't have to be this way.

NOOreuse cups have been designed to be good for you, good for the environment, and damn good for your coffee.

Our 12 Oz cups have been made from high-quality non-porous borosilicate glass; and are microwave safe, splash-proof, and as clean and green as it gets.

To support #LittlexLittle, we will be giving away a free NOOreuse coffee cup with every subscription of NOOstack (both supplements combined) once we are funded.

 

----

 

NOOcarry

Everyone love's a tote bag! We've designed two canvas bags that are exclusive to the Indiegogo campaign. Don't miss out of your chance to get your hands on one of these.


 

----

Conscious Consumption

At THINKNOO, we believe in changing our actions today to create a better future for tomorrow. We are proud to announce two initiatives:

1. NOOreuse – once funded, we will be giving away an eco-friendly coffee cup when you subscribe to NOOstack (NOOstart + NOOreset) in support of the sustainability movement, #LittlexLittle, and to reduce the thousands of disposable cups being thrown away every second.

2. NOOsupport – for every backer, we will donate $1 toward research supporting cognitive degenerative diseases, like Alzheimer's. We believe everyone deserves an equal opportunity.

----

Product Development

We've partnered with Professor Neil King, a professor at Queensland University of Technology, one of Australia's fastest-growing research universities. He is a world-leading expert in the fields of health innovation and nutritional sciences, and has extensive experience developing product innovation for multinational organisations. As a member of THINKNOO's scientific advisory board, Professor King will provide scientific guidance, reviews and feedback.

THINKNOO is, also, negotiating with Queensland University of Technology's eSports Lab to undertake a study to test the effectiveness of nutritionally enhanced coffee on players in-game performance. QUT's state of the art eSports Lab is one of the first eSports research facilities in Australia. The lab is run by Michael Trotter and Dylan Poulus, both QUT researchers with an ambition to progress the eSports industry.

 

Ready to launch

We have finalized agreements with manufacturing and fulfilment to commence production as soon as the project is backed. Lead times will be roughly 30-60 days from the completion of the campaign. Here is a breakdown of monthly milestones, leading up to production launch & shipping the first units to backers:

 

Our Team

Our team is made up of researchers, innovators, and strategists – people who strive for perfection in product development. We believe that business plays an important part in our sustainable future, which is why our initiatives drive support of #LittlexLittle.

Professor Neil King (scientific advisory board member)

Neil is a professor at Queensland University of Technology, one of Australia's fastest-growing research universities. He is a world-leading expert in the fields of health innovation and nutritional sciences, and has extensive experience developing product innovation for multinational organizations. As a member of the scientific advisory board, Professor King will provide scientific guidance, reviews and feedback to THINKNOO.

Steven Austin (co-founder)

Steven has a background in neuropsychology, having studied psychology and economics over the course of 8 years at one of Australia's leading university's. He continually leverages his vast connections in the field to collaborate on the scientific development of THINKNOO's products. His passion for human potential drives him to make a positive change in the world.

Shannon O'Brien (co-founder)

Shannon is a senior innovation consultant at one of the world's leading agency's. He spends his days helping businesses conceptualize, launch, and grow new products and services. He leverages this skillset to identify opportunities for the business to further develop the product and brand. His expertise has been recognized in B&T's 30 Under 30, with his passion for both coffee and charity work leading him to develop THINKNOO to make a positive change in the world.

(Steven Austin pictured left, Shannon O'Brien pictured right)

Why Indiegogo? 

Indiegogo is a strong community of forward-thinking people. We share their drive for a better world and want to help them get there. We think the Indiegogo community will appreciate the holistic benefits we offer to their coffee experience.

 

----

 

FAQ's

 

1. Is this coffee?

No – THINKNOO offers coffee-enhancing supplements. All of our supplements come in capsule form, just like a normal vitamin.

2. How do you use the supplements?

NOOstart: Take two capsules, as needed, with your morning coffee to reduce crashing and jitters. The supplement takes effect immediately (within about 30 minutes) and is effective for four to six hours. We recommend being in an environment conducive to getting work done.

NOOreset: Take two capsules, as needed, up to 60 minutes before going to bed. The supplement will help your body maintain a deeper state of sleep. We recommend combining with a vegetable-rich diet and meditation.

3. What is in the supplement?

Our blend of plant extracts and natural compounds, otherwise known as Nootropics, have been scientifically formulated to offer the perfect coffee experience. More information on the ingredients can be found on our website (thinknoo.com/how-it-works/), including extensive scientific references that support our claims.

4. When will I receive my product?

All backers will receive their product, regardless of the campaign being 100% funded. Your order will be shipped within 45 days from the end of the Indiegogo campaign.

 

*Disclaimer:

Professor Neil King and Queensland University of Technology  do not guarantee, and accept no legal responsibility whatsoever arising from or in connection to the accuracy, reliability, currency, correctness or completeness of Thinknoo Inc., or the Thinknoo products.

We believe that business plays an important part in our sustainable future, which is why our initiatives drive support of #LittlexLittle.Professor Neil King (scientific advisory board member)Neil is a professor at Queensland University of Technology, one of Australia's fastest-growing research universities. He is a world-leading expert in the fields of health innovation and nutritional sciences, and has extensive experience developing product innovation for multinational organizations. As a member of the scientific advisory board, Professor King will provide scientific guidance, reviews and feedback to THINKNOO.Steven Austin (co-founder)Steven has a background in neuropsychology, having studied psychology and economics over the course of 8 years at one of Australia's leading university's. He continually leverages his vast connections in the field to collaborate on the scientific development of THINKNOO's products. His passion for human potential drives him to make a positive change in the world.Shannon O'Brien (co-founder)Shannon is a senior innovation consultant at one of the world's leading agency's. He spends his days helping businesses conceptualize, launch, and grow new products and services. He leverages this skillset to identify opportunities for the business to further develop the product and brand. His expertise has been recognized in B&T's 30 Under 30, with his passion for both coffee and charity work leading him to develop THINKNOO to make a positive change in the world.(Steven Austin pictured left, Shannon O'Brien pictured right)Why Indiegogo? Indiegogo is a strong community of forward-thinking people. We share their drive for a better world and want to help them get there. We think the Indiegogo community will appreciate the holistic benefits we offer to their coffee experience. ---- FAQ's 1. Is this coffee?No – THINKNOO offers coffee-enhancing supplements. All of our supplements come in capsule form, just like a normal vitamin.2. How do you use the supplements?NOOstart: Take two capsules, as needed, with your morning coffee to reduce crashing and jitters. The supplement takes effect immediately (within about 30 minutes) and is effective for four to six hours. We recommend being in an environment conducive to getting work done. NOOreset: Take two capsules, as needed, up to 60 minutes before going to bed. The supplement will help your body maintain a deeper state of sleep. We recommend combining with a vegetable-rich diet and meditation.3. What is in the supplement?Our blend of plant extracts and natural compounds, otherwise known as Nootropics, have been scientifically formulated to offer the perfect coffee experience. More information on the ingredients can be found on our website (thinknoo.com/how-it-works/), including extensive scientific references that support our claims.4. When will I receive my product?All backers will receive their product, regardless of the campaign being 100% funded. Your order will be shipped within 45 days from the end of the Indiegogo campaign. *Disclaimer:Professor Neil King and Queensland University of Technology  do not guarantee, and accept no legal responsibility whatsoever arising from or in connection to the accuracy, reliability, currency, correctness or completeness of Thinknoo Inc., or the Thinknoo products.

story:
Real feedback, from real parents



Introducing Ecoh



Ecoh is a smart wearable communication and safety device designed specifically for use by children and the elderly. That means anyone can use it. Ecoh features a HD video camera, easy to use speed dial buttons, Bluetooth connection, WIFI, and a GPS locator, to ensure that your loved ones are always safe.

  • See what they see with HD live view
  • Talk to your child, anytime - anywhere!
  • Set safe zones and paths
  • Proximity sensors for added security
  • Light weight, shockproof and waterproof

Simple 2-way communication

First and foremost, Ecoh is a mobile phone. Just simplified. There are no complicated menus to navigate with Ecoh. Just press one of the speed dial buttons, and that’s it. Pure, and simple communication.


Know where they are

Want to make sure your children are where they’re supposed to be? 

Using the Ecoh mobile app, your child’s real-time GPS location is only a button press away. You can even set up the device to send “ecoh’s” of where your child is, at intervals that suit you.


See what they see

Via the Ecoh mobile app, you will be able to remotely activate and access the live camera stream from your child’s Ecoh. You will effectively see the world through the eyes of your child. 

Parents can always identify potential hazards that await unsuspecting children. By being able to see your child’s immediate surroundings, you will be able to identify anything around them that could be dangerous, before they get into trouble.


E-Zones and E-Paths

Your child wants to go play at the park, but you have a full day of grocery shopping, and housework ahead of you. So do you make your child sit and watch TV, while you take care of business? Or let them go outside and play at the park across the street?

With Ecoh, you can set up safe zones which effectively keeps your children within areas which you have designated safe. If they try to leave the area, you will be immediately notified via your Ecoh mobile app.

Setting up safe zones can be done from anywhere too. So even if you’re stuck at work, and little Billy wants to go play at his friend Robbie’s house around the corner, you can set up an E-Path that he will take to walk there, and then an E-Zone to make sure he stays there, all from your office desk.

Kids can get back to playing outside and running around at parks, just like they used to. The world outside is safer with Ecoh.


Security that's child proof

Ecoh comes with proximity sensors that can be worn on your kid's wrist, or attached to their shoe laces. If for any reason the Ecoh is out of range of the sensors, an alarm will sound and you will be notified on your smart phone.

From the outset, our goal was to produce a reliable, wearable device for children. Kids have a habit of breaking stuff, so we made sure Ecoh will handle anything a child can throw at it. Protected from dust and dirt penetration, Ecoh can even be submerged in up to 3 feet of water for a short time, and still remain operational.



HD camera and HQ microphone




We designed Ecoh to be as simple to use as possible. The app was no exception. Using the app dashboard, you will be able to easily configure your Ecoh device. You will also be able to select functions, and change the way the app works by customizing a number of options and features within the app dashboard itself.






With your support, our team will be able to fund our tooling and verification phase, which will see us go into production and ship your Ecoh by August 2015




What's in the box?


  • a. 1  x pack of speed dial stickers for easy reference
  • b. 1  x proximity sensor bracelet
  • c. 1  x proximity sensor shoe tag
  • d. 1  x USB charging cord
  • e. 1 x quick start guide
  • f. 1 x Ecoh device


    • FAQs

    1. General (Buying, Ecoh calling)
    2. Buying & Shipping (Shipping costs, Estimated delivery)
    3. Privacy & Security (switching off Ecoh, health concerns)
    4. Technical (Connectivity, battery info, App with multiple Ecoh's)
    1. General (Buying, Ecoh calling)
    How many Ecoh devices do I need?
    We recommend having one per child. You will be able to configure and tether all of your Ecoh devices securely to the one smart phone app on your mobile device.
    Can I buy one for my elderly parent?
    Sure! You can buy Ecoh for anyone. Ecoh is not limited to just keeping children safe. It is aimed at simplifying communication and making sure that the people you love most, are always safe, no matter how old they are.
    Can anyone setup Ecoh?
    You betcha! You simply take your new Ecoh out of the box, insert your Nano SIM card, download the app to your mobile device and pair your Ecoh with the app, and you're ready to go!
    How do I pair the Ecoh with my phone or tablet?
    Pairing the device is as simple as scanning a unique QR code that’s supplied with your new Ecoh. Just to make sure you don’t have any trouble, the mobile app will guide you through the simple procedure, step by step.
    What happens if my child tries to call me, but can’t get through?
    (1) First Ecoh will try the other assigned speed dial phone number.

    (2) If that number cannot be reached either, Ecoh will automatically begin to redial the two programmed speed dial numbers up to 9 times (The number of re-dial attempts can be tailored in the app settings from 0-9 attempts).

    (3) If it's still unsuccessful in making a connection to the guardians phone numbers, Ecoh will go into what we call “dynamic black box” mode and begin recording and saving all available data, such as video, audio, and GPS location co-ordinates. Ecoh will also attempt to re-dial the guardians’ phones every few minutes, and once a connection has been established, all saved data can be transmitted to the guardians’ mobile device.

    (4) If no connection has been made after a user defined interval (between 0 – 15 minutes),Ecoh will begin to automatically dial secondary phone numbers in sequence until a connection is made. This feature is activated within the app and is customizable. Where no connection to any of the primary or secondary numbers can be made, Ecoh can be programmed to automatically dial emergency services numbers, like 911, 112, or 000. The user can set up Ecoh to automatically call emergency services if a number of triggers are met. For instance, if the child rapidly departs an E-Zone, a significant impact is detected by the shock sensors, or the Ecoh is separated from the child beyond a predetermined period of time. This feature is fully customizable, and can be switched off or enabled via the app.
    Can my child dial Emergency services direct?
    Yes! Emergency numbers must be programmed into the Ecoh device during the initial set up procedure before first use. To dial Emergency services, the child must hold down the two speed-dial buttons for at least 5 seconds. This will activate an outgoing emergency services call. This feature can be switched off or enabled via the app.
    What happens if my phone dies?
    If a paired phone dies, the user will be required to de-register the dead phone, and register an alternative or new device before it can be tethered to the Ecoh. If a tethered mobile device's battery dies, the user won't be able to monitor the Ecoh unless they have access to another tethered mobile device, or their PC or Mac is running the Ecoh application Software.
    I'd like to store many phone numbers into my Ecoh, is this possible, and if so, how do I go about dialing those numbers?
    When activated, Ecoh will be able to initiate outgoing calls via voice actuation. This means you can store as many phone numbers as you’d like into your Ecoh, and call any one of them easily. To actuate voice dialing, the user taps both speed dial buttons twice in quick succession, at which point Ecoh will beep and all LED’s will light up green, prompting you to say “Call (Name)”. Ecoh will then dial the appropriate phone number. To end the call, double tap both speed dial buttons, and the call is ended.
    ￪ Back to FAQ
    2. Buying & Shipping (Shipping costs, Estimated delivery)
    What are the shipping costs?
    *Shipping is free worldwide for a limited time only. Shipping does not include any extra fees you may incur such as customs or taxes associated with your country or state.
    How soon can I get Ecoh?
    The estimated shipping date for Ecoh begins in August 2015.
    ￪ Back to FAQ
    3. Privacy & Security (Switching off Ecoh, Health concerns)
    Can the device be switched off by anyone?
    No. To switch your Ecoh off, the device and the paired mobile app must be within 2 meters of each other. This is a security measure we’ve implemented to ensure nobody can bypass the system by simply switching Ecoh off.
    How secure is Ecoh?
    Security was paramount when we were developing Ecoh, so we have used the latest secure data transferring methods/protocols to transmit and receive data from the device to the app and vice-versa. Any data stored within the device itself is encrypted as well.
    I’ve heard that using mobile phones can negatively affect health, is Ecoh safe for my child?
    Ecoh is absolutely safe for anybody! We’ve taken every step possible to ensure that there are no health concerns associated with using Ecoh. We have our own children, and if we wouldn’t let our children use Ecoh, we certainly wouldn’t let yours. Moreover, Ecoh will meet and surpass the strictest regulations in the world and be certified safe before your shipment arrives.
    ￪ Back to FAQ
    4. Technical (Connectivity, battery info, App with multiple Ecoh's)
    Can multiple mobile devices have the app running at the same time?
    Yes, the free app will be available for iOS, Android, and Windows mobile phones, and can be used simultaneously by 2 mobile devices. We’ve restricted the number of mobile devices that can be tethered to any Ecoh as a security measure. If you upgrade your mobile device, or lose your current one, you can de-register the old or lost tethered device, and register and tether your new one.
    Can I have multiple Ecoh’s on the one app?
    Sure. You are able to tether as many Ecoh devices to the app as you like. For example, if you have 4 children, you can view all 4 Ecoh’s on the one app.
    Does a SIM card come with the device?
    No, Ecoh uses a Nano SIM card (prepaid or post-paid) preferably enabled with 3G or 4G(LTE), which you are able to purchase from any local retailer. Once you have purchased the SIM card, you simply insert it in the SIM card slot, and you’re ready to go!
    Can I use Ecoh with a 2G only SIM?
    Yes, but you won’t be able to use the advanced features, and will be limited to voice calls only.
    How long will the battery last?
    On a single charge, the battery will last over 50 hours. We are working hard to optimize power consumption and improve the battery life of the device even further.
    Without a screen interface, how will I know the battery level of my Ecoh?
    Your app will show the live status of the battery level of your Ecoh, and the device itself has LED indicators which show charge levels in increments of 25%, 50%, 75%, and 100%. A charge level of under 10% will be indicated by a single red led on your Ecoh, and a low battery warning will be displayed on the app.
    Is Ecoh water resistant?
    Yes! Ecoh will meet the IP67 standard, which means it’s protected against the effects of immersion in water to a depth of up to 1 meter. Furthermore it’s completely dust proof too.
    ￪ Back to FAQ

    If you would like to contact us, please feel free to email us on info@ecoh.me              We would love to hear from you!

story:
Introduction and Summary

My name is Harold and I’m a die-hard college sports fan, not just any ol’ sports fan. I’m one of those, “don’t talk to me after a loss”, "hide my wallet after a win" kind of fans. I'm the kind of fan that knows that there’s nothing like seeing my team play in person because like you, I KNOW that our cheers in the stands matter. Don’t argue with me on this one - It’s a fact. I’m a sports fan and I started Bandwagon for sports fans like me and you. 


Do you remember seeing your first live college game? Doing "The Wave", High-Fiving strangers, and chanting "DEFENSE" at the top of your lungs. Whether you were 8 or 18, there was an energy that was in the stadium that was different from anything you ever felt while watching on TV. Now, do you remember the first time you paid for a ticket to see your team play? Was it a whole paycheck or just most of one? For me, it was most of one but as a fan, I didn’t want to just watch the game - I wanted to BE THERE! But as I’ve tried to attend more sporting events, not only have ticket prices crept up but now there are fees...INSANE FEES charged by these ticket companies. I thought about it, did some research and decided I’d do something about the FEE-FRENZY that’s going on in the marketplace. That’s why I started Bandwagon - so that fans can continue to have that indescribable feeling of being in the crowd without ridiculous ticket fees.


What is Bandwagon?

Bandwagon is a secondary ticket marketplace that is Fan-Focused and Fan-Driven. Whether you're into college basketball (anxiously awaiting March Madness) or college football (where every Saturday in the fall is like Christmas morning) you know what it's like to try to get your hands on tickets to the game. We are focusing on the college sports market because that's what we are most passionate about. 

We believe the current marketplace is out of whack so we started this company to give fans the opportunity to not only get their hands on tickets to the game of the week, but also to allow fans to keep more of their money. 

You took a trip down memory lane and remembered your first game and the experience that you had. Don't you want to experience that feeling as often as possible without worrying about the financial burden that comes with it? THIS is why Bandwagon is important to us.  We want to challenge the status quo. We believe that live experiences take fandom to the next level. Experiences create memories and memories last forever. By contributing to this campaign, you will be helping us bring a better way of buying, selling, AND trading tickets to the market!



What Do We Need & What Do You Get?

Our goal is to raise $5,000 in this campaign. With that money, we will be able to begin developing stadium seating maps so that fans like you will be able to find and list seats easily! So far, we have been putting up our own money to get the site to where it is today but now, we need your help. We NEED your support and we are willing to give you some SWEET PERKS in exchange like THESE (psst...there's more to your right).   

If for some reason we do not hit our goal, we will still use the funds raised to start building stadium seating maps. Unfortunately, that would force us to build maps much slower which would leave some fan bases out in the interim - we don’t want to do that!


The Impact We Can Make Together

We understand the challenge that is in front of us and we are coupling our passion for sports with our knowledge of the market to overcome that challenge. We have attended conferences, talked to college athletic departments, and have polled HUNDREDS of fans - we know that we can bring this thing to market with your help!


Risks & Challenges

The value proposition for Bandwagon is two-fold. For the fans, it is simple: More Sports. Less Fees. We understand that the challenge in creating a new market is that we need to have simultaneous traffic. For fans to buy tickets, there must be tickets for sale. For fans to decide to list tickets with us, they must know that we will have the traffic to get the tickets sold. In full disclosure, we have identified that as the biggest challenge. To address this, we are reaching out to colleges and universities about partnering with us and so far, they like what they are hearing!


The value proposition for a college or university is obviously the opportunity to keep fans in the stadium to preserve homefield advantage. Let’s say you have two tickets to see your favorite team host a rivalry game but you can’t make it (Bummer, I know). Currently, you have a couple of options: 1) giving them away or selling them to friends and family at a lower price than you could get for them on the free market or 2) listing them on THAT OTHER SITE and risking fans of the other team taking your tickets...and your team's home field advantage. With Bandwagon, we are offering another option; an option that schools across the country will LOVE. What if you could list your tickets to be sold but ONLY have fans of your team be able to buy them? You get more for your tickets than you would on some message board AND you also can rest assured knowing that you’re preserving your team’s home field advantage. GO YOU!


To us, this is a win-win situation and by partnering with colleges and universities, we believe that we can overcome the challenge of building the marketplace while also giving fans the opportunity to make more money for the tickets they are selling.


Other Ways You Can Help!

So! If you’ve made it thus far, THANK YOU! Your time is valuable and we appreciate you considering us out of all of these awesome projects on Indiegogo! We have LOTS of cool perks that we think you will LOVE! Think about how cool it will be to be able to say that you were there in the beginning - that you were there when we decided to #BandTogether and take the ticket market back to the fans. 

Whether you’re able to contribute and become a Bandwagon Fan or not, we would GREATLY appreciate you doing 2 things for us:

1) Follow us on your favorite social media. We are on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter! 

2) TELL THE WORLD ABOUT US! Tell your Fantasy Football league, tell your intramural softball team, tell your co-workers...TELL THE WORLD! Indiegogo has some cool tools to make sharing our campaign easy! Please check back in as we want to keep you up to speed on our progress!


Thank you for jumping on and becoming a Bandwagon Fan! #BandTogether
story_txt:
Introduction and SummaryMy name is Harold and I’m a die-hard college sports fan, not just any ol’ sports fan. I’m one of those, “don’t talk to me after a loss”, "hide my wallet after a win" kind of fans. I'm the kind of fan that knows that there’s nothing like seeing my team play in person because like you, I KNOW that our cheers in the stands matter. Don’t argue with me on this one - It’s a fact. I’m a sports fan and I started Bandwagon for sports fans like me and you. Do you remember seeing your first live college game? Doing "The Wave", High-Fiving strangers, and chanting "DEFENSE" at the top of your lungs. Whether you were 8 or 18, there was an energy that was in the stadium that was different from anything you ever felt while watching on TV. Now, do you remember the first time you paid for a ticket to see your team play? Was it a whole paycheck or just most of one? For me, it was most of one but as a fan, I didn’t want to just watch the game - I wanted to BE THERE! But as I’ve tried to attend more sporting events, not only have ticket prices crept up but now there are fees...INSANE FEES charged by these ticket companies. I thought about it, did some research and decided I’d do something about the FEE-FRENZY that’s going on in the marketplace. That’s why I started Bandwagon - so that fans can continue to have that indescribable feeling of being in the crowd without ridiculous ticket fees.What is Bandwagon?
Bandwagon is a secondary ticket marketplace that is Fan-Focused and Fan-Driven. Whether you're into college basketball (anxiously awaiting March Madness) or college football (where every Saturday in the fall is like Christmas morning) you know what it's like to try to get your hands on tickets to the game. We are focusing on the college sports market because that's what we are most passionate about. 
We believe the current marketplace is out of whack so we started this company to give fans the opportunity to not only get their hands on tickets to the game of the week, but also to allow fans to keep more of their money. 


You took a trip down memory lane and remembered your first game and the experience that you had. Don't you want to experience that feeling as often as possible without worrying about the financial burden that comes with it? THIS is why Bandwagon is important to us.  We want to challenge the status quo. We believe that live experiences take fandom to the next level. Experiences create memories and memories last forever. By contributing to this campaign, you will be helping us bring a better way of buying, selling, AND trading tickets to the market! 





What Do We Need & What Do You Get?
Our goal is to raise $5,000 in this campaign. With that money, we will be able to begin developing stadium seating maps so that fans like you will be able to find and list seats easily! So far, we have been putting up our own money to get the site to where it is today but now, we need your help. We NEED your support and we are willing to give you some SWEET PERKS in exchange like THESE (psst...there's more to your right).   



If for some reason we do not hit our goal, we will still use the funds raised to start building stadium seating maps. Unfortunately, that would force us to build maps much slower which would leave some fan bases out in the interim - we don’t want to do that!
The Impact We Can Make Together
We understand the challenge that is in front of us and we are coupling our passion for sports with our knowledge of the market to overcome that challenge. We have attended conferences, talked to college athletic departments, and have polled HUNDREDS of fans - we know that we can bring this thing to market with your help! 

Risks & Challenges
The value proposition for Bandwagon is two-fold. For the fans, it is simple: More Sports. Less Fees. We understand that the challenge in creating a new market is that we need to have simultaneous traffic. For fans to buy tickets, there must be tickets for sale. For fans to decide to list tickets with us, they must know that we will have the traffic to get the tickets sold. In full disclosure, we have identified that as the biggest challenge. To address this, we are reaching out to colleges and universities about partnering with us and so far, they like what they are hearing!
The value proposition for a college or university is obviously the opportunity to keep fans in the stadium to preserve homefield advantage. Let’s say you have two tickets to see your favorite team host a rivalry game but you can’t make it (Bummer, I know). Currently, you have a couple of options: 1) giving them away or selling them to friends and family at a lower price than you could get for them on the free market or 2) listing them on THAT OTHER SITE and risking fans of the other team taking your tickets...and your team's home field advantage. With Bandwagon, we are offering another option; an option that schools across the country will LOVE. What if you could list your tickets to be sold but ONLY have fans of your team be able to buy them? You get more for your tickets than you would on some message board AND you also can rest assured knowing that you’re preserving your team’s home field advantage. GO YOU!
To us, this is a win-win situation and by partnering with colleges and universities, we believe that we can overcome the challenge of building the marketplace while also giving fans the opportunity to make more money for the tickets they are selling. 
Other Ways You Can Help!
So! If you’ve made it thus far, THANK YOU! Your time is valuable and we appreciate you considering us out of all of these awesome projects on Indiegogo! We have LOTS of cool perks that we think you will LOVE! Think about how cool it will be to be able to say that you were there in the beginning - that you were there when we decided to #BandTogether and take the ticket market back to the fans. 
Whether you’re able to contribute and become a Bandwagon Fan or not, we would GREATLY appreciate you doing 2 things for us:
1) Follow us on your favorite social media. We are on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter! 



2) TELL THE WORLD ABOUT US! Tell your Fantasy Football league, tell your intramural softball team, tell your co-workers...TELL THE WORLD! Indiegogo has some cool tools to make sharing our campaign easy! Please check back in as we want to keep you up to speed on our progress! 
Thank you for jumping on and becoming a Bandwagon Fan! #BandTogether

story:
Background Info:

Teraab has been tumbling and walking on his hands since he was 4 years old. I saw his talent but knew the expenses of gymnastics were completely outside of my budget.  While I knew I was limiting his options, I didn't see any other way.  This was when he was about 7.  Fast forward four and a half years. 

It's the summer of 2011. Teraab was tumbling and having fun with Streb Lab for Action Mechanics which is located in the Williamsburg section of Brooklyn, NY.  Teraab had been attending Streb's monthly First Friday Teen event for several months. During these events, Ashley, one of the coaches, saw the power, skill and grace that Teraab possessed and strongly urged me to find a gymnastics team and get him on it!  Stressed, I took him to Chelsea Piers the next day and over the course of the next week he auditioned in front of 3 coaches.  The end result? He was asked to join the Boys'Team at Chelsea Piers! They told me he was a natural (he has a six-pack you wouldn't believe).

Initially, Teraab was not given a scholarship at Chelsea Piers but after six months, that changed.  The Chelsea Piers Scholarship Committee granted Teraab partial scholarships for the 2012-2013 and the 2013-2014 seasons.  For the upcoming 2014-2015 season, the Chelsea Piers scholarship amount has been reduced drastically making it difficult for me, a single mother with two other children, to make Teraab's gymnastic dreams a reality.

Chelsea Piers is a sports facility located in New York City.  It has a full range of sports activities housed within it.  It is located along the Hudson River Park on 23rd Street and 12th Avenue.  http://www.chelseapiers.com/

Current Highlights:

In the past two seasons, he became the captain of the team in the 2012-2013 when he was a level 7.  He placed in the top 10 all-arounds at each meet of both seasons.  Vault, Still Rings and High Bar are his best events and he regularly takes the top spots in those events.

He even garnered a gymnastics summer camp scholarship for one week at a top camp in Pennsylvania this past summer (2014).

How Funds Will Be Used:

The money raised would be used for his gymnastics tuition, team uniform, competition fees for the 2014-2015 season, and a digital camera with a fast lens to capture the events in these low light environments.  The purpose of the camera is to provide high quality pictures and videos to college gymnastic program coaches in hopes that Teraab will garner a gymnastics scholarship for college.  Lastly, the incidentals are the costs of round-trip transportation to each meet.

There are generally 9 - 10 meets each season. One of the furthest meets is the the Gasparilla Meet in St. Petersburg, FL. Some of the other meets are in Rochester, NY, Long Island, NY, Philadelphia, PA, Connecticut, and New Jersey.  Furthermore, once the meets begin in early December of each year, there is a meet a month, sometimes two meets a month.  Getting Teraab to and from these meets becomes costly. 

Long Range Goal of this Funding:

The goal of this project will cover most of this year's costs.  Yet, the amount is more than enough to ensure that Teraab will continue this year -- a pivotal year. He started 10th grade this September and he can begin sending videos of each of his events to coaches at colleges with gymnastics programs to begin the process of introducing himself to these coaches to potentially gain a college scholarship as mentioned above.

Some words from Teraab:

Ever since I was a kid I loved flipping and being active. When I was eleven, I joined the Chelsea Piers gymnastics team and went straight to level seven. After 1 year, I was improving very quickly and moved to level 8 the next season. Each competition, I made friends and always brought tons of medals home.  I would love to keep doing this for as long as I can and, if possible, I would love to push myself and try for the Olympics.

**********************************************************************************************

You can see Teraab from the 2012-2013 season (Level 7) here on YouTube: http://youtu.be/W7FFnQmp0vA.

Here are other videos from that season; this was the Rockland County Meet on 12/7/2013.

https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=teraab+feaster

story:
DREAM FUNDRAISING GOAL: $13,850

Update: WOW!!!!! You ALL are AMAZING!!! 

Thank you for pouring so much love out to this amazing girl and her family! Please keep the donations coming and we will keep you updated on how we use the funds to help make life a bit easier for them... whether it's paying medical bills, catching up their mortgage payments, paying utilities, etc. We will share with you how your generous gifts are used to help ease their burden a bit!! Thank you!!

PLEASE HELP NOW!!

9/24 UPDATE: LanDan Olivia began the Pain Clinic Intensive Program at Nemours Children's Hospital on Monday and already they are seeing an improvement! Yay!! However, we MUST raise the funds NOW or she will be removed from the program FRIDAY for inability to pay the daily co-payments! Thank you for helping!

Dear Family, Friends (and generous strangers), 

The Kloznick family desperately needs our HELP! The crippling financial burden of LanDan Olivia’s (and Danielle’s) life-threatening diseases has reached a critical point. As is the case with most invisible diseases, everything can appear “normal” on the outside, but inside is a completely different and painful story.

The Immediate Need:

  • LanDan Olivia's 5-week Pain Clinic intensive therapy program requires almost $3,000 in co-pays that must be paid in daily increments at the time of service. 
  • LanDan Olivia’s custom reclining wheelchair has been ordered and requires a $2,500 co-pay upon delivery. (Her current chair is 3x too large for her body.)
  • Danielle, drives a 1989 Suburban with almost 300,000 miles and NO air conditioning. The heat induces additional pain and motion sickness for LanDan Olivia. The mechanic’s estimate is about $1,000 to fix the A/C.
  • Additional funds to cover gas, food and medicine co-payments during the Pain Clinic program.



    • The Why:

    LanDan Olivia lives in extreme pain. In an effort to ease her suffering, her doctors at Nemours Childrens Hospital in Orlando have scheduled her to begin an intensive 5-week therapy program beginning Monday, September 21st. For the entire duration, they will be staying at the closest Ronald McDonald House which is 23 miles from the hospital. Though it is closer than the 56 miles they drive from home to the hospital, it is still a long way to go daily and LanDan Olivia has extreme anxiety about getting sick every day in the heat on the way.

    About LanDan Olivia

    • At age 7, LanDan Olivia Kloznick was diagnosed with POTS (Postural Orthostatic Tachycardia Syndrome) and EDS (Ehlers-Danlos Syndrome). 
    • In super-simple terms, these diseases affect her heart and the collagen around her organs.
    • All too often, her heart isn’t strong enough to pump the blood to her head when she is vertical. 
    • Due to gravity, the blood wants to pool in her legs, causing excruciating pain.
    • Standing makes her heart rate increase (like ours does when we exercise) and her blood pressure drop. This results in oxygen deprivation which causes ongoing memory loss and syncope, which means she falls multiple times daily. 
    • In June, LanDan Olivia suffered a concussion after a nasty fall at home. 
    • LanDan Olivia has a medical team of 20 doctors, specialists, therapists, etc. that help treat and manage her diseases which have NO CURE!
    • Prior to getting sick, LanDan Olivia was an exceptional gymnast and star flag football player.
    • Like most kids who suffer with an invisible disease, LanDan Olivia often looks “normal” and sports an infectious smile. She rarely complains and most people who meet her would never know how much she is suffering on the inside.

    The rest of the Kloznick Family

    Mom: Though she is not one to put focus on herself, Danielle suffers from a plethora of diseases including Lupus, Diabetes, Sjogren’s and Hoshimoto’s and though she has been hospitalized multiple times in the past couple of years, her number one priority is helping LanDan Olivia through each day and managing all of her unique special medical needs.

    Dad: Michael is the rock of this family. A sales rep, he works extremely hard to provide and take care of them all. They can’t say enough wonderful things about him.

    Brother: Twelve year old Braydenton has one of the kindest, caring hearts you will ever encounter. The tenderness with which he tends to his sister (and his mom) is uncanny in a boy his age. And though he loves playing music, he traded in his beloved drum set for a keyboard for his sister because the Neurologist and therapist said it was the best home therapy to work both sides of her brain at once and improve her memory loss.

    Won’t you help this strong, resilient family? Any donation would be greatly appreciated and together we can make a HUGE difference in this family’s life this Fall. 

    Your donation is TAX DEDUCTIBLE:

      • Because Our Backyard Foundation, inc. is a 501(c)(3), your donations are tax deductible. Furthermore, OBF is run completely by volunteers which means that 100% of the monies collected (minus the paypal fees) will go directly to the Kloznick family.
      • Please share this page on social media and with others who may want to help.
      • Please continue to send love and prayers up for this family.
      • If you prefer to send a check, please send to:

               Our Backyard Foundation
               LanDan Olivia Fundraiser
               1504 Hunters Mill Pl, Oviedo, FL 32

      About Our Backyard FoundationOur Backyard Foundation is a 501(c )(3) charitable organization dedicated to improving the quality of life for individuals and families in need within our local communities. The foundation was created for the sole purpose of giving back, and helping those who would not otherwise be afforded the opportunity for assistance.  Whether they are individuals with special needs or life-threatening illnesses, or families who have fallen on hard times, we believe that we have a responsibility to our neighbors, to make a difference, and to improve the health and well being of the members within the communities in which we live and serve. We are tremendously excited to bring friends, families, neighbors, local businesses and community leaders together to make this happen!To learn more visit http://www.ourbackyardfoundation.com

Won’t you help this strong, resilient family? Any donation would be greatly appreciated and together we can make a HUGE difference in this family’s life this Fall. 
Your donation is TAX DEDUCTIBLE:




Because Our Backyard Foundation, inc. is a 501(c)(3), your donations are tax deductible. Furthermore, OBF is run completely by volunteers which means that 100% of the monies collected (minus the paypal fees) will go directly to the Kloznick family.


Please share this page on social media and with others who may want to help.


Please continue to send love and prayers up for this family.


If you prefer to send a check, please send to:



         Our Backyard Foundation         LanDan Olivia Fundraiser         1504 Hunters Mill Pl, Oviedo, FL 32




About Our Backyard FoundationOur Backyard 
Foundation is a 501(c )(3) charitable organization dedicated to 
improving the quality of life for individuals and 
families in need within our local communities. The foundation was 
created for the sole purpose of giving back, and helping those who would
 not otherwise be afforded the opportunity for assistance.  Whether 
they are individuals with special needs or life-threatening 
illnesses, or families who have fallen on hard times, we believe that we
 have a responsibility to our neighbors, to make a difference, and to 
improve the health and well being of the members within the communities 
in which we live and serve. We are tremendously excited to bring 
friends, families, neighbors, local businesses and community 
leaders together to make this happen!To learn more visit http://www.ourbackyardfoundation.com

story:
Short Summary

I really enjoy every day of my study in New Hampshire Institute of Healing Arts.  I love giving free massages for friends and clients. I am so grateful you trust  me  and let me massage your beautiful bodies. 

I would like to start fundraising for my future massage therapist room with good quality massage table and chairs, organic cotton sheets, towels, good quality oils and essential oils, Aura Soma color system to harmonize client's energy fields during massage. 

What We Need & What You Get

I will be happy to do healthy desserts for you! or body work when I get my license 


The Impact

Your contributions will make me so happy to buy a beautiful, ergonomic and healthy equipment. You will be get a exceptional massage benefits and will uplift your energy.

I understand if you can not contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Get the word out and make some noise about my campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

Namaste! Thank you! Merci! Спасибо!
