story:
Come and try out our meditation cushions in the

practice room at wisdom 2.0, 2018! 

Wisdom 2.0 is the premiere gathering focused on exploring the intersection of wisdom and technology. Our flagship gathering is in San Francisco each year, where thousands of people from over 30 countries join in asking: How do we live with greater presence, purpose, and wisdom in the digital age?

 

At project full, our mission is to create products for meditation and mindfulness that combat modern stresses and inspire us to live our fullest life. The benefits of meditation are numerous, including:

  •  Higher brain functioning 
  •  Lowered stress, anxiety levels and depression
  •  Increased cardiovascular and immune health 
  •  Increased attention, focus and clarity 
  •  Increased productivity and creativity 
  •  Increased sense of compassion and empathy 
  •  Increased emotional self regulation 
  •  Experience of being calm and connected 

Inspired by tradition and modern by design, the triangular shape outlines the body in the seated cross legged position providing support exactly where it's needed. 

   1.  Place bottom floor cushion. 

   2.  Align top support cushion handle up with the bottom cushion hook. 

   3.  Sit on the edge of the top support cushion allow hips to fall forward.  

   4.  Cross legs and rest feet on floor cushion. 

   5.  Place hands in comfortable position, close eyes and begin meditation.

Extended periods of time sitting on the floor often leads to back pain and general discomfort. The full meditation cushion provides for correct posture, body alignment, stability and comfort.

1.  Proper Body Alignment 

the top support cushion elevates the hips, allowing the knees to drop naturally and rest comfortably on the base cushion below.

2.  Correct Posture 

the proper position of the hips and knees aligns the spine and neck, resulting in perfect seated posture.  

3.  Comfort and Stability 

a combination of both correct body alignment and posture allows for proper blood circulation to the legs and knees, solving the common problem of numbness in the lower body caused by a cross-legged position.

We have sourced the most sustainable, ethical materials possible, using only 100% organic cotton and hemp textiles and organic fill.

buck wheat hulls  

  • are an organic alternative to synthetic fills 
  • are breathable and cooling 
  • are hypoallergenic 
  • last up to 10 years 
  • mold to fit your body 

organic cotton 

  • is breathable 
  • hypoallergenic 
  • organic crops are not treated with toxic insecticides, herbicides and GMO's like conventional crops, which are harmful to farmers, the eco system and us as consumers  
  • uses way less water than conventional cotton crops

With your pre-order and purchase, you will receive a discount code for 80% off your yearly or lifetime subscription of the welzen app and 25% off of your first yearly subscription of the calm app! 

 http://www.welzen.org http://www.calm.com

Not only for mediation, the full cushion is versatile. The handle makes it portable and easy to store. Use it as a laptop pillow, for kids and pets or extra floor seating for gatherings with family and friends at home.

Extremely soft and durable with double stitched seams, the cushion covers are removable for machine washing. Encased is a zippered liner holding the organic buckwheat hulls and cotton fill. Our customized scent pack, made from dried flowers and herbs, can be added to the fill to create a calming and relaxing aroma when in use.

Project full is a team of architects and industrial designers who are passionate about meditation and committed to living a mindful lifestyle. Focusing on great design, simplicity, ethical and sustainable materials, we believe that our products should inspire us to live our fullest life. We have over ten years experience designing, building and managing built projects, furniture and products. We are extremely thankful for your support in helping us to achieve our goals and are excited for you to join us along the journey. We truly believe in what we do and we hope you do too! 

The world needs more meditation :)

-project full (Steven & Kali) 

We have selected San Francisco based non-profit and manufacturer Designing a Difference to manufacture the full meditation cushions. This means that every pledge will not only support us but will also help to support creating job opportunity and employment for people with employment barriers, through a workforce training program in manufacturing. The goal is to create a system that leads people into stable lifestyles through employment, while developing the local manufacturing industry and creating durable, handmade products right here at home. It is very important to us that the full meditation cushions are made by hand here in the USA and we are thrilled to be able to support this great initiative. We see it as a win-win!
story_txt:
Come and try out our meditation cushions in thepractice room at wisdom 2.0, 2018! Wisdom 2.0 is the premiere gathering focused on exploring the intersection of wisdom and technology. Our flagship gathering is in San Francisco each year, where thousands of people from over 30 countries join in asking: How do we live with greater presence, purpose, and wisdom in the digital age?
 At project full, our mission is to create products for meditation and mindfulness that combat modern stresses and inspire us to live our fullest life. The benefits of meditation are numerous, including:
 Higher brain functioning 
 Lowered stress, anxiety levels and depression
 Increased cardiovascular and immune health 
 Increased attention, focus and clarity 
 Increased productivity and creativity 
 Increased sense of compassion and empathy 
 Increased emotional self regulation 
 Experience of being calm and connected 
Inspired by tradition and modern by design, the triangular shape outlines the body in the seated cross legged position providing support exactly where it's needed.    1.  Place bottom floor cushion.    2.  Align top support cushion handle up with the bottom cushion hook.    3.  Sit on the edge of the top support cushion allow hips to fall forward.     4.  Cross legs and rest feet on floor cushion.    5.  Place hands in comfortable position, close eyes and begin meditation.Extended periods of time sitting on the floor often leads to back pain and general discomfort. The full meditation cushion provides for correct posture, body alignment, stability and comfort.1.  Proper Body Alignment the top support cushion elevates the hips, allowing the knees to drop naturally and rest comfortably on the base cushion below.2.  Correct Posture the proper position of the hips and knees aligns the spine and neck, resulting in perfect seated posture.  3.  Comfort and Stability a combination of both correct body alignment and posture allows for proper blood circulation to the legs and knees, solving the common problem of numbness in the lower body caused by a cross-legged position.We have sourced the most sustainable, ethical materials possible, using only 100% organic cotton and hemp textiles and organic fill.buck wheat hulls  
are an organic alternative to synthetic fills 
are breathable and cooling 
are hypoallergenic 
last up to 10 years 
mold to fit your body 
organic cotton 
is breathable 
hypoallergenic 
organic crops are not treated with toxic insecticides, herbicides and GMO's like conventional crops, which are harmful to farmers, the eco system and us as consumers  
uses way less water than conventional cotton crops
With your pre-order and purchase, you will receive a discount code for 80% off your yearly or lifetime subscription of the welzen app and 25% off of your first yearly subscription of the calm app!  http://www.welzen.org http://www.calm.comNot only for mediation, the full cushion is versatile. The handle makes it portable and easy to store. Use it as a laptop pillow, for kids and pets or extra floor seating for gatherings with family and friends at home.Extremely soft and durable with double stitched seams, the cushion covers are removable for machine washing. Encased is a zippered liner holding the organic buckwheat hulls and cotton fill. Our customized scent pack, made from dried flowers and herbs, can be added to the fill to create a calming and relaxing aroma when in use.Project full is a team of architects and industrial designers who are passionate about meditation and committed to living a mindful lifestyle. Focusing on great design, simplicity, ethical and sustainable materials, we believe that our products should inspire us to live our fullest life. We have over ten years experience designing, building and managing built projects, furniture and products. We are extremely thankful for your support in helping us to achieve our goals and are excited for you to join us along the journey. We truly believe in what we do and we hope you do too! The world needs more meditation :)-project full (Steven & Kali) We have selected San Francisco based non-profit and manufacturer Designing a Difference to manufacture the full meditation cushions. This means that every pledge will not only support us but will also help to support creating job opportunity and employment for people with employment barriers, through a workforce training program in manufacturing. The goal is to create a system that leads people into stable lifestyles through employment, while developing the local manufacturing industry and creating durable, handmade products right here at home. It is very important to us that the full meditation cushions are made by hand here in the USA and we are thrilled to be able to support this great initiative. We see it as a win-win!

story:
Up to "80% of common infections are spread by the hands"...masks only offer partial protection; gloves and other options are not sustainable, economical, or always practical.


CùShield EDS products are a better solution.

 

 

 

 

Your Daily EDS!

(Every Day Safety)

This one-of-a-kind, multi-use, multi-product is here to protect you, your family, and your friends in every day life.  Using the power of Copper, CùShield has created the world's first line of EDS personal protective products.  With unparalleled aesthetics and innovative designs CùShield not only keeps you safe and protected, it does so with convenience, fun, and style.  Say goodbye to awkward rubber gloves, wet wipes, tissues in your pocket and whatever other bulky, germ magnet you have been carrying around - it's time to truly have something safe and protective for your everyday needs.

 

Introducing: The CùShield,

Let's Make Tomorrow Safer, Today

 

The Challenge

Our story starts when the world as we know it changed.  With the advent of the recent global pandemic the demand for PPE (Personal Protective Equipment) skyrocketed.  We saw the struggle to find, use, and dispose of traditional pieces of PPE.

Masks help to address airborne transmission, but are only half of the solution.  Transmission by touch/surface contamination remains a significant concern.  However, apart from harsh chemicals or intense UV light, the only protection from this threat came in the form of single-use, disposable, or consumable products....until now.

We at CùShield saw the need for something better.  Something easier to use.  Something more environmentally sustainable.  Something safer.

 

The Solution

Harnessing the amazing properties of Copper, we set out to develop a line of products that could be used in our daily lives.  We knew that these products would have to be intuitive to use, easy to carry, reusable, and above all safe.

After extensive development we are proud to present our Every Day Safety (EDS) line of personal protective products.

These are the patent pending CùShield Stylus, CùShield Handkerchief, and CùShield Pouch.

 

The Team 

Founder of CùShield, and inventor of its flagship products, Douglas McGregor is a career engineer, product developer, and life-long creator.  With a background in Chemical Engineering and 20 years in manufacturing with multiple Fortune 500 companies, Douglas has a passion for innovation and bringing new ideas to market.

 

 

And Jay King | www.Jays.me - the other half and partner with CuShieldUSA. With a background as a successful entrepreneur, inventor, innovator and business specialist for over a decade, Jay and Doug immediately became compatible, hence... the CuShield, and are making their way to other products, inventions and innovations for the world to embrace, in addition to everything they have done thus far. 

We've all been through a lot, but our world and our lives must move forward.  With your support, CùShield is here to help make that path safer for all.

 

The Technology

The secret to our technology is right in our name, Cu.  Copper is legendary for its anti-microbial properties.  

Modern science has repeatedly demonstrated copper's unique ability to destroy biological contaminants, yet remain safe for everyday use.  

The Science

 

While copper can destroy many biological contaminants upon contact, some contagions persist for a short time before being rendered inactive.  This is where other products on the market fall short, as their contact surfaces are left exposed.

The unique, and proprietary designs of the CùShield EDS products protect the user from the copper contact surfaces, eliminating possible contamination and allowing the copper to do its job.

 

Now it's time...

 

 

Now, Let's Compare Visually

 

 

 

 

Your Contribution

We are asking for your support to raise $5,000.  Our supply chain is set, our materials are sourced and our factories are waiting to begin, but we need your help to set it all in motion.

Your contributions will allow us to purchase our raw materials in cost effective quantities, and in turn help bring our Every Day Safety products to more people.

Why Flexible Funding?

We've worked hard to source our materials, select our manufacturing partners, and design our products to allow for the most cost effective production possible. 

This isn't just good business, it ensures that regardless of our campaign's outcome we will get our products to where they'll do the most good...in the hands of our backers. 

While we hope to share our Every Day Safety products with the world, we also want to support businesses here at home.  When you support CùShield know that your support doesn't end with us, as we proudly manufacture our products here in the USA. 

As an added bonus, sourcing materials and production locally means that we can be present for every step of the manufacturing process in order to ensure unparalleled quality. 

 

Production Phase

We have begun!

Production has been a wild ride, and we need your help to continue.  Your contribution will help us expand our capabilities so that we can bring CùShield products to the world...giving everyone the tools to conquer what comes next.

 

 

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Support comes in many forms, and we appreciate them all.  

So please, if you like what we're doing here...spread the word, visit us on our social media pages, like us, and share. If you are unable to pledge, please help us by simply sharing this on your social media! That is a great pledge to us as well! Thank You!

 

From all of us at CùShield,

Thank you.

 

 

Can I order CùShield​ products in larger quantities?

You bet!  Please contact us directly for more information.

Are CùShield products available for licensing or custom promotional applications?

We'd love to work with you in any way we can to get CùShield EDS products in the hands of your customers.  Please contact us directly to discuss.

There are rubber gloves, wipes, sanitizer, and other “no-touch” devices on the market…why CùShield?

Unique:  Our designs and products are superior to other options on he market because they not only help to combat the spread of contagions (unlike rubber gloves), its active component never runs out (like wipes and sanitizer), and they protect you from the contact surfaces when not in use (unlike other “key” products).

Proprietary:  Our designs are Patent Pending, and are on file in the United States Patent and Trademark Office.

Made in the USA:  Local manufacturing allows us to bring you a superior product at a great price.

How does it all work?

In short, Copper.  Copper is known to possess potent anti-microbial properties often killing biological contaminants on contact, and in some cases within hours.  We use 99.9+% copper for the contact surfaces of our products to ensure maximum activity.
But don't take our word for it, check out the articles below:
www.insider.com/does-copper-kill-germs-and-viruses
www.smithsonianmag.com/science-nature/copper-vi...
https://sfamjournals.onlinelibrary.wiley.com/do...

Despite the overwhelming research regarding copper's abilities and properties, strict regulations exist defining what product attributes may be claimed.  Accordingly, please note that we are not making any specific claims that the CùShield EDS product line will cure, treat, or prevent anyone from being infected with the SARS-CoV-2 virus or any other pathogen.

What's with the thing over the “u”?

CùShield is ultimately about one thing, protection. This is something we wanted to emphasize with our name and logo. The shield is self-explanatory, as is the Cu (the atomic symbol for copper), but we wanted something extra to drive home the idea. Cù comes from the Scottish Gaelic for dog or hound, mankind's everpresent companion and protector....just like CùShield.

Can I and how do I clean my CùShield​ products?

While the copper used in our Every Day Safety personal protective takes care of itself, your CùShield products can be cleaned much like any other personal accessory.  We recommend hand-washing only, though sanitizer may be used as well.

Like any copper item, the contact surfaces may develop a patina over time and with use. This does not impact or degrade its protective abilities.  Mild abrasives or copper polishes may be used on the Stylus if you would like to restore its factory appearance.

Will COVID affect production?

Thus far COVID-19 has had not affected our production. All of our US production facilities are working in full force. We don't foresee any delays due to the corona virus.

Will the delivered products be exactly like the ones pictured?

Not necessarily; they will be even better. We are always looking to optimize our products and reserve the right to make modifications in the interest of making your CùShield EDS products even better. Our initial production runs were awesome, but we always are striving for better.

Are you planning to offer upgrades?

Yes, we have some awesome ideas for stretch goals. When the campaign reaches a certain funding amount we’ll unlock these upgrades! Tell your friends about CùShield and we'll all get there faster!

Is there a warranty?

Yes! We use on the highest quality material and construction, and we stand behind our products. All CùShield products are warranted for 30 days from receipt to be free from manufacturing defects. If you need any support after that you can reach our US Based support team by phone or email.

Do you offer worldwide shipping?

Yes, we offer shipping for all countries.

How much is Shipping?

Please refer to the individual perks for shipping information.

Who is responsible for any additional taxes, duties or VAT?

The backer is responsible for all duties and taxes, please check your country's import duties before purchasing. CùShield products ship from the United States.

story:
Why did we create Liftigo?

In very little time, technology has exploded in the market. Today, it is possible to open locked doors with facial recognition, we are about to have self-driven cars, can order cabs with our smartphone, and the list goes on.

However, when it comes to Gyms, most of the times, we still have to sit or talk with someone to sign memberships. According to “the guardian, 2015”, Gyms a suffering few knocks in these times. First, there was an OFT investigation into unfair membership contracts. Then there was the Twitter storm after a Gym refused to cancel the contract of a couple when the woman became pregnant and the man had lost his job. And this double-dip recession certainly isn't helping membership numbers. 

In addition to the above, there is currently also no holistic way of finding and comparing Gyms on one platform. People often struggle to find the right gym, because there is not enough information out there. 

For this reason, many potential members abandon their initial research for a gym because of the hassle of setting up a subscription, and the commitment of having to pay every month a certain amount of money, even if people stop going to gym during a specific period (e.g. summer vacation etc.).



With a problem comes a solution. Considering all of the problems and challenges discussed previously, we decided to create and provide a platform that connects gyms with potential new customers, and users with various gym offerings.

Users can search by location as well label, types, comparing ratings, reviews, etc. The user can then make the search more specific, using search parameters such as gym amenities like Swimming Pool, Spa area, or other features. The platform will show all subscription passes available in every region you are searching.

Getting great feedback from Web-summit 2017!

Liftigo was selected to exhibit as an ALPHA at Web-summit 2017 in Lisbon, Portugal. We have been talking to very experienced entrepreneurs and they all gave us create feedback and one even said, “Finally someone created this!”

 

 

 

Thank you! 

Thank you so much for supporting this project. Your support makes it possible. Backing us you get both the Liftigo passes to one of our gym partners and become a contributor to an exceptionally promising project in the world of digital fitness.

 Thank you!

story:
CLEAN BRUSHES. BEAUTIFUL SKIN.

 

The Nessa Brush Spa is a revolutionary system that quickly cleans and dries makeup brushes 100% hands free, making it the most effective, efficient, and easiest system to use on the market.

Its simple process will make it possible to clean your brushes any time, giving you back your precious time and helping to make your skin more beautiful.

 

For press and PR inquiries, please contact press@nessabrushspa.com
story_txt: CLEAN BRUSHES. BEAUTIFUL SKIN. The Nessa Brush Spa is a revolutionary system that quickly cleans and dries makeup brushes 100% hands free, making it the most effective, efficient, and easiest system to use on the market.Its simple process will make it possible to clean your brushes any time, giving you back your precious time and helping to make your skin more beautiful. For press and PR inquiries, please contact press@nessabrushspa.com

story:
We are two designers based in Copenhagen, Denmark that have sought to perfect the meditation stool and bring social responsibility to the furniture industry.

 

A stool that helps you sit

Sedeo is the latin word for "I settle."  it is a stool for meditation and low-seating. The design builds on research which has shown that by tilting the surface of our seating at a 15-20 degree angle, tension is released in our lower back and our spines are able to follow their natural curve. This makes sitting upright more relaxing and almost effortless.

As featured on

    

Ready for adventure

Sedeo is designed using an innovative joint system, with legs that slot in and out, making the stool easy to store and take with you. This also prevents the need for other materials such as metal hinges in the construction, which reduces Sedeo's environmental footprint and increases it's long-term durability.

 

 

We have designed a carrying case for sedeō, made with organic cotton canvas and a sling for wearing over your shoulder. Think of it as a modern quiver.

 

 

 

 

Built to last

 

Sedeō is made with solid oak, one of the hardest and longest-lasting woods in existence. The wood is FSC certified and sourced from a forest near Frankfurt Germany, which produces oak known for its high quality and tight grain.

 

Made with Ethics

 

The stool and carrying case are made by a social enterprise in Copenhagen Denmark called HKI, which trains people who have historically been outside the job market in woodworking, sewing, box making, and other trades.

The oak is FSC certified, and trees are harvested and replanted following strict social and environmental regulations.

The textile (organic cotton) is hand-spun at a certified fair-trade weaving cooperative in India.

The packaging is 100% post-consumer recycled cardboard manufactured in Copenhagen at HKI. It is a nice box you will want to re-use.

 

Design

Inspired by the Scandinavian design tradition, Sedeō is designed with an eye for detail. The final design is the result of rigourous prototyping, testing edges, joints, angles, thicknesses, materials, and finishes. Recently, Sedeō was featured on DANISH, an online magazine featuring Scandinavian design and architecture.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Where your contribution goes

The supply chain and production of Sedeo has already been set up and tested. The contributions from Indiegogo go directly to the costs of material and production.

 

Risks & Challenges

The primary risk is in the delivery timeline given the physical capacity of the workshop. For this reason we have limited the total number of stools in the existing perks. If these sell out, we will open new tiers with later delivery dates. This will ensure that first backers will receive the first shipment, and later backers can have realistic estimates of when they can expect to receive their sedeō.

Now Shipping

The first 200 stools have now shipped and our production is up and running. Stools are delivered with tracking and insurance by PostNord. Costs for shipping are included in the perks. Due to customs handling, delivery time is 2-3 weeks.
story_txt: We are two designers based in Copenhagen, Denmark that have sought to perfect the meditation stool and bring social responsibility to the furniture industry. A stool that helps you sitSedeo is the latin word for "I settle."  it is a stool for meditation and low-seating. The design builds on research which has shown that by tilting the surface of our seating at a 15-20 degree angle, tension is released in our lower back and our spines are able to follow their natural curve. This makes sitting upright more relaxing and almost effortless.As featured on      Ready for adventureSedeo is designed using an innovative joint system, with legs that slot in and out, making the stool easy to store and take with you. This also prevents the need for other materials such as metal hinges in the construction, which reduces Sedeo's environmental footprint and increases it's long-term durability.  We have designed a carrying case for sedeō, made with organic cotton canvas and a sling for wearing over your shoulder. Think of it as a modern quiver.    Built to last Sedeō is made with solid oak, one of the hardest and longest-lasting woods in existence. The wood is FSC certified and sourced from a forest near Frankfurt Germany, which produces oak known for its high quality and tight grain. Made with Ethics The stool and carrying case are made by a social enterprise in Copenhagen Denmark called HKI, which trains people who have historically been outside the job market in woodworking, sewing, box making, and other trades.The oak is FSC certified, and trees are harvested and replanted following strict social and environmental regulations. The textile (organic cotton) is hand-spun at a certified fair-trade weaving cooperative in India.The packaging is 100% post-consumer recycled cardboard manufactured in Copenhagen at HKI. It is a nice box you will want to re-use. DesignInspired by the Scandinavian design tradition, Sedeō is designed with an eye for detail. The final design is the result of rigourous prototyping, testing edges, joints, angles, thicknesses, materials, and finishes. Recently, Sedeō was featured on DANISH, an online magazine featuring Scandinavian design and architecture.         Where your contribution goesThe supply chain and production of Sedeo has already been set up and tested. The contributions from Indiegogo go directly to the costs of material and production. Risks & ChallengesThe primary risk is in the delivery timeline given the physical capacity of the workshop. For this reason we have limited the total number of stools in the existing perks. If these sell out, we will open new tiers with later delivery dates. This will ensure that first backers will receive the first shipment, and later backers can have realistic estimates of when they can expect to receive their sedeō.Now ShippingThe first 200 stools have now shipped and our production is up and running. Stools are delivered with tracking and insurance by PostNord. Costs for shipping are included in the perks. Due to customs handling, delivery time is 2-3 weeks.

story:
My name is Madeleine. I am a 68 y.o reverse retiree, nurse and inventor. I have developed AmiToe  to relieve the Hallux Valgus pain I have suffered since age 18. Hallux Valgus (early bunion) is a genetic condition which bends the large toe inwards. The whole foot gets strained leading to a loss of quality of life. 

Amitoe is a toe exerciser to wear during ‘me time’ or when relaxing in bed. It is validated by trials.

Our goal:

  • Create a cost effective batch of AmiToes
  • Raise public awareness of this silent epidemic
  • Get TGA approval 

After I could barely walk, I sold my house and moved into a retirement village. A year later, I was walking just fine and I was surprised to go downhill without pain. Upon seeing my progress, my family convinced me to go to market.

Therapeutic outcomes include:

  • Disappearance of pain going down and up the hill
  • Kidney recovery after near failure from chronic pain killer use
  • Elimination of cramps during partner intimacy
  • Disappearance of sciatica like pain
  • Moreton neuroma (sensation of walking on a stone) complete relief
  • Ability to wear dress shoes again
  • Ability to go for long walks again
  • Weight loss thanks to exercise

WebMD reports that 23% of people aged 18 to 65 are affected.  Treatment for this hidden epidemic are tentative at best and costly. 

Surgery comes in at upwards of $8,000. There is no guarantee of pain relief. Immobilisation is required for weeks and pain is very high.  Hallux Valgus and bunions return in 15% of cases.

Custom orthotics distribute the foot load at a cost of $600 every three years. I personally benefitted from them, however the hallux valgus itself progressed and so did pain. 

Splints also exist, and none of them could give me relief. I made my own since 1996. I still woke at night from pressure points, rashes etc…Still they helped me to go to sleep at first, but woke me later. 

Join me to change Hallux Valgus outcome for countless people working on their feet.

It will mean:

  • Amitoe will be proposed as a viable treatment option to sufferers, by General Practitioners and Podiatrists alike.
  • Trials sufficiently large will prove the preventative benefits. 
  • We will gain TGA approval
  • Young sufferers will realise it is actually genetic and complications can be averted
  • Together we can enhance the quality of life of many people and prevent early onset of a sedentary life style for countless others

Take advantage of  Amitoe’s discounts during the campaign.

Cash contributors will receive an upscaled gift of appreciation from Madeleine invented some time ago.

For those who can’t contribute, please pass on the message. Share the AmiToe leads as they come to you. 

Join us on Facebook, LinkedIn and on our website.

story:
NitraPro is a protein shaker, unlike any other protein shaker. With design on our mind, we introduce to you the most durable, hygienic and stylish shaker ever.

Back this project and smell the success, not the build-up of bacteria. 

 

Keep it clean and avoid bad smells. 

Have you ever forgotten to clean your shaker after a workout and opened it hours later just to be horrified by that pungent smell? Not only is this an unpleasant feeling but you’re also experiencing the build-up of bacteria taking over your bottle. We designed the NitraPro bottle to put an end to this. Our 100% hygienic kitchen-grade stainless steel bottle prevents bacteria build-up, is easy to clean and doesn’t absorb those nasty odors. 

 

 

High quality, 100% BPA free. 

All the materials we use are of the highest quality to ensure your shaker remains odor-free and the taste is not affected. We only use 100% BPA free, food-grade certified materials making NitraPro the most hygienic shaker ever.

 

Wanna stay cool…or hot? 

Keep your drink at its original temperature for up to 12 hours with the double-walled insulation. That sweat caused by condensation won’t be an issue. You’ll be the only one sweating after a successful workout and ready to enjoy a drink at its perfect temperature in or out of the gym. 

 

No moving parts for maximum efficiency.

Tired of attracting attention when you shake your bottle? Get a smooth, clump-free protein shake every time. The parts in our bottle fit perfectly together, making the smoothest shake, silently and effortlessly. No one will hear, try it yourself!

 

Twist cap to prevent leakage.   

Have you ever opened your bag only to find everything inside drenched by your drink? Many bottles leak and sweat, ours has been engineered to fit your active lifestyle. No matter how you place your bottle, the BPA free twist cap is extra tight, so your drink stays in the bottle, where it belongs.

 

A bottle made to last you a lifetime. 

We need to take care of our planet and sustainability is our main concern. Instead of wasting your money on low-quality shakers, save your money and the planet. NitraPro is made of only the highest quality materials used in professional kitchens worldwide made to last and withstand the test of time.

Unlike plastic bottles, no chemicals will get into your drink. Choose the best for yourself and our planet.

 

Not into protein shakes? No problem! 

Our shaker is capable of much more than just blending protein. It adapts to your lifestyle. You can store your hot and cold drinks, and the agitator doubles as a fruit infuser or ice holder. Enjoy coffee, tea, water, smoothies or even a cheeky cocktail in your stylish bottle created not only for the gym.

Take your NitraPro bottle anywhere you go. Its sleek design fits in all standard size cup holders. The silicone strap was created for a comfortable grip with the possibility to attach your bottle to anything.

story:
Is there a mother who does not need or deserve to have her own personal assistant? How about an Intelligent Personal Assistant? DoulaRoom assist mothers from conception to age 3, and soon to be age 6. We all know how serious a job it is to be a mother, but how about adding some fun.

So what is a Doula?

A Doula is someone who provides support to a mother and her family during pregnancy and into parenting. (Can I please have two!)

So what have we built for mothers? Our global team of medical and technical experts have spent the last two years building and piloting a mobile app. The app is integrated with a wireless activity band, wireless mother baby weight scale, and a wireless blood pressure monitor to help the mother easily track activities that are critical to her health and that of her baby.

DoulaRoom is far more than a mobile app, it is an Intelligent Personal Assistant, IPA. It supports the mother, her family and medical providers from conception to age three. We are already extending the IPA to support the family to age six and will continue extending it through tween and teen. 

Hey Siri …

We think if Siri got pregnant or had a family; this is what she would use (Apple, if Siri reproduces we will give you a DoulaRoom IPA and a Mother Bundle).

DoulaRoom is designed to Inform, Support and Empower the mother with trusted Information, the ability to communicate how and when she needs Support and to Empower her with the knowledge to participate in decisions that are in the best interest of her and her family.  

DoulaRoom was designed to Inform, Support and Empower a Mother. We believe that the responsibility a mother carries deservers our support



So where is the fun?

We have added a journal and photo gallery to record the pregnancy and parenting journey (whoever said, it is the journey and not the destination that is the real adventure did not have swollen feet or walk around with baby food on their shoulder without knowing). We are adding the ability to create a baby book starting from the earliest days of pregnancy using the journal and photo gallery.

And as added fun: During pregnancy there are only a few times, in the doctor’s office, that baby’s heartbeat can be heard. Now with our DoulaRoom Fetal Doppler, a mother can record the sound of her baby’s heartbeat in the IPA and share it with anyone, anywhere. The doppler also records the heart rate, which can be shared with her medical team.

An extra BONUS for our Indiegogo friends.

As an extra special to our Indiegogo friends who are helping with our pre launch …. You will receive the next version of our IPA at no charge… a Cognitive Intelligent Personal Assistant.  We are using the IBM Watson super computer to add cognitive capabilities to the IPA. When you join us on Indiegogo you will be the first in the world to have Watson read your daily journal entries and provide you with insight into how you are feeling with our DoulaRoom Mood Meter.

Feel the LOVE, we guarantee it 

We have had such great feedback on the Intelligent Personal Assistant and are so confident that you will love it; we are going to offer the first 25 people a guarantee of LOVE. If in 30 days you do not LOVE this IPA, send back the mother bundle and we will refund your Perk $. No risk, only the offer of loving it.

We think this is really important and exciting!

We met with the American Society of Clinical Pathology who created Partners for Cancer Diagnosis and Treatment in Africa . The ASCP-led coalition provides rapid cancer diagnostics, care, and treatment to underserved areas in Sub-Saharan Africa. They believe timely diagnostic services can reduce up to 80% of the cancer disease burden.

In meeting with their CEO and senior team we discussed how extending our Intelligent Personal Assistant could provide mothers with cancer education, prevention, early detection and treatment monitoring for herself and her family. Since DoulaRoom was created to help mothers and their families on a global basis, we jumped at the opportunity to support this ASCP initiative and in our small way join the fight against cancer. We were humbled by their compliments about our IPA and excited to start building a collaborative vision to benefit mothers and their families globally.

Our Commitment to mothers everywhere!

To demonstrate our commitment, we will be using our Indiegogo DoulaRoom Angelfund to support the building and delivery of cancer education, prevention and treatment features to support the ASCP initiative. Our vision is to include these features into our Intelligent Personal Assistant so that mothers and their families will benefit on a global scale.

Please read about the ASCP.org and their amazing work with #ASCPGlobalImpact.

www.ascp.org/Global-Impact/home.html

This video was created to give you the ability to see how DoulaRoom can change the life of the mother, family, friends and medical providers. From conception to age 3, and soon beyond. 


We had some fun with the scene where four fathers are trying to figure out

 how they can be more supportive.

(In all our videos we did not use actors, we chose to have real people with real experience. The videos will not win an Academy Award but we thank our brave friends and family for sharing in our passion.)


 Our People, Our Passion, Our Team

How our team got here is simple; we brought together a group of diverse medical, technical and business people who are top in their fields and shared one common passion, to leave a positive impact on the world. We cannot name everyone but we sincerely need to that our long list of career professionals who continue to provide their time and passion to be part of something incredible. 

Our sincere THANK YOU to everyone who joins us. First, to mothers and their medical providers. We appreciate your feedback and by listening to you we can continue to improve DoulaRoom for future mothers and families. You will be part of our success! Secondly, to those who help our DoulaRoom Angel Fund so that together we can bring the support to women in developed and developing countries.

We take our responsibility to help others seriously. We will be using our Indiegogo DoulaRoom AngelFund to support the building and delivery of cancer education, prevention and treatment features to support the ASCP initiative.

Your name, or person you specify will be posted as a DoulaRoom Angel supporter on our DoulaRoom.com website.

$    5 Bronze Angel

$  20 Silver Angel

$  50 Gold Angel


Includes:

1) The DoulaRoom Intelligent Personal Assistant,

2) Wireless Mother Baby Weight Scale,

3) Wireless Family Blood Pressure Monitor,

4) Wireless Activity Band with a Classic Black strap,

5) 2 additional interchangeable straps for the Activity Band in Baby Blue and Pretty Pink.

(Save $235. After the Indiegogo prelaunch, the price will be $349 plus $30 shipping)



Listen to the sound of your baby’s heartbeat before they are born then record it with your Intelligent Personal Assistant. You can share it with anyone, anywhere you choose. 

This offer is only in combination with the DoulaRoom Mother Bundle. 

(Save $90. After the Indiegogo prelaunch, the price will be $129 plus $30 shipping)


This perk is for doctors, midwives, midlevel providers, hospitals, and clinics who want to try the DoulaRoom Provider IPA with an iPad and Mother Bundles (each bundle includes all 4 devices plus the IPA).

Includes:

1.The DoulaRoom Medical Provider Intelligent Personal Assistant

2.The DoulaRoom Mother Intelligent Personal Assistant

3. Select either 10 or 25 of the Mother Bundles

4. Apple iPad for the Medical Provider IPA (two iPads for the 25 bundle selection)


DoulaRoom Medical Provider with 10 Mother Bundles and 10 Fetal Dopplers.

(Save $1,974. After the Indiegogo prelaunch, the price will be $4,864 plus shipping)


DoulaRoom Medical Provider with 25 Mother Bundles and 25 Fetal Dopplers.  

(Save $4,729. After the Indiegogo prelaunch, the price will be $10,725 plus shipping)


Our DoulaRoom team would like to explore partnership, sponsorship, cross promotional opportunities with medical, government, church and community groups, corporate organizations, or mobile carriers to develop a win-win-win relationship. 

•  Win 1 – expand support to women everywhere 

•  Win 2 – benefits to your organization 

•  Win 3 – expansion of our DoulaRoom IPA globally 

We are very focused on where we are going but everyone needs help. We would like to partner with organizations that want to help us expand the DoulaRoom benefits. Our idea is to have open discussions with like-minded organizations.

Let make something happen together $100.

Private meetings with pre-release information and discussions about where we can do together.

What are some of the activities that are important to Mother & Baby?

1. Monitoring Weight Gain


Eating for Two? Current studies show that too much weight gain during pregnancy could be dangerous to the mother and baby. Too little weight gain can also be harmful. WOW! Do you know what your optimal weight gain is week by week? How do you track it? The DoulaRoom IPA and wireless scale will chart your progress daily.

2. Taking Blood Pressure


Under Pressure?  So, you have never had a problem with blood pressure why worry now? Many women start out with normal blood pressure but then have it rise during pregnancy. Increased blood pressure could lead to decreased oxygen to the placenta and to the baby, which could lead to decreased growth and brain development in the baby. The DoulaRoom IPA and wireless blood pressure monitor helps you track and record your blood pressure daily or as recommended by your medical provider. We are making it easy for you.

3. Tracking Water Intake


Cheers! Most studies and experts agree that expectant mothers should drink 6-8 glasses of water a day. Why? Too little water could lead to blood clots or urinary tractinfections. Later in pregnancy it could lead to cramping and false labor. It is also very important for women experiencing nausea to have adequate water intake. DoulaRoom makes it easy for you to track your daily water intake.

4. Remembering to take Vitamins


Who can remember? Under a providers direction there are three main supplements, which are commonly recommended. A prenatal vitamin is a general dietary supplement, which helps baby’s over all development. Folic acid is important early in pregnancy for the prevention of neural tube defects. Iron levels in pregnancy are important to ensure adequate oxygen in the blood to support baby’s growth & development. DoulaRoom helps you track and remember to take the supplements recommended by your health care provider.

5. Recording Mother’s Activity


Give me credit! Activity is an important part of a normal pregnancy. Studies have shown that too little activity can lead to unhealthy weight gain during pregnancy, which may contribute to post partum depression. 10,000 steps a day is a goal for everyone, however who has time to count and record their steps? The DoulaRoom IPA and activity bracelet will track your steps automatically.

6. Listening to Baby’s Heart Beat and record Activity


Who kicked me? Mothers usually start becoming aware of baby’s movement between 18-22 weeks and from thispoint she should be aware of baby’s movement at least once a day. From 36 weeks until delivery, it is important to track the baby’s kick counts daily. Kick counts involve recording the baby moving 10 times in 2 hours once a day. The DoulaRoom IPA helps remind you and record this activity.

Baby’s Heart Beat

Here is the WOW factor! Every mother is different but it is normal from 12 -14 weeks to be able to hear the baby’s heart beatusing a fetal doppler. Today, this happens during prenatal visits. Now, with the DoulaRoom IPA and Fetal Doppler, it is possible to hear, record and share the sound of the baby with family and friends regardless of geographic distance.

7. Recording of Discomforts Felt and concerns 


How many more weeks? Minor discomforts are a normal part of pregnancy. The majority do not cause any problems but it is important to know what is normal and when to seek medical advice. DoulaRoom helps you record your symptoms and directsyou to some of the top authoritative sources of information. It is important toshare all of your symptoms and concerns with your medical provider.

Mothers have spoken … 

By listening to new mothers, we have already added new features the DoulaRoom Intelligent Personal Assistant. Your feedback will allow us to add more.


The Impact!

The expectant mother is the center of her circle of care! DoulaRoom lets the mother decide who she shares her information with. She can share it with her partner, parents, best friend, family, medical team, or anyone she chooseswithout concern for information security or geographic distances. Imagine your mom, best friend, or sister who lives across the country or in another part of the world being able to see how you are doing, know how you are feeling and hearing your baby’s heart beat. What if your partner is in the military or has to travel for work? DoulaRoom will enable them to support you and experience the pregnancy with you.

We have also created a DoulaRoom medical provider app so that your entire care team (Doctors, Nurses, Midwifes, etc.) can have, only with your permission, a summarized view of your information which they can expand to see what is happening.


Frequently Asked Questions?

Shipping/Handling and Taxes/Duties/Customs

Our goal at DoulaRoom is to create a global community of mothers, their family and friends, and medical teams who can share and improve the parenting experience. We have worked really hard to reduced financial barriers with a one world global shipping cost. There is a financial risk for us but we want to be able to ship to anyone anywhere. We trust you understand that we need to reserve the option, if your location shipping cost is prohibitive we will to contact you and discuss how can find a solution working together or refund your money. Any applicable local taxes/duties/customs have not been included in the cost.

What is a Doula?

A Doula is a non-medical person who provides emotional and physical support to a woman and her family before, during and after a child is born. The assistance of a Doula is often associated with improved maternal and fetal health. A Doula performs no medical duties or decision-making, deferring instead to nurses, midwives, and doctors.

What is DoulaRoom?

DoulaRoom is a mobile Intelligent Personal Assistant for mothers and their families. It provides current online resources, which empowers the mother to be an active and informed collaborator in her healthcare during her pregnancy and into parenting. As well, it enables her to share her physical and emotional journey with her support circle, regardless of their geographic location. DoulaRoom, like a Doula, performs no medical duties or decision-making, deferring instead to nurses, midwives, and doctors. 

Can DoulaRoom work with the integrated devices on iOS and Android?

DoulaRoom is designed to work on both the Android and iOS operating systems. Both phone and tablets are supported. The seamless integration of the wireless blood pressure monitor, wireless weight scale and wireless activity band require the phone or tablet to be compatible with Bluetooth 4.0 standards. Most current phones and tablets support this. To make it easier for you we have added the link below where you can check for compatibility. Even if your phone or tablet are of an older version we have made it so you can manually input all the device information and still benefit from the features to Inform, Support and Empower you. 

List of Devices Supporting Bluetooth 4.0:

http://www.bluetooth.com/Pages/Bluetooth-Smart-Devices-List.aspx

What do I do with the DoulaRoom devices after I have my baby?

Your personal health is just as important to you, your family and your newborn after you deliver as it was during your pregnancy. Our medical team’s advice is to continue to using the wireless weight scale, wireless blood pressure monitor and wireless activity band to help manage your health. If you are not planning to have any more pregnancies you could gift or sell the fetal doppler.

Is DoulaRoom a medical app or a technology app?

Neither. DoulaRoom is designed to provide a better way for mothers to be informed and empowered during their pregnancies and into parenting. Not all pregnancies are at risk but; wouldn’t it be nice to know what the important things like blood pressure and fetal heart rate are on a daily basis? This is not about technology. Technology is being leveraged to keep the mother informed with trusted sources of information and to help her circle of care be there to support her regardless of geographic boundaries.

Does my midwife, doctor, or care teams have to sign up? What if I do not want to share my information? 

The DoulaRoom Intelligent Personal Assistant provides benefits to the mother independent of her medical care team. It is her choice who she wants to bring into her circle of care. If a midwife, doctor, clinic, or hospital sign up and download the DoulaRoom provider app, the mother can invite them to join her circle. Our goal is to bring together a mother and her circle of care to provide a better supportive experience.  

How can this help women in developing countries?

While most developing countries have a shortage of medical support, they commonly have extensive mobile network coverage. Our goal is to work with local governments and agencies to help identify which mothers are at risk so they can be prioritized and the scarce medical resources can be utilized where they are needed most.

Risks and Challenges

As you know we are on a mission to Inform, Support and Empower women worldwide throughout their parenting journey. You have now heard that our company philosophy is based on three pillars: 

1) Provide trusted and current medical information

2) Leverage and integrate the best technology 

3) Listen to you, so we can work together to continuously improve the IPA to support mothers globally.

Let’s start with how we are dealing with thechallenges, which could impact delivering the IPA on time and staying true to our philosophy.

1) PROVIDE THE BEST AND MOST CURRENT MEDICAL INFORMATION 

We have a team of medical professionals who have and will continue to search for current and reliable sources of information and research. When we provide information in DoulaRoom we supply credits and references for further reading from the source.

2) LEVERAGE AND INTEGRATE THE BEST TECHNOLOGY 

One of our early and most strategic decisions was to partner with IBM for the development, integration and operation. This was a critical decision for DoulaRoom and we are delighted with the support and commitment we have received in this partnership. We are running our business in their secure cloud environment. This gives us the confidence for scalability, availability and privacy to take this IPA to the world. Working with IBM we will be able to Inform, Support, and Empower mothers around the world. 

The DoulaRoom IPA runs on Apple iOS and Google Android operating systems. We have worked directly with our device manufacturers to build devices, which meet our specifications of integration, quality and ease of use. The manufacturers we have partnered with are focused on the medical industry, which means they know the importance of quality.

3) LISTEN TO YOU, so we can work together to continue to improve the IPA and support mothers globally. 

We already have the DoulaRoom Intelligent Personal Assistant in use by mothers, but we need your help to use the IPA and tell us how to make it better. We are very confident from feedback that it will make a difference in your life. Our entire team is committed to deliver the best mobile experience to support mothers everywhere.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can participate in our Perks, that is great and thank you, but even if you can not we would ask for your help spreading the word. If everyone who reads this could repost this on your Facebook or other social media, or simply tell 5 friends you will be helping us to build the best mobile experience to Inform, Support, and Empower mothers, their families, friends and medical providers around the world. 

THANK YOU, We appreciate your help!
story_txt:
Is there a
mother who does not need or deserve to have her own personal assistant? How
about an Intelligent Personal Assistant? DoulaRoom assist mothers from conception to age 3, and soon to be age 6. We all know how serious a job it is to be a mother, but
how about adding some fun. 
So what is a Doula?
A Doula is someone who provides
support to a mother and her family during pregnancy and into
parenting. (Can I please have two!)
So what have we built for mothers?
Our global team of medical and technical experts have spent the last two years
building and piloting a mobile app. The app is integrated with a
wireless activity band, wireless mother baby weight scale, and a wireless blood
pressure monitor to help the mother easily track activities that are critical
to her health and that of her baby. 
DoulaRoom is far more than a mobile
app, it is an Intelligent Personal Assistant, IPA. It supports the mother, her family and medical
providers from conception to age three. We are already extending the IPA to support the family to age six
and will continue extending it through tween and teen.  
Hey Siri …
We think if Siri got pregnant or
had a family; this is what she would use (Apple, if Siri reproduces we will
give you a DoulaRoom IPA and a Mother
Bundle).
DoulaRoom is designed to Inform, Support and Empower the mother
with trusted Information, the ability to communicate how and when
she needs Support and to Empower her with the knowledge to participate
in decisions that are in the best interest of her and her family.  
DoulaRoom was designed to Inform, Support and Empower a Mother. We believe that the responsibility a mother carries deservers our supportSo where is the fun?
We have added a journal and photo
gallery to record the pregnancy and parenting journey (whoever said, it is the
journey and not the destination that is the real adventure did not have swollen
feet or walk around with baby food on their shoulder without knowing). We are
adding the ability to create a baby book starting from the
earliest days of pregnancy using the journal and photo gallery. 
And as added fun: During pregnancy there are only a few times, in the
doctor’s office, that baby’s heartbeat can be heard. Now with our DoulaRoom Fetal Doppler, a mother can
record the sound of her baby’s heartbeat in the IPA and share it with anyone,
anywhere. The doppler also records the heart rate, which can be shared with her
medical team.
An extra BONUS for our Indiegogo friends.


As an extra special to our Indiegogo
friends who are helping with
our pre launch …. You will receive the next version of our IPA at no
charge… a Cognitive Intelligent Personal Assistant.  We are using the IBM Watson super computer to
add cognitive capabilities to the IPA. When you join us on Indiegogo you will
be the first in the world to have Watson read your daily journal entries and
provide you with insight into how you are feeling with our DoulaRoom Mood Meter. 

Feel the LOVE, we guarantee it 

We have had such great feedback on the Intelligent Personal Assistant
and are so confident that you will love it; we are going to offer the first 25
people a guarantee of LOVE. If in 30 days you do not LOVE this IPA, send back
the mother bundle and we will refund your Perk $. No risk, only the offer of
loving it.
We think this is really important and exciting!We met with the American Society of Clinical Pathology who created Partners
for Cancer Diagnosis and Treatment in Africa . The ASCP-led coalition
provides rapid cancer diagnostics, care, and treatment to underserved areas in
Sub-Saharan Africa. They believe timely diagnostic services can reduce up to 80% of the
cancer disease burden.
In meeting with
their CEO and senior team we discussed how extending our Intelligent Personal
Assistant could provide mothers with cancer education, prevention, early
detection and treatment monitoring for herself and her family. Since DoulaRoom
was created to help mothers and their families on a global basis, we jumped at
the opportunity to support this ASCP initiative and in our small way join the
fight against cancer. We were humbled by their compliments about our IPA and
excited to start building a collaborative vision to benefit mothers and their
families globally. 
Our Commitment to mothers everywhere!To demonstrate
our commitment, we will be using our Indiegogo DoulaRoom Angelfund to support the building and delivery of cancer
education, prevention and treatment features to support the ASCP initiative.
Our vision is to include these features into our Intelligent Personal
Assistant so that mothers and their families will benefit on a global
scale. 
Please read
about the ASCP.org and their amazing work with #ASCPGlobalImpact.
www.ascp.org/Global-Impact/home.htmlThis video was created to give you the ability to see how DoulaRoom can change the life of the mother, family, friends and medical providers. From conception to age 3, and soon beyond. 
We had some fun with the scene where four fathers are trying to figure out
 how they can be more supportive.
(In all our videos we did not use actors, we chose to have real people with real experience. The videos will not win an Academy Award but we thank our brave friends and family for sharing in our passion.)
 Our People, Our Passion, Our Team
How our team
got here is simple; we brought together a group of diverse medical, technical
and business people who are top in their fields and shared one common passion,
to leave a positive impact on the world. We cannot name everyone but we sincerely need to that our long list of career professionals who continue to provide their time and passion to be part of something incredible. Our sincere THANK YOU to everyone who joins us. First, to mothers
and their medical providers. We appreciate your feedback and by listening to
you we can continue to improve DoulaRoom for future mothers and families. You
will be part of our success! Secondly, to those who help our DoulaRoom Angel Fund
so that together we can bring the support to women in developed and developing
countries.
We take our responsibility to help others seriously. We will be using our
Indiegogo DoulaRoom AngelFund to support
the building and delivery of cancer education, prevention and treatment features
to support the ASCP initiative.

Your name, or person you specify will be posted as a DoulaRoom Angel
supporter on our DoulaRoom.com website.
$    5 Bronze Angel
$  20 Silver Angel
$  50 Gold Angel
Includes:
1) The
DoulaRoom Intelligent Personal Assistant, 
2) Wireless Mother
Baby Weight Scale, 
3) Wireless Family
Blood Pressure Monitor, 
4) Wireless
Activity Band with a Classic Black strap, 
5) 2 additional
interchangeable straps for the Activity Band in Baby Blue and Pretty Pink. 
(Save $235. After the Indiegogo prelaunch, the price will be $349 plus $30 shipping)







Listen to the sound of your baby’s heartbeat before they are born then record it with your Intelligent Personal Assistant. You can share it with anyone, anywhere you choose. 
This offer is only in combination with the DoulaRoom Mother Bundle. 
(Save $90. After the Indiegogo prelaunch, the price will be $129 plus $30 shipping)


This perk is
for doctors, midwives, midlevel providers, hospitals, and clinics who want to
try the DoulaRoom Provider IPA with an iPad and Mother Bundles (each bundle
includes all 4 devices plus the IPA).
Includes:
1.The
DoulaRoom Medical Provider Intelligent
Personal Assistant
2.The
DoulaRoom Mother Intelligent Personal Assistant
3. Select
either 10 or 25 of the Mother Bundles
4. Apple iPad
for the Medical Provider IPA (two iPads for the 25 bundle selection)


DoulaRoom
Medical Provider with 10 Mother Bundles and 10 Fetal Dopplers.
(Save $1,974. After the Indiegogo prelaunch, the price will be
$4,864 plus shipping)

DoulaRoom
Medical Provider with 25 Mother Bundles and 25 Fetal Dopplers.  
(Save $4,729. After
the Indiegogo prelaunch, the price will be $10,725 plus shipping)




Our DoulaRoom
team would like to explore partnership, sponsorship, cross promotional
opportunities with medical, government, church and community
groups, corporate organizations, or mobile carriers to develop a
win-win-win relationship. 
•  Win 1 – expand support to women
everywhere 
•  Win 2 – benefits to your
organization 
•  Win 3 – expansion of our DoulaRoom IPA
globally 
We are very
focused on where we are going but everyone needs help. We would like to partner
with organizations that want to help us expand the DoulaRoom benefits. Our idea
is to have open discussions with like-minded organizations. 
Let
make something happen together $100.
Private
meetings with pre-release information and discussions about where we can do together.


 

What
are some of the activities that are important to Mother & Baby?
1. Monitoring Weight
Gain





Eating for
Two? Current
studies show that too much weight gain during pregnancy could be dangerous to
the mother and baby. Too little weight gain can also be harmful. WOW! Do you
know what your optimal weight gain is week by week? How do you track it? The
DoulaRoom IPA and wireless scale will chart your progress daily.
2. Taking Blood
Pressure




Under
Pressure?  So, you
have never had a problem with blood pressure why worry now? Many women start
out with normal blood pressure but then have it rise during pregnancy.
Increased blood pressure could lead to decreased oxygen to the placenta and to
the baby, which could lead to decreased growth and brain development in the
baby. The DoulaRoom IPA and wireless blood pressure monitor helps you track and
record your blood pressure daily or as recommended by your medical provider. We
are making it easy for you.
3. Tracking Water
Intake




Cheers! Most studies and experts agree
that expectant mothers should drink 6-8 glasses of water a day. Why? Too little
water could lead to blood clots or urinary tractinfections.
Later in pregnancy it could lead to cramping and false labor. It is also very
important for women experiencing nausea to have adequate water intake.
DoulaRoom makes it easy for you to track your daily water intake.
4.
Remembering to take Vitamins




Who can
remember? Under
a providers direction there are three main supplements, which are commonly
recommended. A prenatal vitamin is a general dietary supplement, which helps
baby’s over all development. Folic acid is important early in pregnancy for the
prevention of neural tube defects. Iron levels in pregnancy are important to
ensure adequate oxygen in the blood to support baby’s growth & development.
DoulaRoom helps you track and remember to take the supplements recommended by
your health care provider.
5.
Recording Mother’s Activity




Give me
credit! Activity
is an important part of a normal pregnancy. Studies have shown that too little
activity can lead to unhealthy weight gain during pregnancy, which may
contribute to post partum depression. 10,000 steps a day is a goal for everyone,
however who has time to count and record their steps? The DoulaRoom IPA and
activity bracelet will track your steps automatically.
6. Listening
to Baby’s Heart Beat and record Activity



Who kicked me? Mothers usually start becoming aware of baby’s movement between 18-22 weeks and from thispoint she should be aware of baby’s movement at least once a day. From 36 weeks until delivery, it is important to track the baby’s kick counts daily. Kick counts involve recording the baby moving 10 times in 2 hours once a day. The DoulaRoom IPA helps remind you and record this activity.
Baby’s Heart Beat




Here is
the WOW factor! Every
mother is different but it is normal from 12 -14 weeks to be able to hear the
baby’s heart beatusing a fetal doppler.
Today, this happens during prenatal visits. Now, with the DoulaRoom IPA and Fetal
Doppler, it is possible to hear, record and share the sound of the baby with
family and friends regardless of geographic distance.
7. Recording
of Discomforts Felt and concerns 




How many
more weeks? Minor
discomforts are a normal part of pregnancy. The majority do not cause any problems
but it is important to know what is normal and when to seek medical advice.
DoulaRoom helps you record your symptoms and directsyou to some of the top authoritative sources of information. It is
important toshare all of your symptoms and
concerns with your medical provider.

Mothers
have spoken … 
By listening
to new mothers, we have already added new features the DoulaRoom Intelligent Personal Assistant. Your
feedback will allow us to add more. 




The
Impact!
The expectant
mother is the center of her circle of care! DoulaRoom lets the mother decide
who she shares her information with. She can share it with her partner, parents,
best friend, family, medical team, or anyone she chooseswithout concern for information security or geographic
distances. Imagine your mom, best friend, or sister who lives across the
country or in another part of the world being able to see how you are doing,
know how you are feeling and hearing your baby’s heart beat. What if your
partner is in the military or has to travel for work? DoulaRoom will enable
them to support you and experience the pregnancy with you.
We have also
created a DoulaRoom medical provider app so that your entire care team
(Doctors, Nurses, Midwifes, etc.) can have, only with your permission,
a summarized view of your information which they can expand to see what is
happening. 
    

Frequently Asked Questions?

Shipping/Handling
and Taxes/Duties/Customs
Our goal at
DoulaRoom is to create a global community of mothers, their family and friends,
and medical teams who can share and improve the parenting experience. We have
worked really hard to reduced financial barriers with a one world global
shipping cost. There is a financial risk for us but we want to be able to ship
to anyone anywhere. We trust you understand that we need to reserve the option,
if your location shipping cost is prohibitive we will to contact you and
discuss how can find a solution working together or refund your money. Any applicable
local taxes/duties/customs have not been included in the cost. 

What is a
Doula? 
A Doula is a non-medical
person who provides emotional and physical support to a woman and her family
before, during and after a child is born. The assistance of a Doula is often
associated with improved maternal and fetal health. A Doula performs no medical
duties or decision-making, deferring instead to nurses, midwives, and doctors.
What is
DoulaRoom? 
DoulaRoom is
a mobile Intelligent Personal Assistant for mothers and their families. It provides current
online resources, which empowers the mother to be an active and informed
collaborator in her healthcare during her pregnancy and into parenting. As
well, it enables her to share her physical and emotional journey with her
support circle, regardless of their geographic location. DoulaRoom, like
a Doula, performs no medical duties or decision-making, deferring instead
to nurses, midwives, and doctors. 

Can
DoulaRoom work with the integrated devices on iOS and Android?
DoulaRoom is
designed to work on both the Android and iOS operating systems. Both phone and
tablets are supported. The seamless integration of the wireless blood pressure
monitor, wireless weight scale and wireless activity band require the phone or
tablet to be compatible with Bluetooth 4.0 standards. Most current phones and
tablets support this. To make it easier for you we have added the link below
where you can check for compatibility. Even if your phone or tablet are of an
older version we have made it so you can manually input all the device
information and still benefit from the features to Inform, Support and Empower you. 
List of
Devices Supporting Bluetooth 4.0:
http://www.bluetooth.com/Pages/Bluetooth-Smart-Devices-List.aspx

What do I
do with the DoulaRoom devices after I have my baby?
Your personal
health is just as important to you, your family and your newborn after you
deliver as it was during your pregnancy. Our medical team’s advice is to
continue to using the wireless weight scale, wireless blood pressure monitor
and wireless activity band to help manage your health. If you are not planning
to have any more pregnancies you could gift or sell the fetal doppler.
Is
DoulaRoom a medical app or a technology app?
Neither.
DoulaRoom is designed to provide a better way for mothers to be informed and empowered
during their pregnancies and into parenting. Not all pregnancies are at risk
but; wouldn’t it be nice to know what the important things like blood pressure
and fetal heart rate are on a daily basis? This is not about technology.
Technology is being leveraged to keep the mother informed with trusted sources
of information and to help her circle of care be there to support her
regardless of geographic boundaries.
Does my
midwife, doctor, or care teams have to sign up? What if I do not want to share
my information? 
The DoulaRoom
Intelligent Personal Assistant
provides benefits to the mother independent of her medical care team. It is her
choice who she wants to bring into her circle of care. If a midwife, doctor,
clinic, or hospital sign up and download the DoulaRoom provider app, the mother
can invite them to join her circle. Our goal is to bring together a mother and
her circle of care to provide a better supportive experience.  

How can
this help women in developing countries?
While most
developing countries have a shortage of medical support, they commonly
have extensive mobile network coverage. Our goal is to work with local
governments and agencies to help identify which mothers are at risk so they can
be prioritized and the scarce medical resources can be utilized where they are needed
most. 
Risks and Challenges
As you know
we are on a mission to Inform, Support and Empower women worldwide throughout
their parenting journey. You have now heard that our company philosophy is
based on three pillars: 
1) Provide
trusted and current medical information
2) Leverage
and integrate the best technology 
3) Listen to
you, so we can work together to continuously improve the IPA to support mothers
globally.
Let’s start
with how we are dealing with thechallenges,
which could impact delivering the IPA on time and staying true to our
philosophy.

1) PROVIDE THE BEST AND MOST CURRENT MEDICAL
INFORMATION 
We have a
team of medical professionals who have and will continue to search for current
and reliable sources of information and research. When we provide information
in DoulaRoom we supply credits and references for further reading from the
source.
2) LEVERAGE AND INTEGRATE THE BEST
TECHNOLOGY 
One of our
early and most strategic decisions was to partner with IBM
for the development, integration and operation. This was a critical
decision for DoulaRoom and we are delighted with the support and commitment we
have received in this partnership. We are running our business in their secure cloud
environment. This gives us the confidence for scalability, availability and
privacy to take this IPA to the world. Working with IBM we will be able to Inform,
Support, and Empower mothers around the world. 
The DoulaRoom
IPA runs on Apple iOS and Google Android operating systems. We have worked
directly with our device manufacturers to build devices, which meet our
specifications of integration, quality and ease of use. The manufacturers we
have partnered with are focused on the medical industry, which means they know
the importance of quality. 
3) LISTEN TO YOU, so we can work together to continue to improve
the IPA and support mothers globally. 
We already
have the DoulaRoom Intelligent Personal Assistant in use by mothers, but we need your help to use the IPA and tell us how to make it better.
We are very confident from feedback that it will make a difference in your
life. Our entire team is committed to deliver the best mobile experience to
support mothers everywhere.
    Other Ways You Can Help 

If you can
participate in our Perks, that is great and thank you, but even if you can not
we would ask for your help spreading the word. If everyone who reads this could repost this on your Facebook or other social media, or simply tell 5 friends you will be helping
us to build the best mobile experience to Inform, Support, and Empower mothers,
their families, friends and medical providers around the world. 
THANK
YOU, We appreciate your help!

story:
The Impact

Your contribution will change lives of those suffering from and seeking to address post-deployment illness and help us to bring about the change required to improve healthcare for Veterans and Service members so that no one is left behind to suffer the invisible injuries of war. Every donation from now until May 14 will be matched 100% by a founding Board member (http://www.sgtsullivancenter.org/why-i-give.html). From now until the end of the campaign, let us thank you for a $35.00 donation by sending you a two-toned SSC branded mug.

Our Story and Mission

Founded in 2010 by the family of Marine Corps Sergeant Thomas Joseph Sullivan, an Iraq War Veteran who fell to post-deployment illness, the Sergeant Sullivan Center works to improve post-deployment health through Awareness, Research and Connection.

It is estimated that 800,000 Service members from the post-9/11 wars will experience post-deployment illness linked to war exposures; these illnesses are little acknowledged and poorly understood physical health problems associated with theater exposures that can lead to disability and death. However, many healthcare and supportive service organizations do not know that this substantial group of wounded warriors and their families exist, which leads to significant gaps in service and a sense of isolation for those suffering. You can help us change that. 

The Center works to fill these gaps by expanding public awareness of post-deployment illness and disseminating information about work being done to identify causes and remedies; and by promoting and providing support for scientific reseach and educational opportunities for healthcare providers, patients, and advocates.  

Our Pograms and Services

We are a small 501 (c) (3) organization, funded almost entirely by individual donors, with a limited budget. Neverthless, we have been able to establish impactful programs and services. These include the following:

  • Video Journalism project posting stories of Veterans and Healthcare Providers online to provide education to patients, providers, and advocates.
  • Post-Deployment Health Resource Online guide to healthcare options in the private and public sectors to persons with post-deployment illness, including new pages on nonprofit supportive services that connect patients with providers.
  • Education grants to support healthcare learning opportunities for patients, advocates, caregivers, and providers. 
  • Research grants to support research on post-deployment illness. 
  • For information on past projects, please see our website at www.sgtsullivancenter.org. 

Help Us Get the Message Out

This Indiegogo campaign is part of a social media initiative that will expand awareness about the post-deployment health crisis by distributing videos, online press releases, and using other social media tools reach out to the people impacted by post-deployment illnesses. How does your contribution to this campaign help?

  • $25 helps us professionally distribute a video to 250 viewers.
  • $50 helps 500 viewers see one of our videos through professional promotion.
  • $200 buys a busic online press release through a professional service.
  • $400 buys a premium online press relase with audiovisual components sent to multiple blogs an online new venues. 

This is the cost of educating the public and increasing awareness about post-deployment illness and esposure injuries. Help us spread the word by making a small donation.

Other Ways You Can Help

Donations are just one way to help. You can also help us increase awareness of post-deployment illness by distributing information about this project through social media or other methods with which you are comfortable. Spend some time watching the videos and reading the documents on our website. Educate yourself about post-deployment health concerns. The more people who understand post-deployment illness, and the struggles of those suffering from it, the more likely it is that we can work together as a nation for solutions to a problem that is devastating many families across the country.
