story:
The RAS Garden Hose Coupler - What Happens When An Experienced Silicon Valley Technology Engineer Turns His Focus Toward Innovating Your Garden!

WHAT: The RAS Coupler functions similarly to a Chinese finger trap – the hose easily pushes into the device. One half turn enables an easy, quick, leak-free attachment. To release the coupler, turn the device a quarter counter turn and pull on the release – the segments and coupler pulls free. The patent pending RAS Coupler is molded using high strength fiberglass reinforced plastic that is not only strong, but rust proof and extremely durable.

WHY: Connecting garden hoses together or to hose bibs, spigots, sprayers, and other garden fixtures, has often been a pain. Hoses are cumbersome, the fittings leak, and hoses often twist in the process of connecting them. “Quick” coupler-connectors have emerged recently, but most require a second part to be attached at the ends of all connections, the water flow is reduced, and internal parts are difficult to keep clean.
 
A leaking garden hose in his own yard inspired mechanical engineer Ron Smith to search for a solution. Smith, who has spent years in research and development in quick connecting devices and ratcheting anchor technology, developed the RAS Garden Hose Coupler to take advantage of his new thread attachment technology.

REQUEST: You can now pre-purchase the RAS Coupler to help raise capital for tooling costs for the injection molds required to manufacture and release the unique garden hose connector by early spring 2013.

OUR STORY: Starting his career at IBM in Silicon Valley, Ron Smith is named in patents critical for technology that enabled the development of hand held calculators, the video game industry, personal computers, and advanced manufacturing systems for building critical components of disc drives. Over the years Ron has engineered products for companies such as Apple Computer, Hewlett Packard, Seagate, Fairchild, Commodore, and Activision.

The RAS Garden Hose Coupler is based on the technology for the proven and patented RAS Ratcheting Anchor and the RAS Ratcheting Nut. Working prototypes of the RAS Garden Hose Coupler milled in aluminum and printed in low strength plastic have shown that the device functions as intended and is remarkably strong.

FAQ: Have a question? Please contact us!

Contact us: For questions, wholesale, or press inquiries, visit www.rascoupler.com or call +1 801.833.2224.

Shipping to U.S. addresses only.

Patent pending

story:
HAPPY HOLIDAYS...FOR THE ELDERLY


Giving to the elderly of our community is a great way to reach out and touch the people who are too often forgotten during this time of the year. 

This year during the week prior to Christmas, Mia and her friends will be delivering gifts to the 122 residents at the St. Barnabas Free Nursing Home located in Gibsonia, PA.  We could really use your help!

Be a sponsor for as many gifts as you like…

For $20 you can make a difference for a grandparent in your community

Sponsors can be individuals or businesses

story: I am a single working mom looking for a little assistance to make my daughter's life a little easier.  It all started in Alexei's first year at college.  AJ was apparently bitten by a tick native to the west coast found on black footed deer.  Alexei has a rare illness similar to Lyme disease. The first symptom that appeared was bilateral hearing loss.  As is often the case, AJ's hearing aids were not covered by insurance and cost nearly $5,000 out of pocket. Throughout the past year she has developed other symptoms and complications including arthritis, neuropathy, loss of appetite, and several others. Her mobility is very limited, and she uses a wheelchair to get around. It has been a very difficult year thus far because of the cost of the diagnostics, doctor visits, and medication and there is still the cost of further testing, medication, and physical therapy. While this has been happening I have been trying to make our home more accessible. I borrowed all I could from my retirement account and removed all the plants out front and filled in the planters with concrete and made a ramp so that she could navigate into the house from the street more easily.  I already purchased the items for the bathroom that were necessary to remodel it to be more accessible to her so the remaining cost is for the labor. Please contribute to both aid her in paying for her medical bills and for her to have an accessible home.

story: Help me move to Colorado and fight my cancer with cannabis oil.
story_txt: Help me move to Colorado and fight my cancer with cannabis oil.

story:
Hello,

  My name is Jeff Rocheleau and I am an independent missionary who travels to Manado, Indonesia . I have been working with humanitarian missions for about a year on a volunteer basis, gathering supplies, and equipment for the various needs of the less fortunate in 3rd world countries. I recently went to Mando, Indonesia to see for myself what the need was there and got to meet a couple of very dedicated resident doctors. They took me on a tour of the only government hospital. They took me to the Emergency Department and I broke down. The reason I broke down is because they have very limited resources to treat the 100's of patients they see on a daily basis. They have an old suction machine from the 1970's that only works part of the time and they only have 1 patient monitor that works most of the time. As the tour moved forward into the treatment rooms, I saw how the patients were in all on old rusty beds. They were being treated with just basic first aid supplies. Because  of the lack of life saving equipment most people die there depending on their sickness. Here in America we are so lucky to have what we have here as far as medical. The conditions there would make you cry, because compared to the treatment we get here in the United States, they get next to nothing. There is so much need, its  hard to know where to start. I was told by one of the resident doctors that they use rice cookers to sterilize instruments. I want to change that and bring technology and the best supplies and equipment to this part of the world, but I can't do it alone. I need your help to help the doctors in Manado save more lives with the life saving equipment the campaign money will provide.The funding I am trying to raise is for better working life saving equipment and medical supplies. The funding will also help with gaining 501c3 Status(its pretty expensive), shipping the equipment and supplies over to Manado. If there are any lawyers that specialize in setting up non-profit organizations, please send me a comment.

The equipment need is:

Ventilators

Incubators

Cardiac Monitors

Patient Monitors

Ultrasound Machine

C-Arm

AED's

Suction Machines

Gurney's

Hospital Beds

Kick Buckets

Infusion Pumps

Wheel Chairs

Nebulizers

Pulse Oximetry

Blanket Warmers

EKG Machine

Computers

Radio Systems to communicate with the incoming Ambulance

Back boards

C-Collars

Restraints

Code Cart

Blood/Fluid Warmer

IV Poles

Thermometers

Defibrillator with Monitor and battery

Equipment for housekeeping

Autoclaves

Exam Tables

The list goes on Etc.

Supplies Needed for Daily Use:

Tape

Guaze

Bag-valve-masks

C-collars

Gastric lavage supplies

Basic First Aid supplies

Various sizes of Syringes

Oral and Nasal Airways

IV tubing

Personal Protective Equipment & Supplies

Oxygen masks and cannula's

Stethoscopes

Catheters Various sizes

Suture

Suture removal kits

Gowns

Drapes

Surgical Gloves

Exam Gloves

Eye Protective Glasses

Hand Sanitizer

The list goes on..

 

With your help We can accomplish this goal together as a team, I started this campaign by myself, but soon found out that it's very hard to do by myself. If you donate, I promise that I will send pictures of how the donations are being used. I honestly would love to do this full time, because the need is so great, but like everyone else I have bills and only can take trips to Manado a couple times a year. To be honest, the reason why I like to be there is make sure the supplies and equipment get to where they are suppose to go and help the process of customs goes smoothly.  I have talked to some vendors to help and they have started to donate small amounts of supplies. Some of the Vendors that have donated supplies are: Medline, West Coast Medical, Beaver-Visitec, and Lawrence Memorial Hospital. I am planning another trip to Manado in July or August depending on funding to take some life saving equipment over. I will be taking 2 Reusable AED's, 2 Portable Suction Machines, and some other medical supplies. Its not much but its a start in the right direction. I would like to take more people with me in my trips to Manado in 2015 & 2016 to show them how the equipment and Supplies are impacting the patients and their quality of life.  

If you can please donate to the is campaign, you will be Blessed.

story:
You can donate ANY amount -- even $1.  Click below the perks listed available!

Short Summary

Please watch the video above! 

What We Need 

A message from Tao Expiditions. 


First reports coming in from our FIRST TEAM INTO CORON-- "devastation is widespread and people are in need... they have lost everything"

Crew in El Nido have started collecting FOOD, MEDICAL SUPPLIES, TARPAULIN FOR ROOFING AND CLOTHES-- First boat departs tomorrow morning for Coron and surrounding region... sounds like nothing is getting there from Manila any time soon... 

Now we are finding local fishing boats to run supplies up to the effected area... We need donations for BOAT FUEL as well as SUPPLIES.

Here are some photos of some of the people I met on the islands I visited -- The people your donation will be bringing relief to!

story:
Michelle has been dealing with some health challenges, and needs our help. 

We want to surprise her with a trip to Hippocrates Health Institute - where she can regain her strength and boost her immune system. It will be instrumental in her speedy recovery!

We love her contagious smile, and the sound of her laughter, her optimistic attitude and sweet ways. Michelle has enriched all of our lives with her light. Lets come together and help our beautiful, loving, caring amazing friend.

Help a yogi in need - good karma indeed :)

story: Daniela will buy a good-quality juicer so that she can juice greens and other healing veggies/herbs. The juice will help her heal stomach ulcers and other health issues she's been struggling with (bladder issues (IC), fatigue, candida, liver cyst, kidney and pancreas weakness, etc.). She is grateful for any support you can offer.

story:
WATER SPORTS TOURNIQUETS

Water Sports Tourniquets are tourniquets specifically designed for sea, air, and land use. 

 

(IMPORTANT: DONATE using the CONTRIBUTE NOW BUTTON or SELECT A PERK by CLICKING ON IT, which will let you claim the items listed.)

 
  • The Tourniquet Leash is the worlds only leash that is also a military style tourniquet. In the event of life threatening bleeding a surfer can rapidly apply a tourniquet to save their life or limb. 

  • The Amphibious Tourniquet is the only wearable tourniquet designed for air, sea, and land use. Easily worn on the body (wrist, ankle, etc), or equipment without the need to buy an additional holder like older tourniquets. Ideal for multiple water sports, activities, and numerous professions.

WHY DO YOU NEED ONE?

Did you know a person can bleed to death in as little as 3 minutes, and can wear a tourniquet for roughly 1-3 hours with little to no complications? Tourniquets are safe when properly applied and worn within the time parameters.

OMNAs STORY

The story of OMNA began in 2012 our founder was on a surf trip with friends. They took a boat across a river to get to an epic surf break and they ended up surfing until dark, which meant they had to paddle the river mouth back at night. The river was known for crocodiles and sharks, and it was prime feeding time. So they got into a tight group and paddled as fast as possible to the other side. Luckily, that night nothing happened, but it got him thinking. If something had happened there was no way to stop any bleeding, and get an injured person to the hospital alive.

 

 

That is where the idea of Water Sports Tourniquets (Tourniquet Leashes & Amphibious Tourniquets) was born! At first it seemed like the Tourniquet Leash was the only product, however, we soon realized that the Amphibious Tourniquet can be used beyond the water and ocean sports (Scuba, Snorkeling, Triathlons, Etc) in the air (Sky Diving, Pilots, Etc), and on land (Hiking, Military, Life Guards, EMS, Etc). 

Since OMNA's inception there have been numerous shark attacks, crocodile attacks, and all sorts of other life threatening bleeding injuries around the world, and we want to help people be ready & survive.

 

 

U.S. Army studies indicate that the use of tourniquets provides a 96% survival rate (Kragh et al)! Recent events in Australia, South Africa, and North Carolina have again highlighted the need to have tourniquets accessible at all times especially in the water:

Tourniquets Saved NC Shark Attack Victim

"Marie Hildreth, an off-duty EMT, happened to be vacationing at the beach and ran to provide aid after hearing someone yell, "Shark!"Seeing that the girl was hemorrhaging, Hildreth decided to put tourniquets on two different limbs, she told CNN's Anderson Cooper. One of the first on-duty paramedics at the scene, Tracy Carnes, credited bystanders' help for saving the girl's life."The outpouring of help from the bystanders was amazing," she told CNN's Erin Burnett. "The tourniquets were in place by the time I got there."

 

What about people who don't surf? 

The Amphibious Tourniquet is designed specifically for all other water sports, air, and land activities. Some of these are, but not limited to the following: Scuba-Diving, Snorkeling, Triathlons, Spearfishing, Military Operations, Life Guards / Surf Rescue, Hiking, Executive Protection, etc. It can be worn on the body, equipment, and velcro'd numerous places.

 

 

 

OMNAs Mission

Our mission is to revolutionize the surfing, water sports, and all manner of recreational & professional experiences / operations. We want people to have the means to save life when life threatening situations happen. Support us by contributing to this INDIEGOGO campaign and you can be one of the first people to enjoy surfing, the ocean, the beach, or whatever you do with OMNAs' Tourniquets.

 

PERKS

Supporters who contribute to our campaign will be rewarded with several different perks in the form of products, apparel, and packages.

 

Frequently Asked Questions

i. What are WATER SPORTS TOURNIQUETS?

Wearable Amphibious Tourniquets are tourniquets specifically designed for sea, air, and land use. 

  • The Tourniquet Leash is the worlds only leash that is also a military style tourniquet. In the event of life threatening bleeding a surfer can rapidly apply a tourniquet to save their life or limb. 
  •  The Amphibious Tourniquet is the only wearable tourniquet designed for sea, air, and land use. Easily worn on the body (wrist, ankle, etc), or equipment without the need to buy an additional holder like other tourniquets.

ii. What materials are used to make the tourniquets?

OMNA's tourniquets are built to last with military specification webbings, velcro, neoprene, and specifically engineered marine environment plastics and metal ware. Unlike other combat tourniquets made of cheap plastics and gross grain ribbon, OMNA delivers our customers a durable product that can withstand the worst of the sea, air, or land. 

iii. Why is using the leash cord bad?

1. It can't be secured in place.

2 Does not have a mechanical advantage to tighten.

3.The narrow cord can cause additional tissue & nerve damage.

vi. What is the expected delivery date?

October 2015.

v. What will be the retail price of this product?

The retail prices for these products are:

Tourniquet Leash:

Pro Comp Short Board - 5', 6': $44.99

Everyday Short Board - 6', 7', 8': $49.99

Big-Wave - 8', 10': $54.99

Long Board - 9', 10': $54.99

SUP: Coming Soon!

Body Board: Coming Soon!

Amphibious Tourniquet:

Amphibious Tourniquet: $34.99

vi. Will it ship anywhere in the world?

Yes, it will require international shipping to be added for all countries outside the U.S.A.

vii. What is your contact address?

www.omnainc.com/contactus

or

OMNA's Facebook,Twitter, Instagram, Youtube, Vimeo, Google+. 

Contributing and Perk Selection FAQ's 

Donate or Order by selecting a Perk:

There are two options. You can DONATE using the CONTRIBUTE NOW BUTTON or you can SELECT A PERK by CLICKing on it, which will let you order the perks associated with that contribution amount. 

Can I change my perk?

Each contribution made is recorded as a separate contribution with a separate perk. If you would like to receive a new perk, you can do this in a separate contribution. If you'd like to upgrade your existing perk or select a different perk, please contact the campaign owner. 

 

Can I claim multiple perks?

It's exciting to hear that you've found multiple perks you are interested in claiming! Please note, at this time, INDIEGOGO does not have a feature for you to be able to add multiple perks in a single transaction. As such, if you'd like to claim multiple perks, please make a new contribution for each perk.

Risks and challenges

 
  • Extensive engineering & testing to meet our strict standards for durability, strength, and comfort. (completed)
 
  • Filing and finalizing of multiple patents & patent types worldwide. (completed).
 

We took the crowdfunding route because it is a safe medium for people to place pre-orders, and we want our early supporters to be rewarded with extra perks. We also want to provide all of our supporters the added assurances of guaranteed protection of their investment with INDIEGOGO's framework. Safely support us now by placing pre-orders for the first shot at the next level of innovative gear and you will be rewarded with discounts, and other perks. Products will be delivered during or shortly after the campaign ends.

story:
(A Danish version can be found below the English -
En dansk version kan findes under den engelske)


Summary

We are in the process of building the Danish National Lacrosse Team.
We have been training, working hard and getting in shape to compete at the 2016 European Lacrosse Federation Championships in Hungary.
Raising this money will go great distances in helping us with travel, uniform, and equipment costs.
The tournament is hosted over a week in Hungary and will see 18 nations go head to head in the battle to be crowned Europe's best.

Since most of the guys on our team are students, they don't have much money for a trip like this. Lacrosse is a small sport in Denmark and we don't receive any form of public funding so the trip would be fully financed by the players themselves.


What We Need & What You Get

We are looking to raise $5000 to help aid with the cost of equipment and national team uniforms.

  • If we reach our funding goals, the money will be used for equipment (helmets and gloves) and uniforms. 
  • If we exceed our goals, the excess money will be used towards team traveling costs.
  • The items you receive by funding our team include official Danish National Lacrosse Team merchandise - see below
  • Every one that has donated goes into the draw to win a Ripwood Lacrosse shaft with the Danish Lacrosse Federation logo burnt into the wood or one of two 6 packs of 'Midtbane' beer from MunkeboMikrobryg.


The Impact

The Danish National Lacrosse Team program is run by volunteers and paid for by the team members themselves. A donation will help these volunteers and team members to become the first Danish National Lacrosse Team to compete internationally since 2010.


Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that some people can't contribute financially, but they can help us reach our goal by:

  • Sharing our campaign.
  • Following us via:
    Danish Lacrosse Federation on Facebook
    The Danish National Lacrosse Team on Facebook
    Danish Lacrosse on Twitter
    Danish Lacrosse on Instagram


Oversigt

Vi er ved at udvikle det danske lacrosse landshold.
Vi har trænet, arbejdet hårdt og kommet i form for at deltage i 2016 udgaven af det europæiske lacrossemesterskab i Ungarn.
De penge vi forsøger at samle ind vil hjælpe os med rejse-, tøj- og udstyrsomkostninger.
Turneringen holdes over en uge i Ungarn, hvor de 18 deltagende lande vil kæmpe for at blive kronet som europas bedste.

Da størstedelen af vores spillere er studerende har de ikke råd til en rejse som denne. Lacrosse er kun en lille sport i Danmark og vi får ingen offentlig støtte så alt skal betales af spillerne selv.


Hvad vi har brug for og hvad du får

Vi håber at samle 5000$ (ca 35000 kr) til hjælp med indkøb af spillertøj og udstyr.

  • Hvis vi når vores mål, vil pengene blive brugt til udstyr (handsker og hjelme), samt spillertrøjer.
  • Penge udover målet vil blive brugt til at dække rejseomkostninger.
  • De ting du får hvis du støtter vores hold inkluderer officelt udstyr fra det danske lacrosse landshold.
  • Alle der har givet penge få chancen for at vinde en Ripwood Lacrosse træstav med Dansk Lacrosse Forbunds logo brændt ind i træeet eller en af to 'Midtbane' øl  6 pakker af MunkeboMikrobryg.



Resultat

Landsholdsprogrammet bliver ledet af frivillige og er betalt af spillerne selv. Doneringer vil hjælpe disse frivillige og holdets spillere, så de kan blive de første danske deltagere i et internationalt mesterskab siden 2010.


Andre måder at hjælpe på

Vi har forståelse for at ikke alle kan bidrage med penge,
men I kan også hjælpe ved at :

  • Dele denne kampagne.
  • Følge os på:
    Dansk Lacrosse Forbund på Facebook
    Danske Landshold på Facebook
    Dansk Lacrosse på Twitter
    Dansk Lacrosse på Instagram

story:
F*UP Insurance

Are you prone to fuck-ups and the agony of constantly sleeping on the couch, in the garage or snuggling with Barney in the dog house!? Carnivore Club has created a pre-emptive way for spouses to be forgiven for any of their future transgressions... watch our hilarious video to see F-Up Insurance in action!

Impunity from F*UPs? 

Everyone understands the importance of building up "brownie points" in our important relationships with: spouses, bosses or even estranged second cousins. All the nice things we do throughout the year so that when we F*UP, all's forgiven! Well, after years of delivering extremely tasty gifts of cured meats to happy loved ones we have realized the miraculous forgiving power of meat. Yes, that's right, if you give your significant other a box full of delicious meat once a month, you can F-*Up as much as you want.

Men: "Accidentally" come home drunk and pee in the potted plants again? That's alright, you're covered by F*Up Insurance.

Women: "Accidentally" lose track of time at the spa while your hubby was home taking care of the kids... on poker/bowling/football/Cool-Ninja-Stuff  night with the boys? That's alright, F*Up insurance has got you covered too!

Kids: Fall victim to another lapse in judgement resulting a phone call from the principle/police/grandma/crazy-lady-nextdoor? That's right, F*UP Insurance.... just tell them your parents are busy. 



The Box

Handcrafted in the USA of American pine. The F*UP Insurance box is a premium wooden package that looks as good as the meats inside.


Impact: 

The result is that you can sleep well, in your own bed, with a big toothy smile knowing that your next F*UP is already forgiven.


Risks & Challenges

*Results may vary
*People with spouses that do not have a sense of humour may not be so forgiving.
*Probably not effective on vegetarians and vegans
*Does not work on people that genuinely don't like you.
*Does not expunge criminal acts


Additional Gear:

story:
This is literally the end of the road for our delivery vehicle, and possibly Reglue.

Our non profit, "Reglue" (Recycled Electronics and Gnu/Linux Used for Education) has been placing computers into the homes of disadvantaged kids in one form or another since 2005. Originally The HeliOS Project, we morphed into the non profit "Reglue" in 2012. We are a recognized 501(c)(3) organization. We are the same people, the same mission...just a different name.

She's Dead Jim.

Our organization is in serious jeopardy of not being able to  continue with our mission. Our trusty old 1996 Ford Explorer must be retired.

This vehicle has taken us to the Halls of Congress to lobby for amendments to the DMCA.  She took us to the banks of North Carolina after Hurricane Earl. We established a temporary mesh network for first responders to use until Internet service could be restored. However, day to day she works to pick up donated computers, make runs to Fry's Electronics, but most importantly; deliver computers to the kids that need them the most.


How we help and who we help - A snapshot

It was a good day for the Calzada family. Unable to afford a computer for the kids, and with only one vehicle in the family, Jose Calzada found himself taking 2 kids to the library after work to use a computer for their homework. That was two hours a day, 4 days a week. 50 weeks a year. 50 weeks a year that a loving, caring father gave his kids.

Those kids received a computer from Reglue just in time for Christmas last year. We give financially disadvantaged kids the computers they need. We put the technology into the hands that need it most. A computer that gave an over-worked dad a break. A computer that allows them to compete with their peers and ultimately; scholarships. That computer, along with hundreds of others have been delivered by our Ford Explorer delivery vehicle.

Unfortunately, the repair cost for our vehicle is more than we can justify spending. This old work horse has travelled over three hundred thousand miles. In addition, this Explorer is old enough, so as to be a concern for metal fatigue. Even if we did spend the $3,000.00+ needed to repair it, I cannot in good conscious allow passengers in our vehicle any longer. We cannot risk putting this kind of repair money into the transmission, just to have catastrophic engine failure the following week. More importantly, the headliner of this vehicle is quickly rotting. Every bump causes fine dust from that deteriorating fabric to rain down upon passengers. What that inhaled dust may contain is a serious concern.

At the minimum, we need you to help us raise. $5,000.00. That will allow us to at least put up a substantial down payment on a stable vehicle for our organization. Exhaustive attempts locally to have a vehicle donated have failed so we are turning to you to make this happen. That is, if we are without the means to deliver our technology to these future scientists, engineers, teachers and doctors. One of the kids from this generation will place the first human footprint on Mars.

Of course, it is our hope that this fund raiser takes off and we far surpass our goal.  We could then pay for a delivery van in full and not incur debt. But should we not meet our goal, we will put that money aside until we can figure out another way to raise the additional money we need. We have accomplished some fantastic things since 2005. It's my hope that you believe in our project enough to help us through this.

But that's now in your hands and we hope you find merit in our work.

A child's exposure to technology should never be predicated on the ability to afford it.

A word about perks.

We've included a number of extremely nice laptops and we've priced most of them far below current market value in order to get your donation. All of these machines have been inspected and tested by hardware professionals and all of them have been deemed to be as good as reconditioned. But as with all things technical and kit, sometimes things go wrong. We offer these machines on good faith, promising to do our best in providing you good value for your donated dollar. Should anything go wrong, we will do our best to make it right, but machines of this quality rarely cross our threshold. Just so you know.

story:
ALL money will be donated to the Canadian Cancer Scociety

$1000: I will donate my hair to cancer.

$2000: I will dye the remainder of my short hair pink after it is cut and donated.

$3000: I will wear a dress, high heels, and makeup for the entire week following the date that my goal is reached.

Receipts available upon request (only available for donations of $10 and up).

story:
Fecal Transplants. Amazing and disgusting!

Simply put, a FMT (Fecal Microbiota Transplant) is the process of putting fecal matter from a healthy person into the bowel system of an ill person. This process recolonizes the bowel with healthy bacteria. It's gross. We know. However, this is the best way to flood the body with billions of healthy bacteria. We are talking about probiotics to the tenth power! Unlike popular probiotics, which have a difficult time surviving the digestive environment, FMT's have proven successful in the treatment of numerous digestive ailments. FMT's are essentially an immune system transplant.

Mybiotica seeks to champion the development of a home FMT in pill form.  A simple, sanitary, economical delivery method for direct to consumer sales. This FMT pill will allow individuals to access an unprescidented, thousand year old treatment that can revolutionize the world of self-health.  

Like the rainforest, the healthy human microbiome is a balanced ecosystem. The correct balance of microbes keeps potential pathogens in check and regulates our immune system. Microbes also perform essential functions such as digesting food, synthesizing vitamins, and regulating the immune system. Studies have also linked the microbiome to human mood and behavior, as well as many gut disorders, eczema, and chronic sinusitis.

The number of scientific studies increases daily as FMT's become better known. These studies have linked the microbiome to allergies, fatigue, belly fat, skin problems, as well as serious disorders like eczema, chronic sinuses, bowel disease, chronic constipation, diarrhea, Crohn's disease, colitis, and C. Difficile. Odds are you know someone who has been diagnosed with one of these health maladies and the constant suffering associated with them. Until FMT's, there has been no successful long lasting treatment for many digestive diseases. FMT's are also being looked at for the treatment of Multiple Sclerosis, Parkinson's disease, and Rheumatoid Arthritis. People with digestive diseases can suffer from depression, anxiety, memory issues, and cognitive impairment. These issues often disappear with fecal transplants.


So who discovered FMT's anyway? No one knows for sure. All we know is that it was some thousand years before pharmaceuticals started selling their expensive, low percent success, high side effect drugs. History suggests it came from ancient Chinese healers—it doesn't really matter. What we can agree on is that they were certainly a bold and intrepid bunch. 

What does matter is that this homegrown procedure is becoming the darling of modern medicine because of its undisputed effectiveness. FMT's have been recently recognized by organizations like MIT, the Mayo Clinic, National Institute of Health, John Hopkins, and others. Before long, the best business minds will wrap it, brand it, and sell it as a new and improved, "supervision required", expensive treatment.

Home Fecal Microbiota Transplants have been inexpensive and completely natural. Our concern is that they are becoming better known in the medical industry, but not on main street. Why can't FMT's stay in the home where they have been for centuries? We are talking about a medical revolution in self-health here. As Dr. Robert Orenstein of the Mayo Clinic recently stated, "The microbiota of the gut is not inactive; it's diverse and plays many roles in health and well being that are just now being explored. This can only get bigger. It's like the beginning of the space program."


Obviously the big, we mean really big, drawback to home FMT's has been the "OK, that's really disgusting" factor. Mybiotica wants to make the process more sanitary and simple. No more "how to videos", no more approaching stool donors, no plastic containers, no blenders, no strainers, no spoons, no spills, no smell, no mess....no ick. Just a simple pill sold direct to the consumer at a fraction of the cost of a hospital administered FMT—if you are lucky enough to find a hospital that even knows about the treatment.


MyBiotica's Impact

We are believers in holistic health practices and the right of people to take charge of their own health. We are not anti-doctor or anti-big business—we are pro self-health. The revolution we want to champion is to take control of our health and money with one simple, proven effective, thousand-year-old home treatment. It is after all, your health.

One of our close loved ones was affected by an extreme bowel disorder for eight long years—it was Hell! She went to doctors and was told she had allergies to food, so she changed her diet, and added probiotics. When that didn't work, she was told it was a parasite. She was given harsh prescriptions and also took every vitamin under the sun. After years of trying everything, she finally found relief because of this amazing treatment. Because of the ick factor, people, even those the treatment brings relief to, are reluctant to suggest FMT's to others. We feel an urgency to bring this product to the world in a more approachable manner. We know that we can with your support! We can make FMT's available to millions who are suffering!

Initial studies indicate that the delivery of FMT’s in an easy to take pill form is not just possible, but indeed a growing reality. It will be clean, cost effective and above all effective in fighting illness. We encourage you to research the known health benefits of FMT's. Soon bureaucratic road blocks will likely be established to increase cost and restrict access to this amazing, thousand-year-old remedy.

OK, FMT’s may be a little gross. But, not as gross as the high priced pills, harmful antibiotics. and serums that big pharmaceuticals sell, that are often 30% effective in treating some of these same illnesses.

Paying thousands and thousands of dollars for limited health improvement....that's gross.

Modern diets heavy in fats and sugar that feed bad bacteria and anti-biotics that kill beneficial bacteria compromising the immune system....that's gross.

People suffering needlessly....that's very gross.

We had fun with the video, but be assured Fecal Microbiota Transplants are life saving serious. 110,000 people each year die and three million suffer from the intestine infection C. Difficile. FMT's are proven 90% effective in treating this one of many digestive illnesses. It is clinically proven that the digestive system is intrinsically connected to good health. A trillion bacteria cannot be wrong. Please join us in our efforts to bring the benefits of FMT's (Fecal Microbiota Transplant) to everyone, regardless of income. Join us in this exciting health re-discovery.  

Please join our grass roots campaign to develop an accessible, inexpensive, regulatory approved, FMT pill treatment for home use. Please help us help suffering people and their families worldwide. Not with a future cure, but with an existing cure that could use an advocate besides big business and big medicine.


The Goal

Clean, safe, affordable, and accessible Fecal Microbiota Transplants (FMT) in pill form for all who need it. 


The Mission

Our mission is to make a difference with your help:

To raise community awareness about FMT's and the critical microbiome balance they provide.

To team with established research services to continue development of clean capsules for FMT's.

To provide direct-to-customer sales of FMT capsules, keeping accessibility and affordability as priorities.

To champion the exciting self-health potential of FMT's, keeping them in the home where they started. Providing a counterpoint to big medicine that will make them costly to access.


Why Indiegogo  

There are several reasons we have chosen this approach:

  • This is not for discovery. This is to re-discover an ancient treatment that can potentially save the lives of hundreds of thousands and improve the health of millions of suffering people.
  • Exposure; this is a huge factor for us, not many know Fecal Microbiota Transplants even exist, and those who do, may not want to talk about it.
  • To bring hope to those who, once they know about it, may not be able to  access it.
Mybiotica wants to establish a safe, clean, and cost effective way to make this procedure available to everyone regardless of income. It has been used for thousands of years. There is no reason it needs to become the latest profit center for big medicine.

It's Mybiotica, it's Yourbiotica, there is no reason why it can't be Everyonesbiotica!

Join us in our effort to bring the benefits of FMT's (Fecal Microbiota Transplantation) to everyone. You can be part of this exciting health re-discovery.  Please help us raise the money to continue the development of accessible and inexpensive FMT treatments for people suffering worldwide.

Thank you for your support.


How can I help?

Glad you asked, we know that not all can help or contribute financially, but all can contribute to helping this info get out there:
  • Share this on Social Media. This is serious  sh*t. We made our campaign funny, because we want people to share this with as many people as possible. Too few people know what a FMT is. They work.
  • Share with family and friends through conversation and passing. Where else can you find funny sh*t that has the potential to help millions of suffering people?
  • Above all else if you know someone suffering suggest they check us out. They need to know about FMT's. They will be grateful!


Perks!

home where they have been for centuries? We are talking about a medical 
revolution in self-health here. As Dr. Robert Orenstein of the Mayo 
Clinic recently stated, "The microbiota of the gut is not inactive; it's
 diverse and plays many roles in health and well being that are just now
 being explored. This can only get bigger. It's like the beginning of 
the space program."

Obviously the big, we mean really big, drawback to home FMT's has been the "OK, that's really disgusting" factor. Mybiotica wants to make the process more sanitary and simple. No more "how to videos", no more approaching stool donors, no plastic containers, no blenders, no strainers, no spoons, no spills, no smell, no mess....no ick. Just a simple pill sold direct to the consumer at a fraction of the cost of a hospital administered FMT—if you are lucky enough to find a hospital that even knows about the treatment.
MyBiotica's Impact


We are believers in holistic
health practices and the right of people to take charge of their own health. We are not anti-doctor or anti-big business—we are pro self-health. The revolution we want to champion is to take control of our health and money with one simple, proven effective, thousand-year-old home treatment. It is after all, your health. 

One of our close loved ones was affected by an extreme bowel disorder for eight long years—it was Hell! She went to doctors and was told she had allergies to food, so she changed her diet, and added probiotics. When that didn't work, she was told it was a parasite. She was given harsh prescriptions and also took every vitamin under the sun. After years of trying everything, she finally found relief because of this amazing treatment. Because of the ick factor, people, even those the treatment brings relief to, are reluctant to suggest FMT's to others. We feel an urgency to bring this product to the world in a more approachable manner. We know that we can with your support! We can make FMT's available to millions who are suffering!

Initial studies indicate that the delivery of FMT’s in an easy to take pill form is not just possible, but indeed a growing reality. It will be clean, cost effective and above all effective in fighting illness. We encourage you to research the known health benefits of FMT's. Soon bureaucratic road blocks will likely be established to increase cost and restrict access to this amazing, thousand-year-old remedy.

OK, FMT’s may be a little gross. But, not as gross as the high priced pills, harmful antibiotics. and serums that big pharmaceuticals sell, that are often 30% effective in treating some of these same illnesses.
Paying thousands and thousands of dollars for limited health improvement....that's gross.
Modern diets heavy in fats and sugar that feed bad bacteria and anti-biotics that kill beneficial bacteria compromising the immune system....that's gross.
People suffering needlessly....that's very gross.



We had fun with the video, but be assured Fecal Microbiota Transplants are life saving serious. 110,000 people each year die and three million suffer from the intestine infection C. Difficile. FMT's are proven 90% effective in treating this one of many digestive illnesses. It is clinically proven that the digestive system is intrinsically connected to good health. A trillion bacteria cannot be wrong. Please join us in our efforts to bring the benefits of FMT's (Fecal Microbiota Transplant) to everyone, regardless of income. Join us in this exciting health re-discovery.  
Please join our grass roots campaign to develop an accessible, inexpensive, regulatory approved, FMT pill treatment for home use. Please help us help suffering people and their families worldwide. Not with a future cure, but with an existing cure that could use an advocate besides big business and big medicine.

The Goal
Clean, safe,
affordable, and accessible Fecal Microbiota Transplants (FMT) in pill form for all who need
it. 

The Mission
Our mission is to make a difference with your help:
To raise community
awareness about FMT's and the critical microbiome balance they provide.
To team with
established research services to continue development of clean capsules for FMT's.
To provide direct-to-customer sales of FMT capsules, keeping accessibility and affordability as priorities.
To champion the exciting self-health potential of FMT's, keeping them in the home where they started. Providing a counterpoint to big medicine that will make them costly to access.


Why Indiegogo  
There are several reasons we have chosen this approach:


This is not for discovery. This is to re-discover an ancient treatment that can potentially save the lives of hundreds of thousands and improve the health of millions of suffering people.
Exposure; this is a huge factor for us, not many know Fecal Microbiota Transplants even exist, and those who do, may not want to talk about it.
To bring hope to those who, once they know about it, may not be able to  access it.

Mybiotica wants to establish a safe, clean, and cost effective way to make this procedure available to everyone regardless of income. It has been used for thousands of years. There is no reason it needs to become the latest profit center for big medicine.


It's Mybiotica, it's
Yourbiotica, there is no reason why it can't be Everyonesbiotica!


Join us in our effort
to bring the benefits of FMT's (Fecal Microbiota Transplantation) to
everyone. You can be part of this exciting health re-discovery. 
Please help us raise the money to continue the development of accessible and
inexpensive FMT treatments for people suffering worldwide.
Thank you for your
support.

How can I help?
Glad you asked, we know that not all can help or contribute financially, but all can contribute to helping this info get out there:


Share this on Social Media. This is serious  sh*t. We made our campaign funny, because we want people to share this with as many people as possible. Too few people know what a FMT is. They work.
Share with family and friends through conversation and passing. Where else can you find funny sh*t that has the potential to help millions of suffering people?
Above all else if you know someone suffering suggest they check us out. They need to know about FMT's. They will be grateful!


Perks!

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know how the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Walking the walk...behind a horse.

In 1995 my wife and young family arrived in Prince Edward County to grow Pinot Noir. A lot has happened since then. Ups. Downs. Two County born children have been added to our two from the city. And we've all been joined by countless dozens of other men and women who shared much of the same vision.

But I'm always prepared to push it farther, based on observation and thought. Increasingly around the world fine vineyards have reverted to old ways. Horses have returned - in a few rugged places they never completely left.

I mused and discussed it for about as long as we've been here, and finally last Fall the horse I was looking for turned up almost on our doorstep. We bought her, and then housed her at a neighbour's farm for the Winter months. Spring draws near and the next steps must be made:

  • Harnessing tack - collar, hames, lines etc. - are needed. Some can be found second-hand, but a few items, for the safety of horse and hand, must be new and secure.
  • Sage mentors are available, but time is pressing hard on them.
  • Keeping their knowledge alive AND in practical current use, for the benefit of both the land and future women and men who may require it, is about as fine a thing as I can imagine doing for my neighbours.

How about you?

Harnessing You to Harness Lily

Lily is a registered Haflinger small Austrian draft horse - at the large end of the breed at 15 hands high. The temperament, size, power, and ability to thrive on supermodel portions of forage had marked Haflingers out to my eye as the perfect draft animal for small farms. We have the horse. But as a group we need to get her:

  • A single draft harness, which for a Haflinger sized horse runs well over $1,000.00 cdn., even if parts can be acquired second hand.
  • Scuffler (cultivator) and plow for vineyard work - used or the new Amish designed models.
  •  Fencing and small buildings for shelter, tack and forage.
That's what you're funding here, should you team up with Lily and this novice teamster. For our family's part, aside from our abiding thanks and appreciation, we have a number of different options for support and reward - from paper to tin, from glass to plate. We hope there's something that catches your eye or imagination. 

Domaine La Reine - our vineyard - continues along on its own small, determined budget. Lily and this opportunity arrived in an unanticipated manner. We've set the goal for this project to a low practical level. Apart from the key requirements, every extra bit helps, and keen deals or generous support will mean Lily gets a companion animal or two that a herd creature needs for health; better fencing and buildings; and other such details.

Why Does it Matter?

I've spent the last two decades growing wine grapes organically. I've made well received wines. I've written about the viticultural life. It was always the goal to introduce a draft animal into the process. Truthfully, until our farm has livestock, I feel we've not lived up to our part of being true farmers:

  • Hooves & human feet are much gentler on the land, cutting soil compaction. We still have our tractors, but a horse can help greatly lessen their inevitable punishment.
  • The last generation that farmed Prince Edward with horses is still around and can still hand on those skills.
  • Putting livestock back into the farm increases soil health through natural fertilizer.


If It's so Easy, Why Isn't Everyone Doing it?

It's not particularly easy. It's also not rocket science. However, kitting out a draft animal and learning how to gain and keep its trust in a work environment requires the expert help of those who know how these things are best fitted and fashioned.

We have the knowledgeable neighbours who can do this.

We have the vines, and now the horse, in place.

How swiftly we can put this team together to pull for place and purpose is our most formidable obstacle.

That, and how quick or slow a study I might be aft of the handles.

Let's All Get Lily Back to Work

Not everyone is in a position to contribute to this project directly, Even if your finances have thinned out (as a lot of us have seen lately), if you find this an interesting and worthy little quest, you can give invaluable assistance by:

  • Pointing us out to people you know who might think the same way as you.
  • Sharing this campaign through the various electronic social and personal networks you use.

We'll keep you posted on progress and success.

story:
I started Le Darra in my kitchen after taking an online course ‘Nutrition, Bodycare, and Herbalisim’ in 2008. Since then I have become a board certified Registered Holistic Nutritionist with a deep passion to help people stand in their power and to help them improve their health.

In addition to offering one on one nutritional coaching I also host free public health seminars. These seminars are free to attend and I focus on improving digestion, optimizing hormone function and ways to overcome emotional eating. I am currently presenting in Fergus, Ontario at the Fountainhead Health Store and I would like to expand my outreach while still being able to eliminate attendance cost. I feel that information about how food affects our bodies and how important locally sourcing food is, both economically and health related, needs to be easily accessible and presented to people in an environment where they can ask questions.

I’m looking to raise $2,000. This money will be used as follows;

$550 for venue rental in Toronto

$200 for social media advertisements

$500 for local radio adds

$300 for event flyers

$550 for event signage

By supporting these events you are supporting the empowerment of our communities, efforts to improve our local food supply and efforts to improve our economics by increased support to our local farms, and by decreasing the possible strain on our health care system. When we all start to make better choices in our health, we all support a stronger country and world.

If contributing is not something you can do but you would still like to help, like us on Facebook, Le Darra, and get the word out about our campaign. www.ledarra.com

story:
What is the concept of our product?

Our proposal consists in offering an olfactory compensation for an absence. In other words, we will allow people to smell the odor of a loved one (humans, or animals for example: dogs, cats or horses) when the person or animal is either temporarily or definitively gone (for example, deceased). In this case, we can produce a faithful reconstitution of a human or animal scent. We shall present it like a fragrance, in a customized box. We are about to create the first world’s community of olfactory comfort through a new tool, thanks to your support.

Several of you have to expressed your needs concerning a loved one’s smell (whether boyfriend, girlfriend, husband, wife, children or even loved pets such as cats, dogs and horses). You say:

“My boyfriend’s scent, or more specifically his physical odor - what a beautiful smell… He intoxicates me with his smell, when I smell him, I’m alive, because I feel him here, close to me”…

What a pity we can’t put all that in a perfume bottle!

But in fact, now it is possible - thanks to our technology, and thanks to your financial support, you’ll soon be able to discover the smell of your loved ones in a perfume bottle!

The story 


At some point in our lives, we must all face a trying family event; the death of a close realtion. In our case , it was my grandfather death on Father’s day, six years ago. Over the past six years, especially during the last five, my mother has been working on this project. In times of mourning, we all feel a need for comfort, which is expressed differently according to each individual. My mother and I needed to keep my grandfather’s smell alive. Others cling to photos, specific objects or voice messages.


He was diabetic and since then, I have learned that certain illnesses, including diabetes, leave a specific odor. He was also struggling with cancer, and was bedridden, accompanied by his ​​little dog (who had a pungent smell!). My grandfather also wore a strong perfume - the FARHEINEIT fragrance. A mixture of all these smells was what my mother wanted to to keep with her forever.

My mother didn’t dare talk about it at first, she thought she was crazy… but finally she admitted it to my grandmother… who felt the same! She’d never dared mention it to to my mother in fear of being thought crazy herself. But she had also kept unwashed pillowcases, just to keep the smell of this love alive! In studying the psychology of grief, I realized that we all experience similar emotions. Such feelings are natural, normal, and utterly legitimate.

So, here were 2 "crazy" women, I thought perhaps there were others… My mother became interestedindiscoveringmany otheraccounts.There was a definite need here, but no response.  Work was required to meet this need, find a solution and launch a company. For my mother, this was also a way of grieving, a way of prolonging my grandfather’s story through a special enterprise. When my mother explained her need to recreate that specific scent, and then, her amazing project to reconstite the smell of loved ones, I completely supported her! Since then,I have contributed to her research. At first I  helped in my own way, given I was still a student. But I’ve been working full time on this project for the past few months, and I truly appreciate it.  

Who are we?

There are two of us, mother and son, working as a duo. We have been passionately involved in this project for 6 years. We have the same international background in education, for my part (Florian Rabeau) a business school, and for my mother (Katia Apalategui) ISC Paris and ESSCA. 

I have worked in Asia through different internships, and studied for a semester at Thammasat University in Bangkok. My mother completed her last year at ESSCA at the Facultad Autonoma in Madrid. In 1997, she founded her own insurance agency. Before that, she worked in marketing, commerce, finance and management.

We have always been highly sensitive to all kinds of smells. Today, we’re working together to launch our start up.

We assure you that our research is even more advanced than PATRICK SUSKIND’s for his book, Perfume, whose protagonist had to kill people to possess their smell!


Who has dipped his nose in a loved one’s piece of clothing of to soak up the scent and comfort oneself? Why, countless people have, of course …! You’ve probably guessed, we manufacture olfactory links, and we operate in the emotional zone. To this end, we have worked hand in hand for more than 3 years with a specialized laboratory, and have developed the technology required to accurately recreate a loved one’s smell in fragrance form. We are providing a new means of comfort beyond the usual visual and auditory supports: we are innovating this domain with olfactory supplements. This is a completely new response to a vast, global demand.


At this step, we need your help to create the world’s first Olfactory Comfort community. To achieve this, we need funds to purchase manufacturing material, and to create a full time job for a chemist. Moreover, we need some stock to present our offer in handmade custom boxes, fabricated in France. And finally, we need the means to communicate this ‘revolution’ to the maximum number of people.

Funds raised will be used for:

Every human being in the world who knows at some point in his life, he or she will require comfort. This customized solution allows us to aim for a global market. This final step before creation requires financial backing.

What we need is to:

Ø  Create the prototype of an ‘olfactory box’ with help from a professional designer

Ø  Rent offices & a laboratory

Ø  Set up manufacturing material

Ø  Employ a full time Chemist

Ø  Establish an initial stock - we have to deal with fragrance suppliers who are accustomed to working with big quantities (at least 10 000 pieces for every item to complete our boxes). For example: bottles, pumps, caps...

Ø  Communication and publicity, to launch a corporate brand, a graphic charter, a press file, advertising for professionals and consumers, a website, some POS advertising and some displays to promote our offer.  This is an innovative market, and communication will be our first asset!

Ø  Funds to cover the first 3 months before we start to break even.

If we don't collect the entire amount targeted, funds raised will allow us to launch at least one segment of work before developing the others. With your support, when we make this dream come true, we will be answering dreams expressed by a great number of people, as evident from in the testimonies we assembled.

Segments:

- Life Events: Birth, Wedding, Mother's or Father's day, Valentines Day, Christmas, all these occasions for gifts. We also include Death. 

- Remembrance of our loved animals (Cats, Dogs, Horses) 

- Soft Toys for our children (For example: their comfort toy or blanket is lost - but it was full of a scent from the mother or father. You know, like us, how very difficult it is when a baby loses her/his comfort toy...! Luckily, we’ll now be able to reconstitute that smell, and put it put it into a new soft toy ort blanket. A very useful resource for parents who need to go away: they can savor their beloved child’s smell by breathing into a little cloth…).

The Impact

As explained earlier, we’ve have been working on this project for the past 6 years, devoting personal time and funds to make this dream real. At present, we have reached the last step before launching our product, but without support and funds we simply can't create our start up. We are actually monitoring by the SEINARI Incubator in Normandy. They have trusted our project from the beginning, and have allowed us to set up the necessary technology.

Funéplus: One of the major companies in funeral services has supported our project from the beginning, and is following us closely.


We have, of course, done a market survey and have learned - through a large number of testimonies -(Books, movies, actualities, broadcasts, songs, forums, social networks but also field surveys) that this is a real need for a many, many people in the world - we all need comfort in our daily lives, and during special events. We can say that our offer will help answer a true need.

To set up technology, we obtained 160 000 $ from the French state
We then obtained 40 000$ from the incubator Seinari


And finally, we contributed our personal funds to get to where we are now.

Risks & Challenges

As with all innovating solutions, this is an adventure, and it's obvious that there are risks. It is the same for every investment in start-ups, but we are certain that the result will be positive when customers buy the offer, and allow the company to develop. Thanks to various studies undertaken since the beginning, we are very confident in our potential success. The olfactory sense has been neglected for a long time but now it is about explode on the market. The best proof is olfactory marketing, and the launch of the Ophone on June 2014 (a telephone which allows one to send smells).

If you know people around you who would be interested by our offer, please share this page with them.

You can also create a buzz through social networks, mails, Internet... All your ideas are welcome. Moreover, your feedback is vital to for us, so don’t hesitate to communicate with us about your feelings regarding this subject.

Please contact us on: kalain.fk@gmail.com

And please, don't forget to use the Indiegogo share tools. In fact, we’re all lucky to be ‘connected’, so let's make the most of these new tools.  Don’t hesitate to share our page, website and video with everyone you know.

In studying the psychology of grief, I realized that we all experience 
similar emotions. Such feelings are natural, normal, and utterly 
legitimate. So, here were 2 "crazy" women,
I thought perhaps there were others… My mother became
interestedindiscoveringmany otheraccounts.There was a definite need here, but no response.  Work was
required to meet this need, find a solution
and launch a company. For my
mother, this was also a way of grieving, a way of prolonging my
grandfather’s story through a special enterprise.

When my mother explained her need to
recreate that specific scent, and then, her amazing project to reconstite the
smell of loved ones, I completely supported her! Since then,I have contributed to
her research. At first I  helped in my own
way, given I was still a student. But I’ve been working full time on this project
for the past few months, and I truly appreciate it.  Who are we? 
There are two of us, mother and son, working as a duo. We have been passionately
involved in this project for 6 years. We have the same international background
in education, for my part (Florian Rabeau) a business school, and for my mother
(Katia Apalategui) ISC Paris and ESSCA. 

I have worked in Asia through different internships, and studied for a
semester at Thammasat University in Bangkok. My mother completed her last year at
ESSCA at the Facultad Autonoma in Madrid. In 1997, she founded her own insurance
agency. Before that, she worked in marketing, commerce, finance and management.

We have always been highly sensitive to all kinds of smells. Today, we’re
working together to launch our start up. 
We assure you that our research is even more advanced than PATRICK
SUSKIND’s for his book, Perfume, whose protagonist had to kill people to possess
their smell!

Who has dipped his nose in a loved one’s piece of clothing of to soak up the scent
and comfort oneself? Why, countless people have, of course …! You’ve probably guessed, we
manufacture olfactory links, and we operate in the emotional zone. To this end,
we have worked hand in hand for more than 3 years with a specialized laboratory,
and have developed the technology required to accurately recreate a loved one’s
smell in fragrance form. We are providing a new means of comfort beyond the
usual visual and auditory supports: we are innovating this domain with
olfactory supplements. This is a completely new response to a vast, global
demand. 

At this step, we need your help to create the world’s first Olfactory Comfort community.
To achieve this, we need funds to purchase manufacturing material, and to
create a full time job for a chemist. Moreover, we need some stock to present
our offer in handmade custom boxes, fabricated in France. And finally, we need
the means to communicate this ‘revolution’ to the maximum number of people.
Funds raised will be used for:
Every human being in the world who knows at some point
in his life, he or she will require comfort. This customized solution allows us
to aim for a global market. This final step before creation requires financial
backing. 

What we need is to:
Ø 
Create the prototype of an ‘olfactory box’ with help
from a professional designer 
Ø 
Rent offices & a laboratory
Ø 
Set up manufacturing material
Ø 
Employ a full time Chemist 
Ø 
Establish an initial stock - we have to deal with fragrance
suppliers who are accustomed to working with big quantities (at least 10 000
pieces for every item to complete our boxes). For example: bottles, pumps, caps...
Ø 
Communication and publicity, to launch a corporate
brand, a graphic charter, a press file, advertising for professionals and
consumers, a website, some POS advertising and some displays to promote our
offer.  This is an innovative market, and communication will be our first asset!

Ø 
Funds to cover the first 3 months before we start to break
even. 
If we don't collect the entire amount targeted, funds raised will allow
us to launch at least one segment of work before developing the others. With
your support, when we make this dream come true, we will be answering dreams expressed
by a great number of people, as evident from in the testimonies we assembled. 
Segments: 
- Life Events: Birth, Wedding, Mother's or Father's day, Valentines Day,
Christmas, all these occasions for gifts. We also include Death. 
- Remembrance of our loved animals (Cats, Dogs, Horses) 
- Soft Toys for our children (For example: their comfort toy or blanket
is lost - but it was full of a scent from the mother or father. You know, like us, how
very difficult it is when a baby loses her/his comfort toy...! Luckily, we’ll now
be able to reconstitute that smell, and put it put it into a new soft toy ort
blanket. A very useful resource for parents who need to go away: they can savor
their beloved child’s smell by breathing into a little cloth…). 
The Impact
As explained earlier,
we’ve have been working on this project for the past 6 years, devoting personal
time and funds to make this dream real. At present, we have reached the last
step before launching our product, but without support and funds we simply can't
create our start up. We are actually monitoring by the SEINARI Incubator in
Normandy. They have trusted our project from the beginning, and have allowed us
to set up the necessary technology. 
Funéplus: One of the major
companies in funeral services has supported our project from the beginning, and
is following us closely. 

We have, of course, done a market survey and have learned - through a large
number of testimonies -(Books, movies,
actualities, broadcasts, songs, forums, social networks but also field
surveys) that this is a real need for a many, many people in the world - we all
need comfort in our daily lives, and during special events. We can say that our
offer will help answer a true need. 
To set up technology, we obtained 160 000 $ from the French state
We then obtained 40 000$ from the incubator Seinari
And finally, we contributed our personal funds to get to where we are
now.
Risks & Challenges
As with all innovating solutions, this is an adventure, and it's obvious
that there are risks. It is the same for every investment in start-ups, but we
are certain that the result will be positive when customers buy the offer, and
allow the company to develop. Thanks to various studies undertaken since the beginning,
we are very confident in our potential success. The olfactory sense has been neglected for a long time
but now it is about explode on the market. The best proof is olfactory marketing, and the
launch of the Ophone on June 2014 (a telephone which allows one to send smells).

If you know people around you who would be interested by our offer,
please share this page with them.
You can also create a buzz through social networks, mails, Internet... All
your ideas are welcome. Moreover, your feedback is vital to for us, so don’t
hesitate to communicate with us about your feelings regarding this subject. 
Please contact us on: kalain.fk@gmail.com
And please, don't forget to use the Indiegogo share tools. In fact, we’re
all lucky to be ‘connected’, so let's make the most of these new tools. 
Don’t hesitate to share our page, website and video with everyone you know.

story:
Dear Local Community,

   Please allow me to introduce myself. My name is Ashley Espin and I am in persuit of my dream of becoming the next Miss Rodeo Nevada. I have grown up emulating and admiring the women who have worn the Miss Rodeo Nevada Crown. For me, miss Rodeo Nevada is a woman who embraces the western lifestyle, holds strong to her values, is a role model for younger generation and knows the values of family and faith. I believe the purpose of the Miss Rodeo Nevada pageant is to select a young lady who will serve as an ambassador for the state of Nevada.

   As a native Nevadan, I have always been an active member of our community.  Last year I was given the opportunity to serve as the ambassador of the Reno Rodeo. This was an experience that changed my life, and opened so many doors for my future.  I am currently working on a degree in the field of both Education and Civil Engineering, and am hoping to graduate in the near future. I have been working with young children ages 4-9 bringing them around the horses and allowing them to assist me. I relish the joy that it brings to their faces, there is nothing greater  than the love between a child and a horse. As Miss Rodeo Nevada I hope to bring awareness to the sport of rodeo, the Unique American haritage as well as promoting the great state of Nevada and all of it's beauty.

   Unfortunately, achieving this dream has proven to be rather costly. I need the assistance of my local community in the way of monetary contributions to cover the costs associated with all the facets of the pageant. Any amount that you can afford to contribute would be greatly appreciated and you can be rest assured that you have invested in a persons persuit of her dreams to bring awareness to a worthwhile cause.

   Thank you for taking the time to read this, any support you can provide will be greatly appreciated.

                Warm Reguards,

                 Ashley Espin
